item.text: 这本书9月份买的，有塑料封面，没有打开来看，今天打开看西游记，发现这套书的下册好多页都是空白页，印刷有问题
item.text_trans: This book was bought in September, has a plastic cover, did not open to see, open today to see the Journey to the West, found that the next volume of this book is a lot of pages are blank pages, printing problems

item.name: 四大名著:西游记(人民文学版)(套装上下册)
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 价格便宜，注释也多。先买的红楼梦，然后又把其他三本撸了。西游记据说大有深意。《幽梦影》里就说道：西游记是一本悟书。剑桥中国文学史有种观点说，西游记、三国演义什么的不是一人所著，而是经过很多代人的传述、丰富而成的作品。打小学看过西游记之后还没有看过，一定好好研究下
item.text_trans: The price is cheap and there are many comments. I bought the Dream of Red Mansions first, and then I smashed the other three books. Journey to the West is said to have great meaning. In "Dream of Dreams", it is said: Journey to the West is a book of enlightenment. There is a kind of viewpoint in the history of Chinese literature in Cambridge. The Journey to the West and the Romance of the Three Kingdoms are not written by one person, but by the narration and enrichment of many generations. I haven’t seen it since I saw the Journey to the West in the elementary school. I must study it well.

item.name: 四大名著:西游记(人民文学版)(套装上下册)
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 小时候特别喜欢看西游记的动画片。片头曲是这么唱的：猴哥猴哥，你真了不得……现在看了原著，发现猴哥不只了不得，而是好伟大。动画中可爱的猪八戒变成了好吃懒做，老教唆唐僧念紧箍咒的肥猪。沙和尚只有挑行李，存在感几乎为零。至于唐僧，有句话说，骑白马的不一定是王子，也有可能是唐僧。想不到唐僧却是王子中的王子。皇帝做他的哥哥，女儿国国王求他做驸马，路上的女妖精都要和他睡觉（而不是吃他）。只有白马什么都没变。总之动画片带给我的，对西游记那种美好单纯的认识好像都不在了。取经变得更加残酷，《西游记》对我来说更像《了不起的孙悟空》了。
item.text_trans: When I was a child, I especially liked watching the cartoons of Journey to the West. The title song is so sung: Monkey brother, you really can't... Now look at the original, and find that the monkey brother is not only not good, but great. The cute pig's eight rings in the animation became a lazy, old-fashioned, and sorrowful, fat-stricken pig. The sand monk only picks up the baggage, and the sense of existence is almost zero. As for Tang Yan, there is a saying that riding a white horse is not necessarily a prince, but it may also be Tang Yan. I don’t think Tang Yan is the prince of the prince. The emperor was his brother, and the king of the daughter asked him to be a Hummer. The female fairy on the road would sleep with him (rather than eating him). Only the white horse has not changed anything. In short, the cartoons brought me, and the simple and simple understanding of Journey to the West seems to be gone. The experience has become more cruel, and "Journey to the West" is more like "Great Monkey King" to me.

item.name: 四大名著:西游记(人民文学版)(套装上下册)
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 前后字也不一样，有的页印的很不清楚。 还是正版就是这样？
item.text_trans: The words are different before and after, and some of the pages are very unclear. Is it genuine?

item.name: 四大名著:西游记(人民文学版)(套装上下册)
item.author: 吴承恩
item.summary: 关于这本书也来说说我的感觉
item.text: 装订还好啦，看完了也没有像有的童鞋说的掉页什么的。纸张一般，不算太烂，但有瑕疵，比方说偶尔有的地方不均匀地泛黄。通读下来，整部著作还是很容易理解的。只因本人水平有限，又很少读白话文以外的文字，故觉得此作中错别字挺多的，大概是通假字吧，如此就不太适合年纪尚小的读者了，以免误人。
item.summary_trans: I also talk about my feelings about this book.
item.text_trans: Binding is okay, after reading it, there is no such thing as a child's shoes. Paper is generally not too bad, but there are flaws, for example, occasionally some places are unevenly yellowed. After reading it, the whole book is still very easy to understand. Because my level is limited, and I rarely read words other than vernacular, I feel that there are quite a lot of typos in this work. It is probably a fake word, so it is not suitable for readers who are still young, so as not to be mistaken.

item.text_trans: I read the extracurricular books I bought for my daughter. I didn’t expect to finish the winter vacation, and I was happy to share the story in the book. Thanks to these great works, the spirit conveyed in the book will never be outdated. In addition, the print quality of the book is also very good.

item.text: 中国古典名著，人民文学出版社出版，字体清晰、排版合理、大小适宜，纸张较好，有注释，校对仔细。分上下两册。性价比高，在新华书店买不会有优惠。我很喜欢，我以前读书时买的弄丢了，现在买来重看，还想留给我的女儿，希望她爱看书。
item.text_trans: Chinese classical classics, published by the People's Literature Publishing House, with clear fonts, reasonable layout, appropriate size, good paper, notes, and proofreading. Divided into two volumes. Cost-effective, there will be no discounts at Xinhua Bookstore. I like it very much. I lost it when I was studying. Now I bought it and I want to leave it to my daughter. I hope she loves reading.

item.name: 四大名著:西游记(人民文学版)(套装上下册)

item.text: 《西游记》有很多的版本，而人民文学的最权威。在人民文学的几个版本里，窃以为这个版本又是最好的，最新修订，将近年来的考古发现及学界的研究成果包含其中，很负责任的做法。推荐购买。
item.text_trans: There are many versions of Journey to the West, and the most authoritative of people's literature. In several editions of People's Literature, it is believed that this version is the best. The latest revisions include the archaeological findings of recent years and the research results of the academic community. It is very responsible. Recommended to buy.

item.text: 永远也忘不了第一次捧着《西游记》如饥似渴的情景，那个假期，书拿到手后，连续的几天内都没舍得放下...也一直想再买一套真正属于自己的四大名著，谢谢卓越，终于让我如愿以偿，希望《三国演义》和《水浒传》也能早日买到...
item.text_trans: I will never forget the first time I held the "Journey to the West" hunger and thirst scene. On that holiday, after the book was handed, I was not willing to let go for a few days in a row... I always wanted to buy another set of four truly true ones. Masterpiece, thank you for your excellence, I finally got my wish, I hope that "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" and "Water Margin" can also be bought soon...

item.name: 四大名著:西游记(人民文学版)(套装上下册)
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 非常好的版本：1. 版面疏朗清晰2. 绣像插图，约3回一张。3.价格之低廉，唉，真是没有天理了。不过，据报导，有李洪甫指出黄肃秋整理的西游记有错误400多处，记者从人民文学出版社获悉，他们已决定采纳李洪甫的研究成果，在新出版的《西游记》中进行改进。不过对照看了一下，似并无改进。
item.text_trans: Very good version: 1. The layout is clear and clear 2. Embroidered illustrations, about 3 times. 3. The price is low, hey, there is really no reason. However, it is reported that Li Hongjun pointed out that there are more than 400 errors in the Journey to the West compiled by Huang Suqiu. The reporter learned from the People's Literature Publishing House that they have decided to adopt Li Hongjun's research results and make improvements in the newly published Journey to the West. However, the control looked at it and it seems that there is no improvement.

item.text: 我订的货都4天了到现在还没到，网页上居然显示“客户要求推迟时间”扯淡！！送货员打我手机我手机没开机，今天开机就只有几个未接电话我明明选择的是学校地址白天没人请安排其他时间送，他偏要白天来送，还说我自己不在家，送货员硬说发了条信息给我。我告诉你，我压根就没见到什么短信！卓越既然做不到除白天以外的时间送就别TMD搞出个P选项！忽悠我们？？这已经是我第n次在卓越订货了，小问题我是绝对不会说的，毕竟它也不是没有优点，但是这次我实在是太失望我的建议是：卓越把白天没人这一个选项删了，做不到就不要乱放狗P！

My mobile phone didn't turn on. I only have a few missed calls when I booted up. I obviously chose the school address. No one in the daytime arranges other time to send. He prefers to send it during the day, and says that I am not at home. The deliveryman insisted that a message was sent to me. I tell you, I haven't seen any text messages at all! Excellence, since you can't do it outside the daytime, don't make a P option for TMD! Fudge us? ? This is my first time in the excellent order, I will never say a small problem, after all, it is not without merit, but this time I am too disappointed. My suggestion is: excellence, no one in the day. Deleted, don't mess with the dog P!

item.summary_trans: Looking forward to the fourth edition
item.text_trans: This is the third edition of the "Journey to the West" published by the People's Literature Publishing House in 2010. Huang Suqiu added a note, which was edited by Li Hongjun and returned to the school. On the basis of the second edition, the Shidetang has changed a lot of places and made a big progress; however, a small part has not changed smoothly. Without the expectations, it is still the best version at the moment.

item.name: 四大名著:西游记(人民文学版)(套装上下册)
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 正版的，人民文学出版社的，纸张超级好，注释也很全，可以做学习的工具书。本来要求10月17日夜间送货的，但是未送，无奈打电话给客服（亚马逊这个做的超级好，用手机查询客服之后，点击“让客服联系我”，客服会主动给顾客打电话，省了电话费，呵呵），然后查询了一下跟踪包裹，就发现正在派送，联系派送师傅，师傅说午饭后送货。果然下午一点准时送来了，好重呀，因为一块儿买了四大名著，共计八册，都是正版，这个四大名著从初中还是高中时就想买了，等了20来年了，终于出手买了，四大名著原价197.00元，折后价共计133.00元（6.751折），用了10元优惠券之后123元（6.244折）。这四大名著亚马逊直销的折扣每一个都不同，《红楼梦》正价59.70，折后41.10，6.91折，《水浒传》34.8元（原价50.6元，6.91折），《西游记》29.5元（原价47.20元，6.21折），《三国演义》27.60元（原价39.50元，7折），网上买东西还要精打细算呀
item.summary_trans: Genuine, 29.50 yuan, original price 47.20 yuan, 6.21 fold
item.text_trans: Genuine, People's Literature Publishing House, the paper is super good, the notes are also very complete, you can do the reference book for learning. Originally asked for delivery on the night of October 17, but did not send, but no help to call the customer service (Amazon is doing this super good, after using the mobile phone to query customer service, click "let customer service contact me", customer service will take the initiative to call the customer, Saved the telephone bill, huh, huh), and then inquired about tracking the package, found that it is being dispatched, contact the delivery master, the master said delivery after lunch. Sure enough, I sent it on time in the afternoon. It’s so heavy, because I bought four famous books together, a total of eight books, all of which are genuine. The four famous books wanted to buy from junior high school or high school. After waiting for 20 years, finally I bought it, the original price of the four famous books was 197.00 yuan, and the discounted price was 133.00 yuan (6.751 fold). After using the 10 yuan coupon, it was 123 yuan (6.244 fold). The discounts of these four famous Amazon direct sales are different. The price of "Dream of Red Mansions" is 59.70, 41.10, 6.91 fold, "Water Margin" 34.8 yuan (original price 50.6 yuan, 6.91 fold), "Journey to the West" 29.5 yuan (original price) 47.20 yuan, 6.21 fold), "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" 27.60 yuan (original price 39.50 yuan, 30% off), online shopping must be carefully calculated

item.name: 四大名著:西游记(人民文学版)(套装上下册)
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 现在提倡国学教育，个人觉得既然要读，还是要读四大名著原著。我先预习了一下，再辅导儿子读，两个人随时沟通。从最简单的西游记开始，读到三国，再读到水浒。红楼梦还是放最后吧。几本书都是从亚马逊买的书，人民文学版。优点是校对得好，不缺页，错别字少，版本经过多次精选，就是比较传统。缺点是没有大字版，没有考虑小读者的需求，插图少，为成年人服务的。我读书喜欢写批注，纸和字都小，更别提留白了。当初买的时候，改成白话文的基本上没话看，原版比较多家，还是选了人民文学版。目前比较合适的选择，85分，希望出为小读者准备的原版。
item.text_trans: Now advocate the education of Chinese culture, personally feel that if you want to read, you still have to read the original works of the four famous books. I previewed it first, then coached my son to read, and the two communicated at any time. Start with the simplest Journey to the West, read the Three Kingdoms, and read the otters. The Dream of Red Mansions is still the last. A few books are books bought from Amazon, People's Literature. The advantage is that the proofreading is good, there is no shortage of pages, there are fewer typos, and the version has been selected many times, which is more traditional. The disadvantage is that there is no large print version, no consideration for the needs of small readers, fewer illustrations, and services for adults. I like to write notes, paper and words are small, let alone leave blank. When I first bought it, I basically changed it into a vernacular. There were a lot of originals, and I chose the People’s Literature. At present, the more appropriate choice, 85 points, I hope to produce the original version for the small readers.

item.author: 吴承恩
item.summary: 《四大名著:西游记(上下)(人民文学版新版)》以唐朝高僧玄藏西去拜佛取经这一历史事实的基础
item.text: 《四大名著:西游记(上下)(人民文学版新版)》以唐朝高僧玄藏西去拜佛取经这一历史事实的基础，经过作者极具想象力的构思及描写，塑造了神勇忠心的孙悟空，迁腐的唐三藏，好吃懒惰的猪八戒以及勤恳的沙和尚的形象，通过西去取经的磨难与艰辛，从中反映出作者对现实的不满，深刻揭露批判了封建社会的黑暗，腐朽和统治阶级的昏庸凶暴。
item.summary_trans: "Four Masterpieces: The Journey to the West (Upper and Lower) (People's Literary Version)" is based on the historical facts of the Tang Dynasty's Gaochun Xuanzang West to worship Buddha.
item.text_trans: "The Four Masterpieces: The Journey to the West (Upper and Lower) (People's Literary Version)" is based on the historical facts of the Tang Dynasty's Gaochun Xuanzang West to worship Buddha. After the author's imaginative conception and description, he created a brave and loyal Sun Wukong. The mourning Tang Sanzang, the lazy pigs and the diligent image of the sand monk, through the West to learn the hardships and hardships, reflect the author's dissatisfaction with reality, and profoundly expose the darkness, decay and rule of the feudal society. The class is stupid and violent.

item.name: 四大名著:西游记(人民文学版)(套装上下册)
item.author: 吴承恩
item.summary: 书脊纸质！布面精装，可惜了！
item.text: 记得小时候看人文社的四大名著平装本，真是爱不释手，这种痴迷阅读，也是对自己的一种文学启蒙！很多年了，期盼人文社推出精装版，现在终于等到人文版四大名著的精装本的出版，喜见当当有售，所以毫不犹豫地就下单订购全套四种，下单后满是期待！收到后迫不及待地开箱拆封，满以为是个大大的惊喜！哎呀，太可惜了:布料精装倒是布面不假(而且布料还很好)，但最容易破损的地方——原本最该使用布料的书脊却是用的很不赖磨的那种白色的纸！厚厚的精装书，纸质的书脊很不赖磨，可能翻不了几次，纸质书脊就裂口了，这可难为了读者，翻阅时一定要平放桌面，小心轻翻，不然，书脊就烂了！这还有，书盒不是全布料，侧面居然也是纸，盒子正反两面都是布料，质量好，但两个侧面却是不耐磨的纸，纸和布料的结合处很容易断裂，四个书盒还没有拆封就发现有两个盒子布纸结合处已经断裂，还有盒子太紧，放书进盒和取出是一个技术活，稍不小心，纸质的书脊就断裂了！这不是最伟大的设计是什么？应该向装帧设计者颁发奇葩设计奖！反人类的设计！彻底打消了我以前想购藏两套的想法！
item.summary_trans: Book spine paper! Hardcover on the cloth, it’s a pity!
item.text_trans: I remember when I was a child, I read the four major masterpieces of the Humanities Society. I really love it. This obsessive reading is also a kind of literary enlightenment for myself! For many years, I hope that the Humanities Society will launch a hardcover edition. Now I have finally waited until the publication of the hardcover edition of the four famous editions of the Humanities Edition. I like to sell it, so I don’t hesitate to order a full set of four orders. look forward to! After receiving it, I couldn’t wait to unpack and unpack it. I thought it was a big surprise! Oops, it’s a pity: the cloth is hard and the fabric is not fake (and the fabric is still very good), but the most vulnerable place to break - the original spine that uses the fabric is the kind of white paper that is very hard to use! The thick hardcover book, the paper spine is not bad, it may not turn a few times, the paper spine will be broken, which is difficult for the readers. When reading, be sure to lay the table flat, carefully flip it, otherwise the spine will be bad. Now! In addition, the book box is not full fabric, the side is actually paper, the box is cloth on both sides, the quality is good, but the two sides are not wear-resistant paper, the combination of paper and cloth is easy to break, four The book box has not been unpacked and found that there are two boxes of cloth and paper joints have been broken, and the box is too tight, put the book into the box and take out is a technical activity, a little careless, the paper spine is broken! Isn't this the greatest design? The design award should be awarded to the finishing designer! Anti-human design! I completely dispelled the idea that I wanted to buy two sets before!

item.name: 四大名著:西游记(人民文学版)(套装上下册)
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 小时候电视剧连环画动画片哪个版本的没看过，我以为很懂西游记，偶尔有一次看到优酷上的一个自频道叫做你不知道的西游，当时很受触动，才觉得自己对西游记的了解如此浅薄，所以决定买本原版的好好研读，因为从小到大西游记不仅是我想象力的启蒙书，更是百看不厌的经典。人民文学出版的这些经典名著绝对是值得信赖并且有收藏价值的，家里很多人民文学的名著丛书，装帧设计大方无功无过看得舒服就行。推荐跟我一样喜欢西游记周边的朋友好好看看哦。
item.text_trans: When I was a child, I didn’t read any version of the comic strip comics. I thought I knew the Journey to the West. Occasionally I saw a self-channel on Youku called the Westward Journey that you didn’t know. At that time, I was very touched and felt that I knew about Journey to the West. So shallow, so I decided to buy this original version for a good study, because from childhood to the West is not only an enlightenment book of my imagination, but also a classic that I never tire of. These classic works published by People's Literature are absolutely trustworthy and collectible. Many of the famous books of the people's literature in the family, the design of the frame is generous and unremarkable. Recommend to like my friends around the Journey to take a good look.

item.text: 依旧是是黄肃秋注释点校的，大量的标点断句很值得商榷。而且昨夜发现一个校印错误：第288页第八行，“唤名‘草还丹’，又名‘小参果’”。“小参果”系“人参果”之误。
item.summary_trans: I found a school printing error last night.
item.text_trans: It is still a commentary of Huang Suqiu, and a large number of punctuation sentences are worth discussing. And last night I found a school printing error: the eighth line on page 288, "calling the name 'grass returning Dan', also known as 'small reference fruit'." "Small fruit" is the mistake of "ginseng fruit".

item.text: 有农村的小朋友，想看中国的四大名著，我就买了。其实我一直没有怎么仔细看过这四大名著。每次看到“某某到此一游”的涂鸦，我就想到这本书了。呵呵，这也许是这本书的一个影响之一吧。正如我评价所谓的四大名著，我真的不知道对于孩子们影响是正面的多还是反面的多。我更希望孩子们读一些关于制度关于合作等方面的书，但现实呢？
item.text_trans: There are children in the countryside who want to see China's four famous books, I bought them. In fact, I have never looked at these four great masterpieces carefully. Every time I saw the graffiti of "Someone is here," I thought of this book. Oh, this may be one of the effects of this book. As I rate the so-called four masterpieces, I really don't know if the impact on children is more positive or negative. I also hope that the children will read some books about the system and other aspects of cooperation, but what about the reality?

item.name: 四大名著:西游记(人民文学版)(套装上下册)
item.author: 吴承恩
item.summary: 没后台的都被一棒打死
item.text: 每当我翻开《西游记》时，总有不同的心情。它在四大名著中，是最生动活泼的，小时候的我读起它来总觉得既过瘾又有趣。但今时今日，不变的是那光怪陆离，色彩斑斓的神话世界，我的领悟却变了。这是一部所有人都爱读的经典大作，每个人都能在解读它时获取不同的感觉和启示，有人喜欢它鲜明的人物个性；有人喜欢它瑰丽的整体形象；有人喜欢它活泼诙谐的对话旁白；有人还研究它的历史背景、社会现象。但在我看来，他那曲折的情节中暗藏着人们渴望而不可及的生活理想和人性追求，那就是自由。在经历了日复一日个性受约束的日子，廿一世纪的人们都格外向往自由，向往那个自由的化身：孙悟空。孙悟空破土而出，“不伏麒麟辖，不服凤凰管，又不服人间王位所约束”，闯龙宫，闹冥司，自花果山上目在称王。可以说已经达到人性摆脱一切束缚，彻底自由的状态。孙悟空其实就是自由的化身，他的品质中最突出的就是向往自由，他始终在追求自由，它的一切斗争也是为了争取自由。这样一个鲜活的形象给予了读者一种追求自由，追逐自由的力量和勇气。 然而，每个人都明白， 在现在，即使是将来，完全的自由终究是不可能的，人始终要受到这般那般的约束。尽管包围着我们的是个受约束的世界，但我们可以让内心尽量变得广阔而幽深，让它能够无边无际、包容天地。然而，目前社会上还有许多人被一些价值不大的东西所束缚，却自得其乐，还觉得很满足。经过几百年的探索和发展，人们对物质需求已不再迫切，但对于精神自由的需求却无端被抹杀了。总之， 我认为现代人最缺乏的就是一种开阔进取， 寻找最大自由的精神。在厉尽时间锤炼的《西游记》中，竟深深蕴含着新世纪人们最渴望的自由精神……我更明白为什么它能够传承至今了。
item.summary_trans: No backstage was killed by a stick
item.text_trans: Whenever I open the Journey to the West, there is always a different mood. It is the most lively among the four famous books. When I was a child, I always thought it was both fun and interesting. But today, what remains unchanged is the mysterious, colorful mythical world, and my understanding has changed. This is a classic masterpiece that everyone loves to read. Everyone can get different feelings and revelations when interpreting it. Some people like its distinctive character personality; some people like its magnificent overall image; some people like it lively and humorous. Dialogue narration; some people also studied its historical background and social phenomena. But in my opinion, his tortuous plot hides the ideal of life and human pursuit that people are eager to reach, that is freedom. On the days when the personality is constrained day after day, the people of the 21st century are particularly yearning for freedom, longing for the embodiment of freedom: Sun Wukong. Sun Wukong broke out of the ground, "not under the jurisdiction of the unicorns, not obeying the Phoenix tube, and not obeying the human throne", the Dragon Palace, the Department of the murder, from the Huaguoshan on the king. It can be said that humanity has been freed from all constraints and completely free. Sun Wukong is actually the embodiment of freedom. The most prominent of his qualities is the yearning for freedom. He is always pursuing freedom. All his struggles are also for freedom. Such a vivid image gives the reader a power and courage to pursue freedom and chase freedom. However, everyone understands that in the present, even in the future, complete freedom is ultimately impossible, and people are always subject to such constraints. Although we are surrounded by a constrained world, we can make our hearts as broad and deep as possible, so that it can be boundless and inclusive. However, there are still many people in the society who are bound by something of little value, but they are happy and feel very satisfied. After hundreds of years of exploration and development, people's demand for material is no longer urgent, but the demand for spiritual freedom has been ruined. In short, I think that what modern people lack most is a spirit of open-mindedness and the pursuit of maximum freedom. In the "Journey to the West", which has been tempered by time, it deeply contains the spirit of freedom that people most desire in the new century... I understand why it can be passed down to this day.

item.text_trans: This book itself is one of the four major literary classics. There is no need to say anything about the classics. Here I will talk about my feelings when I first saw it. After hours, I have seen countless times in the TV series and three dozens of white bones on TV. It seems that Sun Wukong is a Journey to the West, but when you open this book, you will find that the protagonist is actually four countrymen. They are vulgar but extremely simple. Especially when you see that the Eight Commanders don't stop the country, they can't stand the humor.

item.name: 四大名著:西游记(人民文学版)(套装上下册)
item.author: 吴承恩
item.summary: 中国历史上最伟大的反贪污、反腐败、反渎职、反独裁小说！！！
item.text: ①西游记在四大名著的思想境界当中，无疑是最高的，作者用貌似荒诞的神话故事，表达了对社会问题的深层次研究，妖怪，死了的，都是地方一霸，但是没有背景，没死的，都是上面有人的，两个群体，展现了......遗憾的是，作者也没有跳出历史的框架，如果写的是，孙悟空上了天宫，干掉了玉皇大帝和观音菩萨以及如来佛祖，才算的上是真正的具有民主主义思想的创始之作，可惜的是，作者笔下的斗士，最终的结局也是被收买了，终身的公务员以及官阶的荣耀，让开始时可歌可泣的行者最终妥协成了官僚，成为了利益集团的一份子，可悲啊......②人民文学出版社出版的这套四大名著，可谓朴实，没有多余的装帧，纸张、印刷、排版都是中规中矩，不出彩也没大错，加上优秀的编审，算是首选吧。建议，考虑一下，下次出版的时候，将天地再放的宽点，单册的页数减少，把《西游记》《水浒传》《三国演义》改成三本一套，《红楼梦》改为四本一套，重新设计封面，这样就完美了。
item.summary_trans: The greatest anti-corruption, anti-corruption, anti-dereliction, and anti-dictatorship in Chinese history! ! !
item.text_trans: 1 Journey to the West is undoubtedly the highest in the ideological realm of the four famous works. The author expresses a deep research on social problems with seemingly absurd myths. Monsters, dead, are local hegemony, but no background. , not dead, are some people above, two groups, show ... ... Unfortunately, the author did not jump out of the historical framework, if written, Sun Wukong went to the Heavenly Palace, killed the Jade Emperor and Guanyin Bodhisattva and Buddha Buddha are the true foundings of democratic ideas. Unfortunately, the author’s warriors, the final ending is also bought, the lifelong civil servants and the glory of the official ranks, so that when they start, they can sing. The practitioners finally became a bureaucrat and became a part of the interest group. Sadly... 2 The four famous books published by the People’s Literature Publishing House can be described as simple, without extra binding, paper, printing, typesetting. It’s all in the middle of the game. It’s not a big mistake, and it’s the first choice. Suggestions, consider the next time, when the next publication, the width of the world will be re-released, the number of pages in a single book will be reduced, and the "Journey to the West", "Water Margin" and "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" will be changed into three sets, and "Dream of Red Mansions" will be changed. For the four sets, redesign the cover, which is perfect.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 虽说免费的，但别字实在太多了。此等名著，必须采用如人民文学出版社之类的权威版本，且不应有错别字。与人民文学出版社对此，对照纸质书前两页，就有数个别字：“再去五千西百岁”应为“四百岁”，“到此开始有根”应为“天始有根”，“曰南赡部洲”应为“南膳”或“南瞻”。不知是版本原因？还是错误？
item.text_trans: Although free, there are too many words. Such masterpieces must use authoritative versions such as the People's Literature Publishing House, and there should be no typos. In contrast to the People’s Literature Publishing House, in contrast to the first two pages of the paper book, there are several individual words: “Going to five thousand West and centenary” should be “four hundred years old”, “starting to have roots” should be “the beginning of the day” There is a root," "Southern Fujian Province" should be "Southern Food" or "Southern View." I don't know why it is a version? Still wrong?

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 我是kindle电子书版本的,本人认为应该把诗词描写的字体改细一些,再与衔接的上句的冒号分一个段,如: 诗曰: 混沌未分天地乱,茫茫渺渺……,须看⟪西游释厄传⟫。(诗句部分自动改细)再举个栗子: ……他夫妻两个,便在阶前谢了恩,欢欢喜喜还乡。有诗为证: 人生人死是前缘………,借尸还魂李翠莲。(诗句部分自动改细)这样容易和故事剧情区别开,看起来比较舒服,不然乱糟糟的,看着眼睛就花,密密麻麻的。内容当然好了,四大名著不是白评的,但是排版太差了,所以综合起来只给两星。用电子书一个一个手打的,望编辑改正。
item.text_trans: I am a Kindle e-book version. I think that the fonts written by poetry should be changed a little more, and then the colon of the upper sentence of the connection is divided into a paragraph, such as: Poetry: Chaos is not divided into heaven and earth, oh..., must see ⟪西游释释传⟫. (The verse part is automatically changed) Another chestnut: ...... He married two, and he thanked him before the stage, and joyfully returned home. There are poems to prove: Life is the death of the front........., by the corpse reviving Li Cuilian. (The verse part is automatically changed) This is easy to distinguish from the storyline, and it looks more comfortable, otherwise it is messy, and it looks like it is confusing. The content is of course good. The four famous books are not white, but the layout is too bad, so the combination is only two stars. I use the e-book to play one by one, and I hope that the editor will correct it.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 《西游记》是中国古典四大名著之一，由吴承恩编写而成。此书描写的是孙悟空、猪八戒、沙悟净保护唐僧西天取经的传奇故事。作者通过虚幻的世界，对封建统治者的态度颇可玩味，在《西游记》中，简直找不出一个称职的皇帝。如来佛祖所创佛教，僧人自然不能以钱财所迷，可是佛祖竟然默许手下人收取贿赂，这反映封建社会官官相护的黑暗情景。
item.text_trans: "Journey to the West" is one of the four classic Chinese classics, written by Wu Chengen. This book describes the legendary story of Sun Wukong, Pig Bajie, and Shawujing to protect the Tang Dynasty from the West. Through the illusory world, the author's attitude towards the feudal rulers is quite interesting. In The Journey to the West, there is simply no competent emperor. If Buddhism was created by Buddhism, the monks could not be fascinated by money, but the Buddha actually acquiesced to accept bribes by his men, reflecting the dark scenes of the feudal society.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 小学时家里有一本原著，那时还不太能看懂文言文，但仍如痴如醉爱不释手，只觉得书很长，故事很精彩。如今过了十几年，再拿起来时仍然入迷，只是豁然发现这本书居然这么短，只读了两天就读完了，而且再没了原来的兴奋，却多了对大圣的悲哀，这就是长大的感觉吗？
item.text_trans: When I was in elementary school, I had a copy of the original book. I was not able to read the classical Chinese at that time, but I still felt so addicted to it. I only thought that the book was very long and the story was wonderful. Now, after more than ten years, I am still fascinated when I pick it up. I just discovered that the book is so short. I read it for two days, and I lost my original excitement, but I have more sorrow for the Great Holy Spirit. Is it the feeling of growing up?

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 网购几年才知道原来评论85个字才会有积分。所以从今天到以后，这段话走到哪里就会复制到哪里。首先要保证质量啊，东西不赖啊。不然就用别的话来评论了。不知道这样子够不够85字。谢谢老板的认真检查。东西特别好，我不是刷评论的，我是觉得东西好我才买的，你会发现我每一家都是这么写的。因为复制一下就好了。

First of all, we must guarantee the quality, and things are not bad. Otherwise, use other words to comment. I don't know if this is enough for 85 words. Thank you for your careful inspection. Things are particularly good, I am not a comment, I feel that I have bought something, I will find that every one of my family writes this. Because copying is just fine.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 买的kindle版本，整体不错。《西游记》这本小说在小说界的地位就不提了。在我看来，西游记是一本真正的修行之书。孙悟空从一个天生石猴到学艺，到大闹天宫，到保护唐僧取经，到被封斗战胜佛，是一个掺杂着痛苦与成长的过程。从整书可以看出，孙悟空在各个阶段表现的不同。孙悟空自始至终就具有慧根，在很多问题上比唐僧看得透。而且在最后阶段，相比于猪八戒，唐僧很明显更相信孙悟空。这一些细微的变化，我都觉得孙悟空是一个真正的好朋友，他求长生而得长生，是喜剧
item.text_trans: The Kindle version bought is good overall. The status of the novel "Journey to the West" in the novel world is not mentioned. In my opinion, Journey to the West is a true book of spiritual practice. From a natural stone monkey to learning art, to a big trouble to the heavenly palace, to the protection of the Tang dynasty, to the victory of the Buddha, it is a process of pain and growth. As can be seen from the whole book, Sun Wukong has different performances at various stages. Sun Wukong has Huigen from beginning to end, and it is more transparent than Tang Yan on many issues. And in the final stage, compared to the pigs, Tang Yan is obviously more confident in Sun Wukong. These subtle changes, I think that Sun Wukong is a true good friend. He wants to live for a long life and is a comedy.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 小时候很喜欢看86版的《西游记》，觉得孙悟空酷毙了！时至今日才来阅读原著书籍，对吴承恩很是敬佩，《西游记》不愧是我国四大名著之一，经典值得永流传，希望越来越多国人能重读经典。书中悟空、悟能、悟净之间的兄弟情是很深的，让人动容。当然了，沙僧也比电视剧里的话多，唐僧也不见得是那么死板。孙悟空并不是万能的，纵使是大闹天宫的齐天大圣，也还需要各路神仙、菩萨的帮助，朋友多了路好走啊！有时候，妖即是人，人有时与妖无异，我们都是有兽性的凡人，劣根性都还在，惟愿带着一颗善心行走世间。我们人啊，真的是很渺小的，弹指须臾间，都是黄粱梦。
item.text_trans: When I was a child, I liked to watch the 86th edition of "Journey to the West". I felt that Sun Wukong was cool! I have been reading the original books until now, and I admire Wu Chengen very much. "Journey to the West" is one of the four famous books in China. The classics are worthy of being passed on forever. I hope more and more people can reread the classics. The brotherhood between Wukong, Wuneng and Wujing in the book is very deep and makes people move. Of course, Satay is also more than the words in the TV series. Don Juan is not necessarily so rigid. Sun Wukong is not omnipotent. Even if it is the Qitian Dasheng of the Tiangong, it also needs the help of gods and bodhisattvas. The friends have more roads to go! Sometimes, the demon is a person, and sometimes the person is no different from the demon. We are all mortal mortals, and the inferiority is still there. Only wish to walk in the world with a kind heart. We, people, are really small, and they are all yellow and dreamy.

item.text: 西游记的电视剧刷过N多遍了，里面章节的内容基本看了开头就知道后面讲的是什么，但还是很喜欢西游记原版的味道。虽然里面的形象完全被86版西游记给固化少了想象的空间，但原版里的诗词真是太美了。
item.text_trans: The TV series of Journey to the West has been brushed N times. The contents of the chapters are basically read at the beginning to know what is going on later, but I still like the taste of the original version of Journey to the West. Although the image inside is completely cured by the 86 version of Journey to the imagination, the poetry in the original version is really beautiful.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 原来西游记是这样的，孙悟空，猪八戒，沙和尚并不是那么的可爱，他们也会是妖怪，也会变得凶残，当然也是在慢慢成长。原著颠覆了我童年的记忆，也许这才是真实，看到真正的西游记，接受现实的残忍才是长大，这也许就是孩子和大人区别。
item.text_trans: It turns out that the Journey to the West is like this. Sun Wukong, Pig Bajie, and Shahe are not so cute. They will also be monsters, they will become ferocious, and of course they will grow slowly. The original has subverted the memory of my childhood. Perhaps this is true. Seeing the true Journey to the West, accepting the cruelty of reality is to grow up. This may be the difference between a child and an adult.

item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 本来KINDLE上有一本，因为不好做笔记，所以又买了一本实体的，谁知道一对比，发现很多内容都被删掉了！简直就像吃了苍蝇一样，好恶心！比如，大战兕大王一节，对于罗汉手中金丹砂的描述就被删掉了好多！！！
item.summary_trans: Pit people! The content has been deleted!

It’s like eating a fly, so disgusting! For example, in the War of the Kings section, the description of the Golden Dan sand in the hands of Luo Han was deleted a lot! ! !

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 正因为读过两遍，没有过多纠结错字，别字，了，再读倍加速度，之前就是看个故事，图个热闹，也没有什么思想感悟，结合年代，现实生活，世上的妖魔鬼怪，魑魅魍魉，都是人心的映射，事实的缩影，都是在修炼，修行，不论是大罗神仙，还是平明百姓，抑或妖魔鬼怪。
item.text_trans: Just because I have read it twice, there is not too much typo, no words, and then read the acceleration. Before I watched a story, I was busy, and I didn’t have any thoughts. Combining the age, real life, the world’s demons and ghosts, the devil, It is the mapping of the human heart, the epitome of the facts, all of them are cultivation, practice, whether it is the god of the gods, or the people of Pingming, or the devils and ghosts.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.summary: 孩子特别喜欢的一本书
item.text: 西游记真是一本被时间忘记的热书，永远受孩子的欢迎。这本书字大，有注音，每个故事大约2页，很适合学前班的孩子练习拼音，也足够能吸引他们。
item.summary_trans: a book that children particularly like
item.text_trans: The Journey to the West is really a hot book that has been forgotten by time and is always welcomed by children. The book is large in size and has a phonetic transcription. Each story is about 2 pages. It is very suitable for children in preschool to practice pinyin and is enough to attract them.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.summary: 很喜欢的版本！纯粹一本看的书。
item.text: 这种版本正是我喜欢的。很纯粹，字体大小正好，就是平时看书的大小，不小的字，大家放心好了。不过，特别喜欢大字的就不好说了。印刷很清晰，纸张质量很好，不薄的。喜欢绘本和习惯看图看字的童鞋买的时候要考虑一下。如果就单纯看书看文字的，很好的一本书，很引人入胜，喜欢看。封面是浮雕的，很有质感的。
item.summary_trans: Very favorite version! A pure book.
item.text_trans: This version is exactly what I like. Very pure, the font size is just right, it is the size of the usual reading, not small words, everyone is relieved. However, it is hard to say that you especially like big characters. The printing is very clear, the paper quality is very good, not thin. Think about it when you want to buy picture books and children's shoes that are used to seeing pictures. If you just read a book and read a good text, it is very fascinating and likes to watch. The cover is embossed and very textured.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 我只能用妈呀来解释这本书了，通篇虽然是白话文，但是，好多字都是生僻字，现在好多字都不容易见到了，估计是古文的原因，但是读起来不是那么费劲，还不错，看完这个书，觉得语文白学了。好多字不认识。。。。！
item.text_trans: I can only use the mother to explain this book. Although it is a vernacular text, many words are uncommon words. Now many words are not easy to see. It is estimated that it is the reason of the ancient text, but it is not so hard to read. Not bad, after reading this book, I feel that the language is white. A lot of words don't know. . . . !

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.summary: 看看原著，不局限于电视剧
item.text: 在各种过度解读西游故事观点之后，终于耐下心性读了一遍原著。明白了三个徒弟并非神通广大，也是有各自对取经的理解。三徒弟中，悟空的取经之心的坚毅不输唐僧。
item.summary_trans: Look at the original, not limited to TV series
item.text_trans: After all kinds of over-interpretation of the story of the Journey to the West, I finally read the original book with the heart. I understand that the three apprentices are not supernatural, but also have their own understanding of the classics. Among the three disciples, the determination of Wukong’s heart is not lost.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 这一本书写的是孙悟空从一个石猴开始,到大闹天宫,再到和唐僧一起去西天取经,经历九九八十一难,最后取得真经的故事。
item.text_trans: This book is written by Sun Wukong from a stone monkey, to the troubled Tiangong, to go to the Western Heavens with Tang Yan, to experience the difficulties of the nine hundred and eighty-one, and finally to get the truth.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 中国影响最大的科幻作品之一，不仅读来有趣，孩子也喜欢听西游故事。
item.summary_trans: One of the four famous books
item.text_trans: One of the most influential science fiction works in China is not only interesting, but also children who like to listen to Journey to the West.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 是现在的书质量都很差还是我的错觉，这次买的几本书都一般，深刻怀疑是不是正版。岳麓书社的名著以前买过，这一本封面没有膜，看去很劣质，书脊小脏，多处纸张不平整，和大折痕现象，封二的一层贴纸直接就起来了。类似盗版。
item.text_trans: Is the quality of the books now very poor or my illusion, this time I bought a few books in general, deep doubt is not genuine. The famous book of Yuelu Bookstore has been bought before. This cover has no film. It looks very inferior, the book spine is small and dirty, many papers are not flat, and the big crease phenomenon, the layer of the second layer of the sticker directly rises. Similar to piracy.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 不愧是名著，看了好几遍电视，又重温书本。深深的被吸引，满满的回忆。只不过有个别错别字
item.text_trans: It is a famous book. I watched TV several times and revisited the book. Deeply attracted, full of memories. There are only a few typos

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 从小看电视剧，是时候看原著啦。虽然书里的各个人物形象和电视剧还是有点差别的，但是还是很喜欢。作者的想象力和文学修为真的让我敬佩。
item.text_trans: When watching TV dramas from a young age, it is time to look at the original. Although the characters and TV series in the book are still a little different, they still like it. I admire the author's imagination and literary cultivation.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 什么是经典？就是人人都知道；却感觉没怎么看过。。。西游记就是如此~~~从头再读，很多细节都很到位：不受苦中苦，难为人上人；；；；现在：吃得苦中苦，方为人上人，，意思，应该不一样吧？
item.text_trans: What is a classic? Everyone knows it; but I don’t feel it. . . This is the case with the Journey to the West~~~ Read it from the beginning, many details are in place: no hardships, hard to be a person;;;; now: bitterness in eating, partying, people, meaning, should be different ?

item.text: 如一些买家所说，确实有一些特别小的压痕，一点也不妨碍阅读，这个因为没有版权保护，本身就够便宜的了，这么一大本才十三块钱，怎么说都值了。如果说不足的话，也就是纸张比较薄一些，有诗句的段落应该和其他字体区分一下。每次从亚马逊上买书都从没有失望过，新华书店给过我太多失望。
item.summary_trans: God knows how much I like Amazon shopping.
item.text_trans: As some buyers have said, there are indeed some particularly small indentations that do not hinder reading at all. This is cheap enough because there is no copyright protection. It’s only 13 yuan for a big book. . If it is not enough, that is, the paper is thinner, and the paragraphs with verses should be distinguished from other fonts. Every time I bought a book from Amazon, I have never been disappointed. The Xinhua Bookstore has given me too much disappointment.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 很好非常推荐，极其便宜，六块钱不到，同时买了“三国演义”和"西游记"，印刷也不错，13年3月印刷的。字体清晰，内容完整，前言也就三张纸的序，不是废话感谢之类的。强力推荐购买经典。
item.text_trans: Very good, very recommended, extremely cheap, less than six dollars, while buying the "Three Kingdoms" and "Journey to the West", printing is also good, printed in March 13th. The font is clear, the content is complete, and the preface is also the order of three sheets of paper, not a nonsense thank you. It is highly recommended to buy classics.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩

item.text_trans: This is the cheapest and most affordable book I bought at Amazon. Because it is a famous book, it is always necessary to collect it. This is only suitable for general collection and reading, because after all, the version is relatively simple. If you pay attention to exquisiteness, don't shoot it. But the price is really very good and it is worth buying.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.summary: 这是我最喜欢的古典名著
item.text: 中学时曾经抱着缩印本看的如醉如痴，电视剧也是看了一遍又一遍的。现在每天忙着没时间看书，幸好有高质量的电子版本，我可以抽出空闲时间再回味一下这本书。其实不仅仅是回味这本书，也是回味过去的日子。
item.text_trans: When I was in high school, I was so drunk with a shrinking print, and the TV series was watched over and over again. I am busy every day and have no time to read books. Fortunately, there is a high quality electronic version. I can take the free time and relive the book. In fact, it is not just a recollection of this book, but also a recollection of the past.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记

item.text: 质量太差：1、纸张粗糙 2、装订不牢固 3、文字有差错
item.text_trans: The quality is too bad: 1, the paper is rough 2, the binding is not strong 3, the text is wrong

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.summary: 一个貌似简单套路的故事，却让无数人折腰……
item.text: 西游记，耳详能熟的那些套路，你甚至觉得作者在写一个大致雷同的系列剧。但是，不然。一个很好的证据是，电影拍了N多个西游记了，而且还在继续。它的道理是啥，慢慢想……
item.summary_trans: A seemingly simple routine, but let countless people bend over...
item.text_trans: Journey to the West, those who know the familiar routines, you even think that the author is writing a series of similar dramas. But not. A good piece of evidence is that the film has taken more than N Journey to the West and continues. The truth is that hey, think slowly...

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 西游记》 农业时代的小说竟然有这种想象力，经久不衰，妇孺皆知，并不比今日的魔幻小说逊色多少。只是不知这其中多少故事是作者自编，多少是总结前人传说，经传，但仅仅把各种魔幻故事编汇成一个主线故事就很了不起了。可想这书在500年前一定是家藏宝书，爱不释手。不足之处：和电视剧相比，一半故事的细节胜于电视剧，一半故事的细节还不及，看过电视再来看小说意义不太大。小说中对政治，社会，三观的隐喻和讽刺也不太显著，思想没有太多深度。评分：3.5星，很值得一读。
item.text_trans: Journey to the West The novels of the agricultural era have such imagination. They are enduring, and women and children are well known. It is no worse than today's magical novels. I just don't know how many of these stories are written by the authors. How many of them are summed up by predecessors and legends, but it is very remarkable to just compile various magical stories into one main story. I think this book must have been a treasure book for 500 years ago. Inadequacies: Compared with TV dramas, the details of half of the story are better than the TV series, and the details of half of the stories are not enough. It is not very meaningful to watch TV and then read the novel. The metaphors and satires of politics, society, and three views in the novel are not too significant, and the thoughts are not too deep. Rating: 3.5 stars, it is worth reading.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 还厉害的文言文，初学者还是买青年版的好！

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 西游记入选四大名著之一，我个人认为这是一部反神佛的经典。可以比一下格局，西游宗教，三国战争，水浒官场江湖，红楼人文，金瓶梅虐恋。西游记热热闹闹，是游记，是神怪，也是成功学。 希腊神话，圣经，都写了神，希腊神话就是伟大的，神仙有性欲有喜怒哀乐，神通广大各司其职，性格不同，共同拼凑成一个大的故事。西游记神佛不也是这样的吗？作者甚至融合了道佛几个宗教流派，有自己的组织框架
item.text_trans: Journey to the West was selected as one of the four famous books. I personally think this is a classic against the Buddha. Can be compared to the pattern, the Westward Religion, the Three Kingdoms War, the waterfront officialdom of the rivers and lakes, the red building humanities, Jin Pingmei sad love. The Journey to the West is full of fun, it is a travelogue, it is a god, it is also a successful study. Greek mythology, the Bible, all wrote God, Greek mythology is great, the gods have sexual desires, joys, sorrows and sorrows, and the magical powers are different, each with different personalities, and together they form a big story. Isn’t this the same as the Journey to the West? The author even merges several religious genres of Taoism and has its own organizational framework.

item.author: 吴承恩
item.summary: 经典的东西不一定人人都细读过
item.text: 西游记是我国四大名著之一，经典毋庸置疑。但多少人认认真真地读过啊？今天我终于算这读过的人中之一了。无论是阴谋黑暗，还是互相伤害，还是幽默风趣，还是修真论道。抑或矢志不渝，抑或平平仄仄，抑或众生无奈，抑或合于因果，都在书中读到了。人生在世，都如这书中种种，坎坎坷坷，享福受苦，欢乐悲喜，最后也就求个圆满，暂时歇一歇，歇完了还是要一路向西。
item.summary_trans: Classic things are not necessarily read by everyone.
item.text_trans: Journey to the West is one of the four famous books of China, and the classics are beyond doubt. But how many people have read it seriously? Today I finally counted one of the people I have read. Whether it is conspiracy to darkness, or mutual harm, or humorous, or comprehension. Whether it is determined or not, or whether it is flat, or the helplessness of all beings, or the cause and effect, is read in the book. Life is alive, as all kinds of books in this book, hurdles, enjoyment and suffering, joy and sorrow, and finally seek a perfect, temporarily rest, rest or go all the way to the west.

item.text_trans: One hundred times in the Westward Journey, the disputes between the three worlds, in fact, all written in the human society. With the perspectives of economics and politics, we can see the absolute truth of the checks and balances of power, and the rough road of freedom.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 本书不要钱，是最大的好处。对于一个赠送的产品，你还能有什么不切实际的要求么？最大的优点就是免费，缺点：错别字非常多。这里的多是指对于一本正版书而言，如果和盗版相比，错别字也就不多了。特别是“哪”字，在本书中基本上全部是“那”。难道原版的西游记“那”和“哪”是不分的？
item.text_trans: This book does not need money, it is the biggest advantage. Can you have any unrealistic requirements for a gifted product? The biggest advantage is free, shortcomings: very many typos. Most of the here is that for a genuine book, if compared with piracy, there are not many typos. In particular, the word "Which" is basically "that" in this book. Is the original Journey to the West "that" and "Which" is not divided?

I would rather watch the old TV series. But these are not excellent questions, and the quality of the book is good. The price is more suitable

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记

item.text: 不对不对，比我记忆中少了好多内容;比如悟空在炼丹炉里如何躲过火的描写,比如沙和尚那九个骷髅头的来历，还有孙猴子第一次杀人时，唐僧那段不明就里的贴膏药的搞笑对话，这不是完全版好失望.
item.text_trans: It’s not right, it’s a lot less than I remember; for example, how Wukong escaped the description of fire in the alchemy furnace, such as the origin of the nine gimmicks of the sand monk, and the first time the grandson killed the monkey, Tang’s unclear The funny dialogue of the plaster in the plaster, this is not a complete disappointment.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.summary: 没后台的都被一棒打死
item.text: 每当我翻开《西游记》时，总有不同的心情。它在四大名著中，是最生动活泼的，小时候的我读起它来总觉得既过瘾又有趣。但今时今日，不变的是那光怪陆离，色彩斑斓的神话世界，我的领悟却变了。这是一部所有人都爱读的经典大作，每个人都能在解读它时获取不同的感觉和启示，有人喜欢它鲜明的人物个性；有人喜欢它瑰丽的整体形象；有人喜欢它活泼诙谐的对话旁白；有人还研究它的历史背景、社会现象。但在我看来，他那曲折的情节中暗藏着人们渴望而不可及的生活理想和人性追求，那就是自由。在经历了日复一日个性受约束的日子，廿一世纪的人们都格外向往自由，向往那个自由的化身：孙悟空。孙悟空破土而出，“不伏麒麟辖，不服凤凰管，又不服人间王位所约束”，闯龙宫，闹冥司，自花果山上目在称王。可以说已经达到人性摆脱一切束缚，彻底自由的状态。孙悟空其实就是自由的化身，他的品质中最突出的就是向往自由，他始终在追求自由，它的一切斗争也是为了争取自由。这样一个鲜活的形象给予了读者一种追求自由，追逐自由的力量和勇气。 然而，每个人都明白， 在现在，即使是将来，完全的自由终究是不可能的，人始终要受到这般那般的约束。尽管包围着我们的是个受约束的世界，但我们可以让内心尽量变得广阔而幽深，让它能够无边无际、包容天地。然而，目前社会上还有许多人被一些价值不大的东西所束缚，却自得其乐，还觉得很满足。经过几百年的探索和发展，人们对物质需求已不再迫切，但对于精神自由的需求却无端被抹杀了。总之， 我认为现代人最缺乏的就是一种开阔进取， 寻找最大自由的精神。在厉尽时间锤炼的《西游记》中，竟深深蕴含着新世纪人们最渴望的自由精神……我更明白为什么它能够传承至今了。
item.summary_trans: No backstage was killed by a stick
item.text_trans: Whenever I open the Journey to the West, there is always a different mood. It is the most lively among the four famous books. When I was a child, I always thought it was both fun and interesting. But today, what remains unchanged is the mysterious, colorful mythical world, and my understanding has changed. This is a classic masterpiece that everyone loves to read. Everyone can get different feelings and revelations when interpreting it. Some people like its distinctive character personality; some people like its magnificent overall image; some people like it lively and humorous. Dialogue narration; some people also studied its historical background and social phenomena. But in my opinion, his tortuous plot hides the ideal of life and human pursuit that people are eager to reach, that is freedom. On the days when the personality is constrained day after day, the people of the 21st century are particularly yearning for freedom, longing for the embodiment of freedom: Sun Wukong. Sun Wukong broke out of the ground, "not under the jurisdiction of the unicorns, not obeying the Phoenix tube, and not obeying the human throne", the Dragon Palace, the Department of the murder, from the Huaguoshan on the king. It can be said that humanity has been freed from all constraints and completely free. Sun Wukong is actually the embodiment of freedom. The most prominent of his qualities is the yearning for freedom. He is always pursuing freedom. All his struggles are also for freedom. Such a vivid image gives the reader a power and courage to pursue freedom and chase freedom. However, everyone understands that in the present, even in the future, complete freedom is ultimately impossible, and people are always subject to such constraints. Although we are surrounded by a constrained world, we can make our hearts as broad and deep as possible, so that it can be boundless and inclusive. However, there are still many people in the society who are bound by something of little value, but they are happy and feel very satisfied. After hundreds of years of exploration and development, people's demand for material is no longer urgent, but the demand for spiritual freedom has been ruined. In short, I think that what modern people lack most is a spirit of open-mindedness and the pursuit of maximum freedom. In the "Journey to the West", which has been tempered by time, it deeply contains the spirit of freedom that people most desire in the new century... I understand why it can be passed down to this day.

item.name: 古典名著普及文库:西游记
item.author: 吴承恩
item.text: 我以前都不知道发评论可以得积分,今天才发现。不聊了。⟪西游记⟫作为四大名著,内容就不必说了,心慈手软的唐僧,火眼金睛的孙悟空,贪吃好色的猪八戒,老实忠厚的沙僧,再加上白龙马,他们上西天之间的故事简直让人爱不释手。就是电子书版的⟪西游记⟫错别字有点多,所以只能给四星。希望编辑能改正。谢谢。
item.summary_trans: Comments on the electronic version of the West Coast ⟫
item.text_trans: I didn't know before that I could get points for a comment, but I found it today. have got to go. As the four famous books, the history of the West is not to be said. The soft-hearted Tang Yan, the bright-eyed Sun Wukong, the greedy pigs, the honest and honest sand, and the white dragon horse, their story between the West and the West makes it easy. People love it. It’s just that the e-book version of Minxi’s travels is a bit erroneous, so I can only give four stars. I hope the editor can correct it. Thank you.

item.text: 所有的“回”都错成了“章”字，满书都是“章去”“轮章”。还有很多的漏字，能发现最多的是那些诗词里面少了个字，明显的前后不对仗，因为是古典白话，我估计还有很多漏字我都没发现。免费的就这质量！！！
item.text_trans: All "returns" are mistakenly made into "chapters", and full books are "chapters" and "wheels." There are still a lot of missing words. What can be found is that there are fewer words in the poems. The obvious ones are not right and wrong. Because it is a classical vernacular, I guess there are still many missing words I have not found. Free on this quality! ! !

item.name: 四大名著:三国演义(套装上下册)
item.author: 罗贯中
item.text: 这套黄色封面的三国演义下午收到。细细看了上下册。装订一般，呃印刷清晰，字迹大小适中。。。。弱点。觉得还是上册比下册的注释要详细。全本文言。对于小学生阅读还是有困难的。至于许多人说少章节我的还好没有。书纸薄！薄！薄！翻到背页可以看到前页的重影，对于纸的强迫症也是一种无奈…总体而言平常无事偶然看一看翻翻的人可以购买，作为收藏研究还是另选其他…

It is still difficult for primary school students to read. As for many people saying that there are few chapters, I am still fine. Book paper thin! thin! thin! Turning to the back page, you can see the ghost image of the previous page. It is also a helplessness for the obsessive-compulsive disorder of paper... Generally speaking, it is normal to have a chance to see if a person who flips over can buy it, as a collection study or another...

item.name: 四大名著:三国演义(套装上下册)
item.author: 罗贯中
item.text: 这套书刚在新华书店出来的时候，质量很好，可能是因为多次印刷的原因，内容的排版都不正，而且纸张也薄了，和书店刚上市的时候质量差一个档次，。顺便说说卓越，07年卓越亚马逊刚进入中国时候我就在卓越买书了，那是第一次在网上购书，而且图的就是货到付款，那时候不信任网上付款。到现在这么多年了，选择卓越的原因有3点：第一正版价格便宜；第二包装好，快递快；第三经常满钱赠书。可是这两年发现卓越也在逐渐压缩成本了，它的价格不再是网店上最便宜的。包装能用塑料袋就不用纸盒，以前我买书3本以上一般情况都会装纸箱，而且还会在盒子里放上充气塑料袋防止摔坏。现在不再有了，而且我现在买的书足够用盒子装，它也不会这样做了，只用塑料袋一装里面的书晃里晃荡的。满29元免运费也变成了满49元才免，网购现在已经很发达了，购书的选择对多数人来说也多了，最实惠的消费者才会选择，，，，，，
item.text_trans: When the book was first published in Xinhua Bookstore, the quality was very good. It may be because of multiple printing reasons, the layout of the content was not correct, and the paper was thin, and the quality of the bookstore was poor when it was first listed. By the way, excellence, when Amazon entered China in 2007, I was buying books with excellence. It was the first time I bought a book online, and the picture was cash on delivery. At that time, I did not trust online payment. So many years have passed, the reasons for choosing excellence are 3 points: the first genuine price is cheap; the second package is good, the express is fast; the third is often full of money to give books. However, in the past two years, the discovery of excellence has gradually reduced the cost, and its price is no longer the cheapest on the online store. Packing can use plastic bags instead of cartons. I used to buy more than 3 books in general, and I put paper boxes in the box to prevent them from falling. It's no longer there, and the books I buy now are enough to be packed in a box. It won't do it anymore. I just use a plastic bag to sway the book inside. Free shipping for 29 yuan has become a full 49 yuan, online shopping is now very developed, the choice of buying books is more for most people, the most affordable consumers will choose,,,,,,

item.name: 四大名著:三国演义(套装上下册)
item.author: 罗贯中
item.summary: 四大名著:三国演义(套装上下册) 人民文学出版社
item.text: 现在的书籍出版真的不好说，与我们儿时的不可同日而语。特地挑的人民文学出版社，也算是一流的出版社了。可书到手后比较失望。装订、纸质和印刷质量都极为一般化， 与出版社的名声极不相符，这就是极度追求经济利益的结果。精力全用到高档书籍上，镶金套银，赚大钱。普通大众的就请你们马马虎虎吧！
item.summary_trans: Four Masterpieces: The Romance of the Three Kingdoms (Set of Volumes) People's Literature Publishing House
item.text_trans: The publication of books today is really hard to say, and it is not the same as our childhood. The specially selected People's Literature Publishing House is also considered a first-class publishing house. I am disappointed after the book is available. Binding, paper quality and print quality are extremely general, and the reputation of the publishing house is extremely inconsistent. This is the result of extreme pursuit of economic benefits. All the energy is used in high-end books, set with gold and silver, and make big money. The general public is pleased to ask you!

item.name: 四大名著:三国演义(套装上下册)

It’s a bit of a hassle when I apply for a return, because I’ve never made a return on Amazon, I’m not familiar with the operating procedures, and I’ve been tossing for days. However, the store's attitude is very good, and finally it is handled properly. Thank you!

item.name: 四大名著:三国演义(套装上下册)
item.author: 罗贯中
item.text: 请编辑同志给提供一个建议.四大名著的版本我非常喜欢人文版的,因为它精美的印刷质量和详尽的注解是其他版本无法相比的.不过最近我又有新的发现,长春出版社最近出版了一套四大名著(无障碍读原著,注音解词释疑),它的最大特点是,在文中,凡是生僻的字句后面均有较为全面和清楚的音注和注释,而且注释的内容简洁而明了.非常适合我的阅读水平和习惯.因此,我产生犹豫.真切地希望编辑同志将这两种版本放在一起,从专业和实用的角度,帮助我比较和权衡一下.非常感谢!!
item.text_trans: Please edit the comrades to give a suggestion. I like the human version in the version of the four famous books, because its exquisite printing quality and detailed annotations are incomparable to other versions. But recently I have new discoveries, Changchun Publishing House. Recently published a set of four famous books (accessible original reading, phonetic interpretation), its biggest feature is that in the text, all the uncommon words are followed by more comprehensive and clear notes and notes, and the contents of the notes Concise and clear. It is very suitable for my reading level and habits. Therefore, I hesitate. I really hope that the editors will put these two versions together, from the professional and practical point of view, help me compare and weigh. Thank you very much! !

item.text: 书是买给孩子的，发现有几页没印上字，就联系了客服，一位名叫Li Haichun的客服处理了我的问题，不仅速度快，而且责任心极强，在他下班之前还专门发邮件告诉我一些注意事项和他的联系方式和联系时间，真的非常感谢！

item.text_trans: The book was bought for the children. When I found that there were a few pages that were not printed, I contacted the customer service. item.name: 四大名著:三国演义(套装上下册)
item.author: 罗贯中
item.text: 人文版比其他版本更被大众认可，这是老版本的重印本。与红楼梦不同，一开始就有较完整的底本，所以自五十年代以来至今没有大大的变化。有张地图挺实用，没有插图，注释也很简略，总之是较权威的老板书。希望有些精彩插图和注释。
item.text_trans: The human version is more recognized by the public than other versions, which is a reprint of the old version. Unlike the Dream of Red Mansions, there is a relatively complete foundation at the beginning, so there has been no major change since the 1950s. There is a map that is very practical, there are no illustrations, and the notes are very simple. In short, it is a more authoritative boss book. I hope some wonderful illustrations and notes.

item.name: 四大名著:三国演义(套装上下册)

item.text_trans: Originally, I wanted to buy it for my children, but I found out that the child couldn’t see it. So I read it to my child and found it. I didn’t know how to cultivate my literature. Many places I don’t understand, huh, it seems to be good. Learn the ancient texts. This version should be the classic version of the original, but it is not suitable for children to watch, it is necessary to buy children's version or vernacular version of the child, otherwise the child can not read, huh, blame yourself to learn shallow!

item.summary_trans: The book is good, the delivery is very efficient
item.text_trans: I have long heard that the four famous works of the People's Literature Publishing House have reflected very well in the market, so I want to buy a set when I have time to turn over. First buy the "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" to do an inspection, and sure enough, all aspects are not bad, in view of the price factor, can not be too demanding on the paper thin. Very satisfied with the excellent delivery, the order was placed on the evening of February 1, when the order was placed, the delivery was on the 6th, and it was delivered on the 9th; the result was shipped on the 3rd, and the book on the 5th was already available, and the efficiency was very high.

It is said that it is pirated, even if there is a binding error in the foreword, many pages are repeated. Although these prefaces do not have much meaning in themselves, it is nothing more than to educate readers with the historical materialism, but it still feels uncomfortable. I turned over a few chapters and I have not found any binding errors so far. Is there a problem with excellent purchases or human problems?

item.author: 罗贯中
item.text: 正版的，人民文学出版社的，纸张超级好，注释也很全，可以做学习的工具书。本来要求10月17日夜间送货的，但是未送，无奈打电话给客服（亚X逊这个做的超级好，用手机查询客服之后，点击“让客服联系我”，客服会主动给顾客打电话，省了电话费，呵呵），然后查询了一下跟踪包裹，就发现正在派送，联系派送师傅，师傅说午饭后送货。果然下午一点准时送来了，好重呀，因为一块儿买了四大名著，共计八册，都是正版，这个四大名著从初中还是高中时就想买了，等了20来年了，终于出手买了，四大名著原价197.00元，折后价共计133.00元（6.751折），用了10元优惠券之后123元（6.244折）。这四大名著亚马逊直销的折扣每一个都不同，《红楼梦》正价59.70，折后41.10，6.91折，《水浒传》34.8元（原价50.6元，6.91折），《西游记》29.5元（47.20元，6.21折），《三国演义》27.60元（原价39.50元，7折），网上买东西还要精打细算呀。大家看样书的话，去网上搜搜

Originally asked for delivery on the night of October 17, but did not send, but no help to call the customer service (Asia X Xun this is super good, after using the mobile phone to query customer service, click "let customer service contact me", customer service will take the initiative to give customers The phone, save the phone bill, huh, huh), and then inquired about tracking the package, found that it is being sent, contact the delivery master, the master said delivery after lunch. Sure enough, I sent it on time in the afternoon. It’s so heavy, because I bought four famous books together, a total of eight books, all of which are genuine. The four famous books wanted to buy from junior high school or high school. After waiting for 20 years, finally I bought it, the original price of the four famous books was 197.00 yuan, and the discounted price was 133.00 yuan (6.751 fold). After using the 10 yuan coupon, it was 123 yuan (6.244 fold). The discounts of these four famous Amazon direct sales are different. The price of "Dream of Red Mansions" is 59.70, 41.10, 6.91 fold, "Water Margin" 34.8 yuan (original price 50.6 yuan, 6.91 fold), "Journey to the West" 29.5 yuan (47.20 Yuan, 6.21 fold), "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" 27.60 yuan (original price 39.50 yuan, 30% off), online shopping must be carefully calculated. item.name: 四大名著:三国演义(套装上下册)
item.author: 罗贯中
item.summary: 看了三国志才发现自己一点都不喜欢三国演义
item.text: 三国演义用古白话文,不是自己喜欢的文风喜欢陈寿 三国志 的那种文风,惜墨如金,言简意赅或者是史记的那种:无韵之离骚 的文风

Fortunately, after discovering the problem, I contacted Amazon customer service in time, and waited for the processing opinions and results of the customer service to inform me. I also reminded you to buy friends and friends. Please read the book in time and hope that I would not be lucky. Ha ha......

item.name: 四大名著:三国演义(套装上下册)
item.author: 罗贯中
item.summary: 分久必合 合久必分
item.text: 《三国演义》不仅是较早的一部历史小说，而且代表着古代历史小说的最高成就。小说采用浅近的文言，明快流畅，雅俗共赏；笔法富于变化，对比映衬，旁冗侧出，波澜曲折，摇曳多姿。又以宏伟的结构，把百年左右头绪纷繁、错综复杂的事件和众多的人物组织得完整严密，叙述得有条不紊、前后呼应，彼此关联，环环紧扣，层层推进。《三国演义》的艺术成就更重要的是在战争描写和人物塑造上。小说最擅长描写战争，并能写出每次战争的特点。注意描写在具体条件下不同战略战术的运用，指导作战的主观能动性的发挥，而不把主要笔墨花在单纯的实力和武艺较量上。如官渡之战、赤壁之战、彝陵之战等，每次战争的写法也随战争特点发生变化，在写战争的同时，兼写其他活动，作为战争的前奏、余波，或者战争的辅助手段，使紧张激烈、惊心动魄力的战争表现得有张有弛，疾缓相间。如在赤壁之战前描写孙、刘两家的合作、诸葛亮、周瑜之间的矛盾，曹操的试探，孙、刘联军诱敌深入的准备等等，在人物塑造上，小说特别注意把人物放在现实斗争的尖锐矛盾中，通过各自的言行或周围环境，表现其思想性格。如曹操的奸诈，一举一动都似隐伏着阴谋诡计；张飞心直口快，无外不带有天真、莽撞的色彩；诸葛亮神机妙算，临事总可以得心应手，从容不迫。著名的关羽“温酒斩华雄”、“过五关斩六将”、张飞“威震长坂桥”、“赵云”单骑救幼主”、诸葛亮“七擒孟获”、“空城计吓退司马懿”等更是流传极广的篇章。《三国演义》虽以历史为题材，但它毕竟不是史书而是文学作品。因为它经过了艺术加工，有不少虚构。《三国演义》的艺术成就是多方面的。1.它成功地塑造了众多的人物形象。全书写了四百多人，其中主要人物都是性格鲜明、形象生动的艺术典型。各类人物各有共性；同类人物各有个性。作者描写人物，善于抓住基本特征，突出某个方面，加以夸张，并用对比、衬托的方法，使人物个性鲜明生动。这是作者塑造人物的一条基本原则。小说中运用这一原则的最好说明，就是向来人们所谓的“三绝”，即曹操的“奸绝”——奸诈过人；关羽的“义绝”——“义重如山”；孔明的“智绝”——机智过人。小说刻画人物的主要方法是：把人物放在惊心动魄的军事、政治斗争中，放在尖锐复杂的矛盾冲突中来塑造。对于主要人物，往往通过一系列的故事情节和人物语言表现其复杂的性格。2.它长于描述战争。全书共写大小战争四十多次，展现了一幕幕惊心动魄的战争场面。其中尤以官渡之战、赤壁之战、彝陵之战最为出色。对于决定三国兴亡的几次关键性的大战役，作者总是着力描写，并以人物为中心，写出战争的各个方面，如双方的战略战术、力量对比、地位转化等等，写得丰富多彩，千变万化，各具特色，充分体现了战争的复杂性和多样性；既写出了战争的激烈、紧张、惊险，而又不显得凄惨，一般具有昂扬的格调，有的还表现得从容不迫，动中有静，有张有弛。3.它的结构，既宏伟壮阔而又严密精巧。时间长达百年，人物多至数百，事件错综，头绪纷繁。而描述既要符合基本事实，又要注意艺术情节的连贯。因此，在结构的安排上是有很大困难的。可是作者却能写得井井有条，脉络分明，各回能独立成篇，全书又是一个完整的艺术整体。这主要得力于作者构思的宏伟而严密。他以蜀汉为中心，以三国的矛盾斗争为主线，来组织全书的故事情节，既写得曲折多变，而又前后连贯；既有主有从，而又主从密切配合。4.语言精练畅达，明白如话。今天看来，这种语言似乎半文不白，但在当时它却近于白话；用这种语言来写长篇小说，是一种创举，和过去某些小说粗糙芜杂的语言相比，是一个明显的进步。《三国演义》在艺术上的最大缺点，一是人物性格固定化，缺少发展变化。这可能是受了民间传说人物定型化的影响和历史材料的局限。二是想像、夸张有时不合情理。鲁迅先生说：“欲显刘备之长厚而似伪，状诸葛之多智而近妖。”这批评是很中肯的。《三国演义》是古代历史小说中成就最高、影响最大的一部作品，它广泛流传，魅力无穷，在中国文学史上和人民生活中都有着难以估量的深影响。
item.text_trans: The Romance of the Three Kingdoms is not only an earlier historical novel, but also represents the highest achievement of ancient historical novels. The novel adopts a close-knit classical Chinese language, which is bright and fluent, and enjoys both tastes and elegance. The brushwork is rich in change, contrasting against each other, sideways, sideways, swaying and swaying. With its grand structure, it has organized a series of complicated and complicated events and numerous characters in a hundred years, and the narratives are organized in an orderly manner, echoed in front and back, linked to each other, closely linked, and promoted at different levels. The artistic achievement of The Romance of the Three Kingdoms is more important in the description of war and the shaping of characters. The novel is best at describing wars and can write the characteristics of each war. Pay attention to the application of different strategies and tactics under specific conditions, and guide the subjective initiative of combat, without spending the main pen and ink on the simple strength and martial arts contest. Such as the Battle of Guandu, the Battle of Chibi, the Battle of Fuling, etc. The writing of each war also changes with the characteristics of war. While writing wars, it also writes other activities as a prelude to war, aftermath, or as an aid to war. The wars that are intense and thrilling have been shown to be relaxed and slow. For example, before the battle of Chibi, describe the cooperation between Sun and Liu, the contradiction between Zhuge Liang and Zhou Yu, the temptation of Cao Cao, the preparation of Sun and Liu Lianjun to lure the enemy, etc. In the shaping of characters, the novel pays special attention to putting characters In the sharp contradictions of the actual struggle, they express their ideological character through their words and deeds or their surroundings. Such as Cao Cao's treacherous, every move seems to conceal intrigues and tricks; Zhang Fei's heart is straightforward, nothing with innocence, slapstick color; Zhuge Liang God machine counts, the temporary can always be handy, calm and unhurried. The famous Guan Yu "Wen Jiu Hua Xiong", "Five Wu Guanjun Liu Jiang", Zhang Fei "Wei Zhen Chang Bridge", "Zhao Yun" single ride to save the young master", Zhuge Liang "Seven Meng Meng won", "empty city "Retreating Sima Yi" and so on is a very popular chapter. "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" is based on history, but it is not a history book but a literary work. Because it has been processed through art, there are many fictions. The art of "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" It is multifaceted. 1. It has successfully shaped many characters. It has written more than 400 people, among which the main characters are artistic examples with vivid characters and vivid images. All kinds of characters have commonalities; Personality. The author describes the characters, is good at grasping the basic features, highlighting certain aspects, exaggerating, and using contrasting and setting off methods to make the characters vivid and vivid. This is a basic principle of the author's shaping of characters. The best explanation is that the so-called "three musts" have always been the "sexuality" of Cao Cao - treacherous people; Guan Yu's "righteousness" - "meanings like mountains"; Kong Ming's "intelligence" "- Witness is extraordinary. The main method of portraying characters in a novel is to put characters in a thrilling military and political struggle and to shape them in sharp and complicated conflicts. For the main characters, often through a series of storylines and Character language expresses its complex character. 2. It is longer than describing war. The book has written more than forty wars, showing a thrilling war scene. Among them, the war of Guandu, the battle of Chibi, the battle of Fuling Excellent. For several key battles that determine the rise and fall of the Three Kingdoms, the author always focuses on describing and writing all aspects of the war, such as the strategic tactics, power comparison, status transformation, etc. Rich and colorful, varied and unique, fully embodies the complexity and diversity of war; it not only writes the fierceness, tension, and thrill of war, but does not appear miserable, generally has a high-spirited style, and some also perform calmly. There is silence in the movement, there is Zhang and relaxation. 3. Its structure is magnificent and rigorous and exquisite. The time is up to 100 years, the characters are many Hundreds, the events are intricate, and the clues are numerous. The description must conform to both the basic facts and the coherence of the artistic plot. Therefore, there are great difficulties in the arrangement of the structure. However, the author can write well and clearly. Each time can be independent, and the whole book is a complete art whole. This is mainly due to the grand and strict conception of the author. He focuses on the story of the conflict between the three countries and focuses on the storyline of the three countries. The twists and turns are changeable, but they are coherent; there are both masters and slaves, but the masters are closely cooperating. 4. The language is refined and understandable. Today, this language seems to be inconspicuous, but at the time it was Nearly vernacular; writing novels in this language is a kind of pioneering work. Compared with the rough and noisy language of some novels in the past, it is a clear progress. The biggest shortcoming of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms is the character. Characterization is fixed, lack of developmental changes. This may be influenced by the stereotypes of folklore characters and historical materials. Second, imagination, exaggeration and sometimes unreasonable. Mr. Lu Xun said: "I want to show Liu Chang's long and thick and pseudo-like, like Zhuge's wisdom and near demon." This criticism is very pertinent. The Romance of the Three Kingdoms is one of the most successful and influential works in ancient historical novels. It is widely spread and has a lot of charm. It has an indescribable deep influence in the history of Chinese literature and people's lives.

item.name: 四大名著:三国演义(套装上下册)
item.author: 罗贯中
item.text: 我有这个版本，是90年代印刷的，以我浊目看，其中排印错误不下3、4处，例如第032回，“夺冀州袁尚争锋 决漳河许攸献计”中“令人催取马延、张顗军来。” 多出一个“顗”字，成了“张顗顗”，还有个别地方“先主”成了“先王”。我可以肯定我的书是正版，因为是从出版社直接买的。这个版本此后多次重印，原以为会更正错误，今天在书店翻了一下最新的09年重印版，想不到10多年了居然错误依然，对人民文学出版社有些失望。实在不应该。
item.text_trans: I have this version, which was printed in the 1990s. I watched it violently. There are no more than 3 or 4 typographical errors. For example, in the 032th round, "Take the state of Yuanzhou to fight against the Xuhe River." Yan and Zhang Junjun came." There is a "顗" word that has become "Zhang Yu", and there are also some places where the "first master" has become the "first king." I can be sure that my book is genuine because it was bought directly from the publishing house. This version has been reprinted many times since then. I thought it would correct the mistake. I flipped the latest 09 reprinted version in the bookstore today. I still think that I have been wrong for more than 10 years and I am somewhat disappointed with the People's Literature Publishing House. It should not be.

item.name: 四大名著:三国演义(套装上下册)
item.author: 罗贯中
item.text: 购买古典名著版本非常重要，虽然这套书不是评注版，但从阅读角度来讲这无疑是一个很好的版本，每回都会有一些注释，正文通篇看下来会很顺畅。外表装帧古朴简约，是一个实用的好版本。另外这次借着促销买了15本书，卓越用大纸箱包装的里面还加了两个气囊以防磕碰，非常周到。
item.text_trans: Buying a classic version is very important. Although this book is not a commentary version, it is definitely a good version from a reading perspective. There will be some comments every time, and the text will be smooth throughout. The appearance of the frame is simple and simple, it is a practical and good version. In addition, I bought 15 books by promotion. I also added two airbags in the large carton to prevent bumps. It is very thoughtful.

item.name: 四大名著:三国演义(套装上下册)
item.author: 罗贯中
item.text: 相比当下各种精装版本，人民文学的版本总给人感觉很土，但其内容和注释的功夫却总是很足的。《三国演义》来源于《三国志》但基本侧重点却转移了，此小说给各世代的人提供了谋略、历史、军事等方面的营养，是经过几百年来大浪淘沙留下来的真正精品。小说行文优美，同时又很有气势，现在再没有人能写出这样好的东西了。
item.text_trans: Compared with the current hardcover versions, the version of People's Literature always feels very earthy, but the content and annotations are always very good. "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" comes from the "Three Kingdoms" but the basic focus has shifted. This novel provides the generations of people with nutrition, history, military and other aspects of nutrition. It is a true boutique that has been left behind by the big waves for hundreds of years. The novel is beautiful and at the same time very powerful. No one can write such a good thing now.

item.name: 四大名著:三国演义(套装上下册)

item.text: 这个版本我没买过，初中就看过三国演义了，三国演义不知看过多少遍，书也不知道买了几本。以前只买书，没有写评论。刚才在看三国的电视剧，看到王允离间董吕父子那段，有一个发现。正无聊着就来灌水。正所谓天下文章一般抄，就看谁抄得高明。罗贯中熟读经史，与史马迁一样“好奇”，也就是喜欢权谋。所以历史上的谋略他都信手拈来，并且也写进小说里。所以三国里的一些经典的桥断，历史上是真有其事，只是人名不对号而已。比如说王允巧施连环计，离间董卓、吕布父子二人。读过春秋左传的人，是不是觉得有点熟悉。楚平王为联合秦国，与之联姻。为儿子熊建娶妻，后来又自己娶了儿媳。鲁惠公（父）与鲁隐公（子）也是如此。
item.summary_trans: Luo Guanzhong is also a wizard
item.text_trans: I haven't bought this version. I have seen the Romance of the Three Kingdoms in junior high school. I don't know how many times I have read the romance of the Three Kingdoms. I don't know how many books I bought. I used to buy books only and didn't write reviews. Just watching the TV dramas of the Three Kingdoms, I saw a section of Wang Yun’s departure from Dong Lu and his son. Just boring, I will pour water. It is said that the article in the world is generally copied, and it depends on who is copied. Luo Guanzhong’s history of reading the classics is as curious as Shima Qiang, which is like tactics. So the historical strategy he has come to know, and also written into the novel. Therefore, some classic bridge breaks in the Three Kingdoms are true in history, but the names of people are not right. For example, Wang Yunqiao is a serialist, and Dong Zhuo and Lu Bufu and his son are separated. I have been familiar with people who have read the Spring and Autumn Annals. The king of Chuping is a joint marriage with Qin. For his son Xiong Jian's wife, he later married his daughter-in-law. The same is true of Lu Huigong (father) and Lu Yinong (child).

Mao's military thoughts The peasant class landlord class. . . . Can you analyze the three countries with the words of these boring garbage? ? ? ? item.author: 罗贯中
item.text: 本人拥有的是人文1979年出版的上下两册，共1039页，封面也和现在的这个版本一模一样，只是底色变了，79年版的是绿色．看了下价格，当时上下两本一共才2.30元，老爸说当时的2.30可以买3斤多肉了，买米都可以买20多斤了，啧啧～～也相当于现在的30多40块钱．对这个版本有特殊感情，很喜欢，里面的文字对人名，地名，官衔等都用了下划线，以便阅读，特别是对这种白话文有时候对人的称呼简之又简，有时候用官衔称呼，有时候用字称呼，加之里面人物众多，很容易看糊涂，但是该版本对此就做了处理，凡是人名，地名，官衔等都加了下划线，读起来相当方便，毕竟白话文和现代文还是有很大区别的．一直想重新买一套和79版本一样的，以为这个重版的会和以前的一样，结果太失望了，和79版的完全不一样！！！没有下划线！！太失望了！！！！
item.text_trans: I own the two volumes of the humanities published in 1979, a total of 1039 pages, the cover is exactly the same as the current version, but the background color has changed, the 79-year version is green. I watched the price. At that time, the two books were only 2.30 yuan. Dad said that 2.30 can buy 3 pounds of meat at the time. You can buy more than 20 kilograms for buying rice. 啧啧~~ is equivalent to 30 yuan and 40 yuan now. . I have a special feeling for this version, I like it very much. The text inside is underlined for people's names, place names, official titles, etc., so that I can read them. Especially for this vernacular, sometimes the name of the person is simple and simple, sometimes called by the official title. Sometimes, with the word name, plus a lot of characters inside, it is easy to see confused, but this version has dealt with this, all the names, place names, official titles, etc. are underlined, it is quite convenient to read, after all, vernacular and modern Chinese still There is a big difference. I always wanted to buy a new version like the 79 version, thinking that this re-release will be the same as before, the result is too disappointing, and the 79 version is completely different! ! ! No underline! ! Too disappointed! ! ! !

item.text: 书的布面收纳盒已裂坏，书脊两端也磕皱巴了。这倒也罢了，问题是下卷正文第一页，也就是六十一回第一页，也破裂了，这太窝心了。这么贵的书，又说是珍藏本，刚拿到手就是破损了的，这是什么感觉？退换吧？它又只是破了一页，似乎有点犯不着。不退换吧，心里确实不舒服。只好就此表示一下愤慨算了。希望店家的这种不负责任行为以后能有所改进。

The problem is that the first page of the body of the next volume, that is, the first page of the 61st, is also broken. This is too heart-warming. Such a expensive book is also said to be a treasured book. Just getting it is broken, what does it feel like? Return? It just broke a page and it seems a bit guilty. Not refunding, my heart is really uncomfortable. I have to express my indignation. I hope that this irresponsible behavior of the store can be improved in the future.

Although I couldn’t see it again in the last forty, I still have to shout: Longevity Cao Gong! If you are fortunate enough to read Bo, you will continue to study it~ Even if you don't study it, you will read it from time to time!

item.text: 看到很多评论指责纸质和印刷，我还蛮担心。拿到手之后发现其实不用担心，卓越官方的货都是正品，无论纸质还是印刷都是上乘。我也有过买到不好东西，盗版书次品书的经历，那都是在卓越的加盟商家那边贪小便宜买的。卓越官方的东西还是不错的。卓越需要好好整治加盟商家了，真的，破坏了卓越的信誉，他们在卓越上卖书，拿卓越的品牌卖的都是盗版书籍，跟盗版书点二手书店没区别。我前两天又给他们坑了立马退书。
item.summary_trans: Excellent official selling genuine. Excellent franchisees sell defective products.
item.text_trans: I am quite worried about seeing many comments accusing paper and printing. After getting the hand, I found that I don't have to worry about it. The excellent official goods are all genuine, whether it is paper or printing. I have also had the experience of buying bad things, pirated books and sub-books, which are bought at the franchise of excellent franchisees. Excellent official things are still good. Excellence needs to rectify the franchise business. Really, it destroys the excellent reputation. They sell books on excellence and sell pirated books with excellent brands. It is no different from pirated bookstores. I gave them a last two days to return the book.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)

It’s ugly and ugly, and decisive replacement. I didn't expect that the book I sent for the second time still had a problem. On the surface, when I turned it to the next volume, I found that I lost 61 or 62 times, a total of more than 30 pages. I had to have two times. Exchange, depressed. Didn't you look at it before shipment, and it is clear that there is a broken book that insists on sending it. I really don't know how to think about excellence!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 希望没有印刷错误，祈祷啊！
item.text: -------------------2009年10月11日---------------------可遇不可求的历史最低价35.00元，不抢就没啦！最经典，最权威的入门必读的红楼经典，现在是第三版，关注已久，在书店也早看到了，23次和24次印刷。但是书中前言里的“按生于甲辰说是虚岁五岁”，都错印成了“按生于甲辰说是虚岁十五岁”。乘这次历史最低价赶紧抢进，希望前言里没有印错，不然可能就不得不忍痛拒收啦！！！-------------------2009年10月13日---------------------苏州仓库发过来的，早上9点不到送货阿姨就给我打电话说到货了。包的非常严实，收货时我都没有拆开，拿到办公室之后迫不及待的打开，郁闷啊，我的书都是26次印刷了，前言这个明显的错误还没有改过来，天啊，都没人知道吗？没办法只能忍痛收下收藏，不换了！
item.summary_trans: I hope there are no typographical errors, pray!
item.text_trans: -------------------October 11, 2009--------------------- The lowest price in history is 35.00 yuan, no more than grab it! The most classic and authoritative entry to the red building classic, now the third edition, has been concerned for a long time, and has seen it in the bookstore, 23 times and 24 times. However, in the preface of the book, "By the birth of Jiachen, it is said that it is five years old at the age of zero." It is wrongly printed as "following the birth of Jiachen, it is fifteen years old." Take this historical low price and rush to grab it. I hope there is no mistake in the foreword, otherwise I may have to reluctantly refuse it! ! ! ------------------- October 13, 2009 --------------------- Suzhou warehouse sent over Yes, I didn’t deliver the aunt at 9:00 in the morning and called me to arrive. The package was very strict. I didn't open it when I received the goods. After I got the office, I couldn't wait to open it. I was depressed. My books were printed 26 times. The obvious mistake of the foreword has not been changed. Oh, no. Do people know? There is no way to endure the collection and not change it!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 想看红楼很多年，这次终于在不敷衍的情况下看完了。可能是社会阅历的关系，当自己看到王熙凤、林黛玉、薛宝钗、李纨这些人的时候，没有学生时代的那么爱憎分明了。读完之后，突然感觉好空，好空。但是仔细回味感觉好痛好痛，也好无力。
item.text_trans: I want to see the red building for many years, this time I finally finished watching it in the absence of perfunctory. It may be the relationship of social experience. When I saw Wang Xifeng, Lin Daiyu, Xue Baozhen, and Li Wei, there was no such thing as a child’s love. After reading it, I suddenly felt so empty and empty. But careful recollection feels so painful and painful.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)

item.text: 新版书外面还弄了个皮，写着李少红导演红楼梦依据唯一底本……书里还赠送一张纪念卡，纪念卡上印的还是新版红楼的剧照……对此不做评论，不喜欢的把这个扔了就好~我的就扔了……新版的已经把续本作者改为无名氏了，印刷挺好，就是封皮有横横的一道，感觉像是胶印，就是这点不太满意。内容就不用说了，人民文学的是权威版本。
item.text_trans: The new version of the book also got a skin outside, written by Li Shaohong, director of the Dream of Red Mansions, based on the only one... The book also presented a commemorative card, the commemorative card printed on the new version of the red house's stills... No comment, no like This is just thrown away~ I will throw it away... The new version has changed the author to an anonymous name. The printing is quite good, that is, the cover has a horizontal and horizontal one. It feels like offset printing, which is not satisfactory. Needless to say, the people's literature is an authoritative version.

item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 总体来说这个版本还是值得信赖的、
item.text: 买这部书的时候看了蛮多评论和推荐的、最后还是决定买人民文学这个版的、主要是老师推荐说这版比较正统，比较适合初读白话版的人，还有学生、卓越配送一直是超级棒的，昨天订今天到，很中规中矩的书，外侧还有塑胶包起来，两本上下加起来比字典厚实、至于前面大家都说到的纸张问题，不影响阅读，但确实有点薄，一般阅读这个厚度已经可以了

The main reason is that the teacher recommended that this version is more orthodox. It is more suitable for people who are reading the white version, as well as students and excellent distribution. It has always been awesome. Yesterday I booked today. It is a very law-abiding book. There are plastic wraps on the outside. The two books are thicker and thicker than the dictionary. As for the paper problems that everyone mentioned before, it does not affect reading, but it is a bit thin. Generally speaking, this thickness is already ok.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 详细说来：1.印刷质量很好呀。说印刷质量不好的那只能说他太挑剔。字体、大小、排版、油墨用量都很不错，我已经满意了。2.用的纸张不是很好，像是盗版书籍的用纸，透着一股怪味，不知道时间久了会不会散掉。而且至的切面很显粗糙，跟其他的正版书整齐却又有纹理的切面真是没法儿比。整个书的侧面看来就像一块木板那样，纸张间丝毫没有纹理感。但好歹印刷还不错，算是有点补偿纸张的劣势了。3.书脊太单薄，那么厚的书，看到最后，我估计书脊会折掉甚至会脱页。其实经典著作大家也不是很在意多掏几块钱，你把书脊做的厚实一点照样会有顾客买单。4.综合评价是物有所值但提升空间还很大。
item.text_trans: In detail: 1. The printing quality is very good. Saying that printing quality is not good can only say that he is too picky. The font, size, typesetting, and ink usage are very good, I am already satisfied. 2. The paper used is not very good, like the paper of pirated books, revealing a strange smell, I don’t know if it will be scattered for a long time. And the cut surface is very rough, and the neat but textured cuts of other genuine books are really incomparable. The side of the book looks like a piece of wood, and there is no texture between the papers. But good printing is not bad, it is a bit of a disadvantage to compensate for paper. 3. The spine is too thin, so thick book, seeing the end, I estimate that the spine will fold off or even off the page. In fact, everyone in the classic works is not very concerned about how many dollars, you will pay a lot of the spine. 4. The comprehensive evaluation is value for money but the room for improvement is still very large.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
