It seems to be squeezed or dropped during the transportation. The paper in the book is generally spoken, but it is acceptable, but most of the pages printed are twisted, like piracy. My book was printed 22nd in March 2008 by Beijing Xinwei Printing Factory. I hope that Joyo.com will strictly adhere to the system in the future, and urge the couriers to treat the goods well, otherwise it will definitely affect the business for a long time!

In the future, if you have ample money, you will want an old-fashioned traditional vertical typesetting. There is a sense of simplicity in the book of the 1980s. I have seen a plan attached to the Grand View Garden in the past. I don’t know which one came out, and if so, I also collected it.

item.text: 上世纪八十年代一套4本的人民文学出版社的《红楼梦》太旧了。买一套新版上下两册的《红楼梦》，更新。闲时翻翻，温故而知新，不亦乐乎！
item.text_trans: In the 1980s, a set of four People's Literature Publishing House's "Dream of Red Mansions" was too old. Buy a new version of the "Red Mansion Dream" of the next two volumes, update. When you are free to turn over, you will know the new and warm, and you will be happy!

item.summary_trans: The package is improved, the book is not damaged
item.text_trans: Just received the parcel, this time Amazon gave me a full touch - courier is packaged with a brand new green box and built-in shockproof bag! Compared with a white plastic bag in the past, I was really touched. The book looks like no problem, praise one!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)

item.text: 一直渴望拜读《红楼梦》，这版书纸质不错，解说详细，可惜封皮的纸质不够厚，书角容易折损。书本倒是很厚，需要慢慢品读，有耐心和兴趣的朋友可以选择。
item.text_trans: Has been eager to read "Dream of Red Mansions", this version of the book is good paper, detailed explanation, but unfortunately the paper of the cover is not thick enough, the book corner is easy to break. The book is very thick and needs to be read slowly. Friends who have patience and interest can choose.

item.text: 在其他购书网站找了此版本的《红楼梦》，均显示缺货状态。后来偶然在卓越上看到它，很心动，马上就下了订单。令人吃惊的是，第二天早上就送过来了，没有一点损伤的痕迹。（平装本，当时有些担忧会不会在运输途中被弄伤）。当然，价格也不错。
item.text_trans: I found this version of "Dream of Red Mansions" on other book-purchasing websites, all of which showed out of stock status. Later, I saw it by chance. I was very excited and immediately placed an order. Surprisingly, I sent it the next morning without any trace of damage. (Paperback, there were some concerns at the time whether it would be injured in transit). Of course, the price is not bad.

item.text: 之前看了评价，说纸质不好啊什么的，心里还有些担心。不过，事实证明我的选择是对的：书质量还不错，封面也比我想象中的厚实多了，也没有发现缺页或多页什么的。我们学校图书馆就有之前的旧版的，相信人民文学和红学研究所了。这应该是最新版的（2010年9月第33次印刷）。在卓越买了十几本书了，感觉都很好，继续支持~~~
item.summary_trans: Good value for money, worth having
item.text_trans: I read the evaluation before, saying that the paper is not good, and I still have some concerns. However, it turns out that my choice is correct: the quality of the book is not bad, the cover is much thicker than I thought, and I have not found any missing pages or multiple pages. Our school library has an old version of the previous one, and I believe in the People's Literature and Red Studies Institute. This should be the latest version (33rd print in September 2010). I bought more than a dozen books in excellence, I feel very good, continue to support ~~~

The collection of a set of People's Literature Publishing House in the 73-year version of the home is a vertical line of traditional characters, watching laborious. This version is good, the fly in the ointment is only divided into two volumes, each volume is too thick, the original four volumes of a set of thickness is just right.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这本书我绝对是要打五星的。到手的时候拆看一看，除了封面不是图片那样大红，质感还是相当不错的。随意翻看了一下，没有什么缺页的情况。纸张也很有质感啊。我买之前也来看了很多评论，很多人说纸张很薄可以看得到背面的字。这纯属扯淡啊。或许是我们买的不同？以前一直想买一本红楼梦的，但是价格都是非常之贵。现在买到这样一本物美价廉的书，实在是喜悦至极啊。
item.text_trans: I definitely want to play five stars in this book. When you get it, take a look and see, except that the cover is not as red as the picture, the texture is quite good. Feel free to look at it, there is no shortage of pages. Paper is also very textured. I also read a lot of comments before I bought it. Many people said that the paper is very thin and you can see the words on the back. This is purely nonsense. Maybe we bought differently? I always wanted to buy a Dream of Red Mansions, but the price is very expensive. It is really a joy to buy such a cheap book now.

item.text: 批注的还算详细。只是出版社的纸质叫我很难不失望，薄又黄，手感摸上去粗糙，且有沙子似的不舒服感，看久了整个手都不爽利。还说什么送人佳品，我觉得根本送不出手，自己看看到是无所谓了~~~

It’s just that the paper of the publishing house makes it difficult for me to be disappointed, thin and yellow, feels rough and feels like sand, and I feel uncomfortable with the sand. I also said that I would give you a good product. I don’t think I can afford it. I don’t care if I look at it~~~

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 1.对封面、装订、纸张、印刷都非常满意，正版无疑！2.红研所的这本《红楼梦》在精心汇较古本的基础上选定文字，较以程乙本为基础的通行本有所不同，版本优良，且注释颇详，入门的读者非常适合（尤其是第一次阅读的读者）。3.厦门的物流，福建飞远，太给力了，速度快，态度好！综上，给5颗星。
item.text_trans: 1. Very satisfied with the cover, binding, paper, printing, genuine no doubt! 2. The Red Dream of Red Research Institute selected the text on the basis of carefully comparing the ancient books. The version based on Cheng Yiben is different. The version is excellent and the notes are quite detailed. The readers are very suitable (especially It is the first reader to read). 3. Xiamen's logistics, Fujian Feiyuan, too powerful, fast, good attitude! In summary, give 5 stars.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 》为中国古典文学读本丛书。《红楼梦》是一部具有高度思想性和高度艺术性的伟大作品，从《红楼梦》反映的思想倾向来看，作者具有初步的民主主义思想，他对现实社会包括宫廷及官场的黑暗，封建贵族阶级及其家庭的腐朽，封建的科举制度、婚姻制度、奴婢制度、等级
item.text: 》为中国古典文学读本丛书。《红楼梦》是一部具有高度思想性和高度艺术性的伟大作品，从《红楼梦》反映的思想倾向来看，作者具有初步的民主主义思想，他对现实社会包括宫廷及官场的黑暗，封建贵族阶级及其家庭的腐朽，封建的科举制度、婚姻制度、奴婢制度、等级
item.summary_trans: 》 is a series of books on Chinese classical literature. "Dream of Red Mansions" is a great work with high ideological and highly artistic significance. From the perspective of the ideological tendency reflected in "Dream of Red Mansions", the author has preliminary democratic ideas. His darkness to the real society, including the court and officialdom, the feudal aristocratic class and The decay of the family, the feudal imperial examination system, the marriage system, the slave system, the rank
item.text_trans: 》 is a series of books on Chinese classical literature. "Dream of Red Mansions" is a great work with high ideological and highly artistic significance. From the perspective of the ideological tendency reflected in "Dream of Red Mansions", the author has preliminary democratic ideas. His darkness to the real society, including the court and officialdom, the feudal aristocratic class and The decay of the family, the feudal imperial examination system, the marriage system, the slave system, the rank

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这套书在中国名著中是孩子最喜欢的，一开始看不懂，人物关系太复杂，后来百看不厌。
item.text_trans: This set of books is the favorite of children in Chinese classics. At first, I couldn't understand them. The relationship between characters was too complicated.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 买之前看有的买家说纸太薄，就这点我个人觉得，不见得纸厚就好。很多垃圾书没有那么多内容，一是靠字体大，二是靠纸张厚充数。更不要提盗版书了，纸厚的可以当纸板了。再者这本书分上下两册，每册差不多有3厘米厚，如果采用厚的纸，估计得分三册，厚度还要比这个厚。价格嘛。。。估计也要不知道加上多少钱了~内容上，我也没看过啥大部头的书。觉得这本挺好，很多不好认的字、词都有备注解释，一些典故也有。一些语句、内容涉及各个版本的差异也有提及。总之这本真的不错！！！
item.text_trans: Before I bought some buyers, I said that the paper was too thin. I personally felt that it was not necessarily paper thick. A lot of junk books don't have so much content. One is because the font size is big, and the other is because the paper is thick and full. Not to mention pirated books, paper can be used as cardboard. In addition, this book is divided into two volumes, each of which is almost 3 cm thick. If thick paper is used, it is estimated that the score is three, and the thickness is thicker than this. The price is good. . . I don’t know how much to add. I haven’t read the book in the content. I feel that this book is quite good. Many uncomfortable words and words have remarks and explanations, and some allusions are also available. Some statements, content related to the differences between the versions are also mentioned. In short, this is really good! ! !

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 两册有点太厚了！三册可能比较合适！
item.text: 记得小时候读的《红楼梦》分三册，握在手较舒服，如此厚重的书及内容，只分成两册有点太厚了！三册可能比较合适！
item.summary_trans: The two volumes are a bit too thick! Three volumes may be more appropriate!
item.text_trans: I remember that when I was a child, I read "Dream of Red Mansions" in three volumes. It is more comfortable to hold in my hand. Such a thick book and content is only a little too thick in two volumes! Three volumes may be more appropriate!

item.summary: 封面和里面咋不一样啊
item.summary_trans: The cover is different from the inside.

item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 发现上册中存在缺页，从644页直接到了675页，第四十八回的后半部分 到 第五十回的前半部分都没有了。
item.text_trans: It was found that there were missing pages in the first volume, from 644 pages to 675 pages, and the second half of the forty-eighth to the first half of the fifty-first.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 拿到只看了两回，先来评论。人文版作为入门级读者看还是非常好的，中规中矩，排版清晰。印刷质量尚可，只做学习不做收藏的话，足够了。

item.text_trans: I only saw it twice, first comment. As a entry-level reader, the Humanities Edition is still very good, with a good standard and clear layout. The quality of the print is acceptable. It is enough to just learn not to collect.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 之前想买《脂砚斋批评本红楼梦》，因为没货，又比较急，就选择了这本。总体而言是比较满意的。以前只读过一遍《红楼梦》，对版本也不是特别了解，作为初读者而言，我认为这个版本还是很不错的。注释比较详细，而且采用页下注，便于翻阅。对于各个版本有不同的地方，每一回的后面也会做出注释，并说明版本的选择，对于我这个对红楼版本一无所知的人来说有很大的帮助。唯一不足的是书会比较厚，携带起来会比较不方便。总体很满意。
item.text_trans: I wanted to buy "Liu Zhaizhai criticized this Red Mansion Dream" before, because I was out of stock and more anxious, I chose this one. Overall it is quite satisfactory. I have read the "Dream of Red Mansions" in the past, and I don't know the version very much. As a first-time reader, I think this version is still very good. The notes are more detailed and are paged for easy reading. There are different places for each version, and comments will be made later each time, and the choice of version will be of great help to anyone who knows nothing about the Red House version. The only downside is that the book will be thicker and more inconvenient to carry. Overall very satisfied.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 听说是目前最权威的版本才买的，就内容而言还是不错的，可是纸张太薄了，能看到背面的字了，而且一页平滑一页粗糙。 这套书分为上下两册 每册块头很大捧在手上一下子就受不了，看起来很不方便，建议分多册！！价格这么贵纸张却这么差，人民文学出版社越来越差劲。
item.text_trans: I heard that it is the most authoritative version of the current purchase, it is good in terms of content, but the paper is too thin, you can see the words on the back, and the page is smooth and rough. This set of books is divided into two volumes. Each of the books is very big. It can't stand it in one hand. It looks very inconvenient. It is recommended to divide multiple books! ! The price is so expensive, the paper is so bad, and the People's Literature Publishing House is getting worse.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 发货很给力的,当天订,晚上6点多就到的,不过刚好那时候被电信停机,所以没收到,等第二天上网查看跟踪后才知道原来昨晚就来货了.然后包装很给力啊,还怕会书脊损坏什么的,结果里面竟然有两个气囊隔着,完好无损啊.恩,然后书的纸张还行,字也够大,不会很小,也不会像盗版的那样粗糙.内容嘛,我也没有读过书本的西游记和红楼梦,所以不知道跟原著比怎样,反正有注释的,大体也浏览下,也没发现什么错别字.有点遗憾的就是书脊是用胶的,虽然质量还可以,感觉可以用个6,7年的,但总怕用着用着就突然两半了....不过冲着发货速度,包装,书本质量,仍然给满分啊....
item.text_trans: Delivery is very strong, set the same day, arrived at 6 o'clock in the evening, but just stopped by telecommunications at that time, so did not receive, waited for the next day to check the tracking after the Internet, I realized that it came to the goods last night. Then the packaging is very To force, I am afraid that the spine will be damaged. As a result, there are actually two airbags separated. It is intact. Well, then the paper is ok, the words are big enough, not too small, and not like pirated It’s so rough. Content, I haven’t read the book’s Journey to the West and the Dream of Red Mansions, so I don’t know how it compares with the original. Anyway, there are notes, and I’ve also browsed it, and I haven’t found any typos. It’s a pity that the spine is glued. Although the quality is OK, I feel that I can use it for a period of 6 or 7 years, but I am always afraid of using it for two and a half....but for the delivery speed, packaging, book quality, still give full marks.. ..

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 外包装完好无损，书本装订的太差了。上册的1/5处竟然会有一个大裂缝，太不可思议了，网上的书皮颜色近似橘红，实际书皮的颜色是棕色。难道是盗版书？我是老客户这是我第一次遇上这个问题，太让我失望了。
item.text_trans: The outer packaging is intact, and the book binding is too bad. There is a big crack in the 1/5 of the book, which is incredible. The color of the book cover on the Internet is similar to orange, and the color of the actual book cover is brown. Is it a pirated book? I am an old customer. This is the first time I have encountered this problem. I am too disappointed.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 一部红楼史 多少辛酸泪
item.text: 一直就想买一部红楼梦，看到网上有各种各样的版本，总是犹豫不决。我大学的班导对红楼梦很有研究，我曾问过她，她推荐给我人民文学出版社2000版的，这个版本内容详细 也配有插图。想细细品读的朋友可以买这个版本的
item.summary_trans: A history of a red building, how many bitter tears
item.text_trans: I always wanted to buy a Dream of Red Mansions. I saw that there were various versions on the Internet and I was always hesitant. My university class guide has a lot of research on the Dream of Red Mansions. I once asked her, she recommended it to the People's Literature Publishing House 2000 edition. The content of this edition is also detailed with illustrations. Friends who want to read carefully can buy this version.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这本书是标准版红楼梦了，修订和校注以及注释全都很清楚，许多大家当的顾问，水平非常平均的，读红楼梦的必备及入门。我拿到的质量还是不错的，纸质也不像别人说的那么薄，只是第一本的角角在储藏的时候有点压到，是买书经常会遇到的情况。还是推荐买的
item.text_trans: This book is a standard version of the Dream of Red Mansions. The revisions and school notes and notes are all very clear. Many of the consultants are very average, and the essentials and entry for reading the Dream of Red Mansions. The quality I got was good, the paper was not as thin as others said, but the corner of the first book was a little pressed when it was stored, which is often the case when buying books. Still recommended to buy

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 第一册的220页有部分正文和注释没印出来，一大片空白下来。看着就火，严重怀疑此书是盗版。
item.text_trans: Some of the main texts and notes on page 220 of the first volume were not printed, and a large blank was blank. Looking at the fire, seriously suspected that the book is pirated.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 小时候就看着八七版的红楼发痴，心想怎么这里这么多漂亮的姐姐呀，每天住在如画的大观园里吟诗作对，生活好不悠然，羡慕的紧那。几年前买过一本红楼，但是厚厚的一大本有点难以下咽的感觉，此次红楼选秀又激起了曾经的热情，特别是其中的春晓，仿佛让我看到了一个书中描写的黛玉活脱脱的跳了出来，就那样恬淡的笑着述说自己心中的黛玉，让人钦慕。于是就来搜罗一本带注解的红楼，希望在这梦中自己也能进得那园子里去。期待...
item.text_trans: When I was a child, I watched the red building of the August 7th Edition. I thought how many beautiful sisters here, living in the picturesque Grand View Garden every day, the poetry is right, life is not leisurely, envy of the tight. I bought a red building a few years ago, but the thick one is a bit difficult to swallow. The red building draft has aroused the enthusiasm of the past, especially the Chunxiao, which seems to let me see a book description. The jade jade jumped out of the way, and told the jade in his heart with such a bleak smile, which made people admire. So I came to collect an annotated red building, hoping that I could enter the garden in this dream. look forward to...

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 感觉良好，性价比还可以。
item.text: 两本书送来的时候没有其他的书那样有包裹着，不过还好没有弄皱和破损，顺手翻了一下，字体很清晰，看起来大小刚刚好，不会给人密密麻麻看不下去的感觉，里面的注解也可以，没细看，感觉应该会对阅读起到很大的帮助。纸质还可以，买之前看评论的时候很害怕，说书的本身会裂成两半，但买来的时候特意将书打开尺度大一点，没有裂开的现象。不过我觉得如果翻太开时间久的话可能也会裂开的，因为那些胶不均匀也很薄，纸张的剪裁也一般般，虽然不会很粗糙，只有第一本的下端微略粗糙而已，总体感觉还是可以的，忽略这些细节的话，真的不错。
item.summary_trans: Feeling good, the price is OK.
item.text_trans: When the two books were sent, they were not wrapped in other books, but fortunately, they were not crumpled and damaged. They turned over and the font was very clear. It looked just like the size, and it would not give people a sense of incomprehensibility. The comments inside can also be, without looking at it, I feel that it should be a great help to reading. The paper is OK. I was scared when I read the comments before I bought it. The book itself would split into two halves, but when I bought it, I opened the book a little bigger and there was no cracking. However, I feel that if it is turned too long, it may crack, because the glue is uneven and thin, and the paper is cut as usual. Although it is not very rough, only the lower end of the first one is slightly rough. The overall feeling is still ok, and ignoring these details is really good.

item.text_trans: People's literature paperback is very high cost-effective, and the notes have a depth, which is conducive to understanding the article - although it is different from some of the labels of the hundreds of forums, but the benevolent sees benevolence. Binding printed paper has no choice, it is absolutely suitable for collection. It is a pity that the books of the People's Literature Publishing House, which are excellently sold, are getting fewer and fewer, and they have all been replaced by publications of some less authoritative publishers. Please don't just consider making money, but the brand is the most terrible!

If you are a person who does not like books, the iron book You can also discount, the version is the best in China at present! ! !

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这是比较经典的《红楼梦》版本。看过1982版后，就很期待修订后的新版。注释详尽、校勘精确是这个版本的特色。注释详尽使人在阅读小说时同时增长了中国古代典章故实、服饰陈设、建筑、文化艺术、医药占卜等知识，陶冶了情操。校勘精确使小说更接近于作品所要表达的艺术境界。因此这个不断与时俱进的版本值得仔细阅读和拥有。
item.text_trans: This is a more classic version of "Dream of Red Mansions". After reading the 1982 version, I am looking forward to the revised new version. Detailed notes and accurate collation are featured in this version. The detailed explanation makes people increase the knowledge of ancient Chinese classics, costumes, architecture, culture and art, medicine and divination while reading novels, and cultivates sentiment. Accuracy makes the novel closer to the artistic realm that the work is to express. So this constantly up-to-date version deserves careful reading and ownership.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 整本都读过，现在买来，翻翻里面的诗句
item.text_trans: I have read the whole book, buy it now, and flip through the verses inside.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这个是红楼梦的权威版本, 红学所校订的.两本, 挺厚, 书不大.这是以庚辰本为底稿校订的, 八十回后按的是程甲本.应该说可读性和学术性都很不错.
item.text_trans: This is the authoritative version of Dream of Red Mansions. The two books are very thick and the book is not big. This is based on the Gengchen book. After 80 times, it is Cheng Jiaben. It should be said that it is readable and academic. Very good.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 红楼梦注释很详尽，看的爱不释手啊，终于能一睹真容了，结局提早看了一下，确实是很悲剧，作者文采也很不错
item.text_trans: The notes on the Dream of Red Mansions are very detailed. I can’t let go of it. I can finally see it. I’ve seen it early. It’s really a tragedy. The author is also very good.

item.text_trans: I really like this version, I have a set, and the quality is no problem. This was originally intended to be given to a friend who thought to be precious. After telling her, she said that she did not like it, thank you. ……How to say……?

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)

(It is best to engage in activities, the principle of small profits but quick turnover should be understood), thank you!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 很不错呀，装订没有其他评论那么差呀
item.text: 我第一次看红楼梦，所以不知道所谓的甲戊本之类的其他版本，也无法跟其他版本比较。但是就这本书来说，书页底下的解释很认真很详细，许多生僻字都有注音。每一节的最后，还有说明各个版本的不同之处。装订的话，我觉得挺好的。
item.summary_trans: Very good, binding is not as bad as other comments.
item.text_trans: I first watched the Dream of Red Mansions, so I don't know the other versions of the so-called A-Ben, and I can't compare them with other versions. But as far as this book is concerned, the explanations under the pages are very serious and detailed, and many uncommon words have phonetic transcriptions. At the end of each section, there are also differences between the various versions. I feel very good when binding.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)

item.text: 这个说实话是我读过的最有学术气息的红楼梦了。她把各版本的红楼梦的对照都标注了出来，看得出是花了巨大的心思的。值得收藏！
item.text_trans: This telling the truth is the most academic Dream of Red Mansions I have ever read. She marked out the comparisons of the various versions of the Dream of Red Mansions and saw that it took a lot of thought. worth collecting!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)

item.text: 打开塑封，很失望，一是排版，页边距间隙太大，排版不紧凑；二是印刷有问题，上册的1064页，有重影；三是诗歌部分用其他字体，效果可能会更好。综上所述，近40块买这套书，窃以为不值，虽然有注释，但仍不值得推荐。
item.text_trans: Opening the plastic seal, very disappointing, one is typesetting, the margin of the margin is too large, the layout is not compact; the second is the printing problem, the 1064 pages of the book, there is a ghost; the third is the use of other fonts in the poetry, the effect may be better. In summary, nearly 40 buy this set of books, stealing is not worth it, although there are notes, it is still not worth recommending.

item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 东西不错，速度很快，正版，印刷质量很好。唯一的遗憾是原来可以参加满100返30的活动，没注意结果掏了定价，等于贵了30。建议亚马逊在确认订单时增加提示优惠功能，要不对于马虎的人来说，那些优惠都没看到，也就享受不到了……对书本身没得说，很好！

I didn’t pay attention to the result and priced the price, which is equal to 30. It is recommended that Amazon add a hint offer function when confirming the order, or for those who are sloppy, those offers are not seen, and they can't enjoy it... There is nothing to say about the book itself, very good!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这还用评论吗，中国人必读的。

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 注解真的很一般，有些完全不需要注解的成语也特意拿出来解释，真正需要注释的却没有，编者是不是水平太差了。而且最无法忍受的是编辑在注释里面的剧透，透露剧情太可恶了。差评是给编者和出版社的
item.text_trans: The annotations are really general. Some idioms that do not need annotations are also deliberately explained. The ones that really need annotations are not. The editors are not too bad. And the most unbearable is the spoiler in the comments, revealing that the plot is too odious. Bad reviews are given to editors and publishers.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 虽然是32开的书但是用起来却非常舒服
item.text: 纸张非常好！，一共两本近1700页；是2010年7月第31次印刷的！第一版是在1982年3月北京印刷的！里面还含有一些基本的注解！对于我们这种第一次看的人还是很不错的哦！
item.summary_trans: Although it is a 32-open book, it is very comfortable to use.
item.text_trans: The paper is very good! A total of nearly 1,700 pages; the 31st print in July 2010! The first edition was printed in Beijing in March 1982! It also contains some basic annotations! For those of us who are looking at this for the first time, it is still very good!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 这个是新版的，作者是曹雪芹和无名氏
item.text: 昨天拿到这本书的，还送了一张新版电视剧红楼梦的纪念卡片。书的质量很好，字迹清楚，虽然是简装的，但是比较精致。书是两本，差不多厚度，有注解，个人比较喜欢。

item.text_trans: The comments are very good! Not a fat batch, a combination of several versions, after reading the editor seems to be very good, satisfied! Words and line spacing are also very moderate, looking more comfortable than others!

item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 最早读红楼是四册一套的程乙本（57年版）。这套是82年庚辰本。书印的很规整，物流也好，没有破损。就是书有点厚，拿和读都不太舒服，如果是3册或4册一套就更好了。打了这么多折下来，性价比比较高。
item.text_trans: The earliest reading of the Red House is a set of four copies of Cheng Yiben (57-year edition). This set is the 82-year-old Gengchen. The book is printed very neatly, the logistics is good, and there is no damage. The book is a bit thick, and it is not very comfortable to take and read. If it is 3 or 4 sets, it is better. After playing so many folds, the price is relatively high.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 对比之前在书店买的原书而言，这本总感觉是盗版。原书封面颜色红得很正，这本封面的红色则显得浅多了。纸张也不是很好，书页另一面的字都能看得到明显的痕迹。还有也不知道为什么，寄来的书书脊上胶水印多不说，上面白白的一大块，擦好久。书脊还有点浓破了的样子。这次感觉卓越好差劲！！
item.text_trans: Compared to the original book bought in the bookstore, this is always a piracy. The color of the cover of the original book is very red, and the red color of the cover is much lighter. The paper is not very good, and the words on the other side of the page can be seen with obvious marks. I don't know why, the letter on the ridge of the book is not covered with a lot of watermarks. It has been rubbed for a long time. The spine is still a bit thick. This time I feel great and bad! !

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 一直以来，想读红楼梦，买了这个版本的作为入门，1月1日下的单，5日拿到的书，两大本，1600多页，拿在手中很厚实。大概的翻了翻，是2010年9月第33次印刷的，正文下配有注释，很适合我这种初次阅读的读者，印刷的还是很清楚的，纸张有些薄，略微偏黄一些，没有想象中的白，可能和纸质有关，但整体来看还是很满意的。
item.text_trans: I have always wanted to read the Dream of Red Mansions. I bought this version as an entry point. The book that was placed on January 1st, the book I got on the 5th, two books, more than 1600 pages, is very thick in my hand. Probably turned over, it was printed for the 33rd time in September 2010. The text is accompanied by a comment, which is very suitable for my first reading reader. The printing is still very clear. The paper is a little thin, slightly yellowish, no The imaginary white may be related to paper, but overall it is still very satisfactory.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 10年前买过1983年人民文学出版社的这部红楼梦，后来因为各种原因丢了其中一册。看到这里有，立刻就购买了一本。从前的图书，看起来感觉很熟悉和安定。书的质量还可以，就是纸质有点薄，不如从前啊。不过，多年以来的好书，这个价格，非常值得了！
item.text_trans: I bought this Dream of Red Mansions from the People's Literature Publishing House in 1983 10 years ago, and later lost one of them for various reasons. I saw it here and I bought it immediately. The former books seem to feel familiar and stable. The quality of the book is OK, that is, the paper is a bit thin, not as good as it used to be. However, for many years of good books, this price is very worth it!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 我买的是2010年7月第31次印刷的。有校记，有注释，适合普通读者阅读。我买了一套送给别人，自己留一套。喜欢脂批的，可买漓江出版社周汝昌的校本，比较专业。

The above is the original text, and the following is the comment. In short, I liked the Dream of Red Mansions. But the cover needs to be strengthened!

item.text_trans: Really classic! Every word is so elegant, the article is so beautiful. But the author is "a bitter tear" after all, but really admire Cao Gong! A good book is really a must read for the people of China.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: Kindle版贵达17.5不说，排版极差！注解跟内容是混杂在一起的，比如“再者，市井俗人喜看理治之书理治之书——关于理政治国的书。者甚少，爱看适趣闲文者特多。”看到了吧？两个“理治之书”在一起，后面跟个注解。从字体上完全没有任何的标识，根本看不出来。都是这种小段我也忍了，问题是：“因毫不干涉时世，方从头至尾抄录回来，问世传奇。因空见色，由色生情，传情入色，自色悟空“因空见色”四句——作者借佛家“色空”之言，说出自己的创作过程和感受。大意说，由于幻灭，才想见当年的繁华（因空见色）；从回忆繁华景象而产生激情（由色生情）；再把激情传入“备记风月繁华之盛”的小说（传情入色）；又从记述风月繁华中悟到人生终究是一场梦（自色悟空）。现在出版的很多排印本，都在这四句前加上“从此，空空道人”等字作主语，这是据程高本后增的文字，这些字现存的各种脂评本都没有。但列藏本在四句之后，有“空空道人”主语，这是对的，今从之。空空道人遂易名为情僧，改《石头记》为《情僧录》。至吴玉峰题曰《红楼梦》至吴玉峰题曰《红楼梦》——此句诸本皆无，仅见于甲戌本。”请告诉我，哪个是原文？哪个是注解？完全疯掉。
item.text_trans: The Kindle version of Guida 17.5 does not say, the typesetting is very poor! The annotations are mixed with the content, such as "Furthermore, the market vulgar people like to read the book of the rule of law - the book about the political state. Very few, love to see the interesting and interesting people." Right? Two "Books of the Rule of Justice" are together, followed by an annotation. There is absolutely no logo from the font, and I can't see it at all. I have tolerated this kind of subparagraph. The question is: "Because there is no interference in the world, the party will transcribe it from beginning to end, and come out with legends. Because of the emptiness of the sky, the emotions of the color, the emotions, the color of the Wukong "cause Four words: The author uses the words of "color and space" of Buddhism to express his own creative process and feelings. In general, because of disillusionment, he wants to see the prosperity of the year (seeing the sky); And the generation of passion (by the color of love); then the passion into the "remarks of the prosperous and prosperous" of the novel (transmission into the color); from the description of the prosperous life of the wind to realize that life is a dream after all (self-color Wukong) Many of the typographical books published now include the words "from now on, empty people" as the subject before these four sentences. This is the text that has been added according to Cheng Gaoben. There are no existing fat reviews in these words. After the Tibetan sentence is four sentences, there is the subject of "empty airway people". This is correct, and it is now. The empty airway people are easily named as love, and the "stone record" is changed to "love record". To Wu Yufeng's title "Dream of Red Mansions" To Wu Yufeng's title "Dream of Red Mansions" - this sentence has nothing, Found in Awake. "Please tell me, which one is the original? Which is an annotation? It’s totally crazy.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 评四大名著红楼梦（上下册）（人民文学版新版）
item.text: 《红楼梦》是我国古典四大名著之一，它在我国以至世界文学史上的地位和价值是众所周知的，买这部书主要是给女儿看，对于一名小学六年级的孩子来说，它还太难以理解，但现在的应试教育要求孩子必读，难说这是好事还是坏事。
item.summary_trans: Comment on the four famous masterpieces of the Dream of Red Mansions (volumes) (People's Literature Edition)
item.text_trans: "Dream of Red Mansions" is one of the four classics of classical Chinese. Its status and value in the history of Chinese literature and even the world is well known. The book is mainly for the daughter. For a sixth grader, it also Too difficult to understand, but the current exam-oriented education requires children to read, it is difficult to say whether this is a good thing or a bad thing.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)

item.summary_trans: A Dream of Red Mansions is one of the four famous Chinese classics
item.text_trans: I used to watch the red building intermittently. I always wanted to collect one of them. I saw a lot of stores on the Internet. Amazon is still quite good. There are two volumes, the price is higher, the text size is right, the cover color is not so red, and it is quite good.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)

item.text: 大概是10年之前买过这本书，然而被人弄丢了，十分心疼。再看到毅然买了，注释客观详尽、校正一丝不苟，比起市面上琳琅满目的所谓“精装版”来，更能体现认真对待红楼的态度。
item.text_trans: I bought this book about 10 years ago, but I was lost and very distressed. Seeing resolutely bought, the annotations are objective and detailed, and the corrections are meticulous. Compared with the so-called “hardcover edition” on the market, it can reflect the attitude of taking the red building seriously.

item.text: 《红楼梦》(上下)是中国文学史上最伟大而又最复杂的作品，感觉纸质还是不错的
item.summary_trans: "Dream of Red Mansions" (up and down) is the greatest literary masterpiece of China in the 18th century. It is not only a treasure of Chinese literature, but also a shining pearl in the ocean of world literature.
item.text_trans: "Dream of Red Mansions" (up and down) is the greatest and most complicated work in the history of Chinese literature. It feels that paper is still good.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 1 红楼梦艺术研究所校注，由冯其庸先生总负责，96年第2版。2 本书以庚辰本为底本，以各脂评本为参校本，凡校改底本处均作出校记。注释位于正文下方，校记则位于文后。3 丛书分为上下2册，每册似太厚了一些。4 1996年12月第2版，2007年11月第21次印刷，印数448301—468300册。5 吴世昌、吴恩裕、吴祖缃、周汝昌、启功等几位老红学家担任本书校注工作的顾问。6 叶圣陶老先生和叶至善老先生对本书的校点和注释提了不少的意见，叶圣陶老先生还亲自标点和修改过不少地方。1、若是改成三册，前八十回就可以为二册，那么薄厚适中，也便于随身携带了。2、新版第三版，修改处颇多，如后四十回改成无名氏续。3、随感：宝玉，双子座；黛玉，双鱼座。哎~~。如何不会“枉凝眉”，又如何不“想眼中能有多少泪珠儿，怎经得秋流到冬尽，春流到夏！ ”呢。O(∩_∩)O~
item.text_trans: 1 School of Red Mansions Art Institute, with the general responsibility of Mr. Feng Qiyong, the second edition of 1996. 2 This book uses Geng Chen as the base book, and each fat review book is used as the school-based book. The note is located below the text and the school note is located after the text. 3 The series is divided into two volumes, each of which seems too thick. 4 The second edition in December 1996, the 21st printing in November 2007, the number of prints was 448301-468300. 5 Wu Shichang, Wu Enyu, Wu Zuyu, Zhou Yichang, Qi Gong and other old red scientists served as consultants for the book's school work. 6 Mr. Ye Shengtao and Mr. Ye Zhishan provided a lot of opinions on the school's school points and notes. Mr. Ye Shengtao also personally punctuated and revised many places. 1. If it is changed into three volumes, the first eighty times can be two volumes, so the thickness is moderate and easy to carry around. 2, the new version of the third edition, a lot of revisions, such as the last forty to change into an anonymous. 3, with the sense: Baoyu, Gemini; Daiyu, Pisces. Oh~~. How can you not "blow your eyebrows", and how not to "think how many tears can be in your eyes, how can you get through the autumn to the winter, spring to the summer!" O(∩_∩)O~

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 其实这个版本也不令人满意
item.text: 如果说全本《红楼梦》，那自然‘研究所版’的比其它的强些。不过感觉修订的过头了，虽然说用庚辰本做底，也用不着这么‘用简体字重写了遍’。我感觉到不如灵活些，把前八十回以庚辰为底本，其它的本子汇校一下，把该补的都补上去（如回前诗等，其实最好连脂批都印上去）。何必弄的像现在这样，‘做学问似的’什么都放在回后的校订里！看似精确，其实不利于阅读。你们印的毕竟是‘通行本’，不如‘大胆的改’。‘原貌’是要留，但要的是‘神’，至于斟酌词句何必弄的像考证一样。真要考证，那直接去看影印本了。另外此书的前言部分貌似有点别的味道，虽然看似有理，但是不应该写在这书里，别忘了你们也是吃的‘死人饭’。
item.summary_trans: In fact, this version is not satisfactory.
item.text_trans: If you say the whole book "Dream of Red Mansions", then the natural ‘study version’ is stronger than others. However, I feel that the revision is overdone. Although I use the Geng Chen book as the bottom, I don’t need to use the simplified Chinese characters to rewrite it. I feel that it is better to be flexible. I will use the Gengchen as the base for the first eighty, and the other books will be replenished. I will fill in the supplements (such as returning poems, etc., in fact, it is best to print the greases). Why bother to do it like this, ‘learning like’ is all in the back-to-back revision! Seemingly accurate, it is not conducive to reading. After all, what you printed is a 'pass-through', not as a 'daring change'. The ‘original appearance’ is to stay, but the ‘god’ is the same as the sacred word. I really want to research, then go directly to the photocopy. In addition, the preface of this book seems to have a bit of other taste. Although it seems reasonable, it should not be written in this book. Don't forget that you also eat the 'dead man'.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这书从1982年一版首印，1994年二版，到2008年7月三版首印为止，累计印行23次，足见其影响，也凸显其问题：1、新版分两卷本极不合理，建议回归之前程乙本四卷的。我手头收的一版二刷三卷本都厚得可以，仅上册标561页，阅读非常不方便，更不用说现在两卷的。2、无插图少了观赏性，建议恢复旧版刘旦宅的插图，或选用汪惕斋等人的，可选余地很大。3、同时出精装本，还应出繁体直排本，以扩大中华文化影响力。4、价格降到合理的区间。出版者应自律，那个物价呀，什么出版署呀也该管管。若是一味出缩水书，书价又高高在上，那人文社就免不了店大欺客的嫌疑。
item.text_trans: This book was first printed in 1982, the second edition in 1994, and the first edition of the third edition in July 2008. It has been printed 23 times in total, which shows its influence and highlights its problems: 1. The new edition is very unreasonable. It is recommended to return to the previous four volumes of Cheng Bing. I have a version of two brushes and three volumes that I have on hand. It is only 561 pages. It is very inconvenient to read, not to mention the two volumes. 2, no illustrations less ornamental, it is recommended to restore the illustrations of the old version of Liu Dan House, or choose Wang Yizhai and others, there is a lot of room for choice. 3, at the same time out of hardcover, should also be out of the traditional straight line to expand the influence of Chinese culture. 4. The price drops to a reasonable range. The publisher should be self-disciplined, the price, and the publishing office should also be in charge. If the book is shrunk and the book price is high, then the Humanities Society will inevitably be suspected of being a big bully.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 很好的书，白璧微瑕，但无妨大雅
item.text: 关于本书，我对它很有感情的。我哥买的第一版第一次印刷的，共三卷，码洋4.1元。那时我刚上幼儿园，待到高中毕业时，第一卷已经丢失，只好去买新的，虽然仍旧为三卷，但已经增加了插图，定价为12.3元。放在书柜里，去年回到家乡去时，只残存了大半部和几页插图，格外心疼，回到北京后在地坛书市旧书摊发现了这种版本，定价为7.8元，比我买的那个出版日期还早。与前两版相比，第三版改动了不少，做到了精益求精，比如，把作者自云那段作为脂评单独列出来；把林妹妹的眼睛由“一双似喜非喜含情目”改作了“一双似泣非泣含露目”；“芦雪庵”恢复为底本的“芦雪广”，都是巨大的进步。但也有白璧微瑕处，前言中把甲辰年虚岁为“五岁”印刷成“十五岁”；列举了发现的抄本中，卞藏本还没有补充进去；第一版中“冷月葬花魂”，如今改成了“冷月葬诗魂”，还需要商榷商榷。还有插图给删去了，殊为可惜。希望再版时予以更正。但我还是相当喜爱这个版本。
item.summary_trans: Very good book, it’s a little white, but it’s fine.
item.text_trans: I am very affectionate about this book. The first edition of my brother bought the first print, a total of three volumes, code ocean 4.1 yuan. At that time, I just went to kindergarten. When I graduated from high school, the first volume was lost. I had to buy a new one. Although it was still three volumes, I have added illustrations and the price is 12.3 yuan. In the bookcase, when I returned to my hometown last year, only half of the illustrations and a few pages of illustrations were left. I was particularly distressed. After returning to Beijing, I found this version in the old book stalls in Ditan Bookstore. The price was 7.8 yuan, which is better than the one I bought. The date of publication is still early. Compared with the previous two editions, the third edition has changed a lot and achieved excellence. For example, the author has listed the author from the cloud section as a separate fate; and changed Lin’s eyes from “a pair of likes and dislikes”. "A pair of weeping and crying reveals the eyes"; "Lu Xueyu" is restored to the base of "Lu Xueguang", which is a huge improvement. However, there are also a few white plaques. In the foreword, the eternal age of Jiachen is “five years old” printed as “fifteen years old”; in the transcripts listed, the 卞藏 has not been added; the first edition of “cold burial” "Flower soul", now changed to "cold moon funeral poetry soul", but also need to discuss business. It is a pity that the illustrations have been deleted. I hope to correct it when I reprint. But I still quite like this version.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这套书似乎还比较受到大家的喜欢，都很想知道红研所在十几年后重新改版，到底有什么收获，研究成果对《红楼梦》的结局到 底有什么变化？所以卖得还算可以。偶也在卓越上订了一套，当时售价是26.9元，觉得很实惠，而且在刚刚订完后就发现卓越网已经无货，甚觉庆幸。但是收到后发现下册靠近封底的书脊有一点破损，已经露白了，偶当时就想申请退货的，但一个朋友觉得只是微瑕，是可以接受的，于是他买了下来。偶承认自己对书品相的要求近于苛求，但这样也就罢了，于是想重新再买一套。在等待了几天之后，重新在卓越网上找到这套书的时候，发现售价竟然涨到了45.4元，几乎和定价相差无几了；而相对于早前的售价，涨了69%！虽然对于商家盈利无可厚非，但是能疯狂成这样，就真的有些令人发指了。
item.text_trans: This set of books seems to be more liked by everyone. I really want to know what the Red Institute has been re-editing after more than ten years. What is the harvest? What changes have been made to the ending of "Dream of Red Mansions"? So it’s ok to sell. I even booked a set of excellence. At that time, the price was 26.9 yuan. I felt very affordable, and after I just finished booking, I found that Joyo.com was out of stock. I am very fortunate. However, after receiving it, I found that the spine of the next book near the back cover was a little damaged. It was already white. I even wanted to apply for a return, but a friend felt that it was only a slight flaw, which was acceptable, so he bought it. I even admit that my requirements for the book are nearly demanding, but that's it, so I want to buy another one. After waiting a few days, when I found this book again on Excellence Online, I found that the price actually rose to 45.4 yuan, almost the same as the price; and compared with the previous price, it rose 69%! Although it is understandable for the profitability of the business, it is really irritating to be crazy.

item.text: 今天到货。应当说是物有所值。有一点小遗憾：原来人民文学出版社上中下三册版《红楼梦》，每册前面都配有若干彩色插图，而这一版把图都给删了，可能是为节约印刷成本吧。但无论如何，40元钱买这套书还是很值得。除了没插图，其他也没啥可挑剔的。
item.text_trans: Arrived today. It should be said that it is worth the money. There is a little regret: the original three volumes of the People's Literature Publishing House, "Dream of Red Mansions", each with a number of color illustrations in front of it, and this version has been deleted, perhaps to save printing costs. But in any case, 40 yuan to buy this set of books is still very worthwhile. Except for the illustrations, the others are not picky.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 给低分不是因为内容，而是一拿到手，我对书的质量就很失望！纸张和外面盗版纸张无区别，就是盗版的纸张~从上一次在卓越买书我就很不满意，主要是因为发货慢，到手都一个星期了！这次更不满意！因为卓越不单发货慢（卡在预计时间发货，不给人家快递缓冲时间，没在预计时间内拿到书），而且书像盗版。我现在还不能确定，我会去书店核对一下，如果情况属实，我真的很失望。之前朋友听我介绍在卓越买书，她说她有一本是盗版，我还不信。因为在卓越买书这么多年，我真的没感觉有盗版的问题，但是这次我感到很怀疑了。花了40多块钱买这套书，用来爱护和阅读，价格也不便宜，却是这种质量。想买这套书的朋友最好想想，书店正版不过贵了十几块钱，但是质量没问题，我都后悔了，想退还麻烦，想想算了，凑负先看吧。
item.summary_trans: The quality of the book is not good
item.text_trans: The low score is not because of the content, but when I get it, I am very disappointed with the quality of the book! There is no difference between paper and pirated paper outside. It is pirated paper. I was very dissatisfied with the last time I bought a book for excellence. It was mainly because the delivery was slow and I had a week! This time is even more dissatisfied! Because excellence is not only slow delivery (cards are shipped at the expected time, do not give people a courier buffer time, did not get the book within the expected time), and the book is like pirated. I am still not sure, I will go to the bookstore to check it out. If the situation is true, I am really disappointed. Before my friend heard me introduce the book in excellence, she said that she had a copy of it, I still don't believe it. Because I have been buying books for so many years, I really don't feel the problem of piracy, but this time I feel very suspicious. It took more than 40 yuan to buy this set of books for love and reading, and the price is not cheap, but it is this quality. Friends who want to buy this set of books should think about it. The bookstore edition is only a little more than a dozen dollars, but the quality is no problem. I regret it. I want to return the trouble. Think about it, let me see it first.

The excellent description of the number of pages is 1606 pages, and I bought 1602 pages. The first time I saw the Dream of Red Mansions, I didn’t know what the ending was. item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 卓越的质量没的说，可是这次让人很不愉快！！
item.text: 我在卓越上面买了很多东西了，卓越的商品质量、价格都十分公道，包括这本书，但是，这次送货的质量让人很不愉快！！！事情经过是这样的。我住在四川成都，这两天因为有事情出门。昨天我在网上处理邮件顺便买下这本书。因为我快过生日了。在订单上我特地标明了周末送货，因为这几天我不在家，周末才能回来，可是卓越竟然忽略了我的要求，今天把货送来了！！！天啊，当时我收到收货通知的时候，我还在去雅安的长途汽车上。可是货到了，我又不忍心拒领。所幸我朋友有事没能跟我一起，才把书取到。我不是不相信卓越，在各大网店我消费最多的就是卓越了，可这次让人很不愉快。卓越业务多，出现一点意外没什么，但是，尊重客户的请求是商家保持客户的最主要方式。我以后还会在亚马逊买东西，只是这次给亚马逊提个醒，以后要留意顾客的请求，不要闹出更多的不愉快！！！
item.summary_trans: Excellent quality is not said, but this time it is very unpleasant! !
item.text_trans: I bought a lot of things on the excellent, excellent product quality, the price is very fair, including this book, but the quality of this delivery is very unpleasant! ! ! This is the case. I live in Chengdu, Sichuan, and I went out because of things. Yesterday I processed the mail online and bought this book by the way. Because I am going through my birthday. On the order, I specially marked the weekend delivery, because I was not at home these days, I was able to come back on the weekend, but the excellence even ignored my request, and I sent the goods today! ! ! God, when I received the delivery notice, I was still on the long-distance bus in Ya'an. But when the goods arrived, I couldn't bear to refuse. Fortunately, my friend did not get along with me before I got the book. I don't believe in excellence. I spend a lot of money in major online stores, but this time it is very unpleasant. There are a lot of great business, nothing unexpected, but respecting the customer's request is the most important way for the merchant to keep the customer. I will buy things in Amazon in the future, but this time I will remind Amazon. I will pay attention to the customer's request in the future, and don't make more unpleasant things! ! !

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 即使生活在快餐式的生活节奏里，也不能因此就快餐式的阅读。特别是像《红楼梦》这样，透着古文气的书。这个程乙本，是以北京图书馆出版社影印本的“程乙本”为底本，以“程甲本”为主校本。也是我读至现在以为最好的，用典啊，难词啊，文下的译注都很清晰，齐全。因为作者在很细微的情节上都会花心思，所以完备的译注很能帮助理解。看见基本信息里没有就顺便提一下，书是分上下两本的，32开。纸张也很好，没有粗糙感，封面还给我一种精装的感觉。即使是想把红楼作为藏书的，我也觉得这个版本不错。
item.text_trans: Even if you live in a fast-food lifestyle, you can't read it in a fast-food style. Especially like "Dream of Red Mansions", it reveals ancient books. This Cheng Yiben is based on the "Cheng Yiben" of the photocopy of the Beijing Library Publishing House, and the "Cheng Jiaben" is the school-based. It is also the best I have read so far. I use the code, the hard words, the translation notes are very clear and complete. Because the author will spend a lot of time on a very subtle plot, a complete translation can help understand. When you see the basic information, you can mention it by the way. The book is divided into two books, 32. The paper is also very good, there is no rough feeling, the cover gives me a feeling of hardcover. Even if I want to use the red building as a collection, I think this version is good.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 张爱玲说过，我们这个时代的年轻人同上一代相比失去了很多，例如不能很好的欣赏红楼梦。伟大领袖毛泽东主席也说，中国有四个了不起，地大物博，人口众多，历史悠久，有一部红楼梦。 红楼梦是中国古典文学的巅峰之作，是每一个中国人引以为豪的资本，但是在精神匮乏的现代，很多人都迷失自我，不爱读书，变得肤浅，对于很多经典的作品只知道梗概，便侃侃而谈，根本都没有深入到原著中，不能领略到精微细妙之处。读一本好书，就好像与许多高尚的人谈话，正所谓居移气，养移体，大家都很爱美，总讲求气质与神采，内在的神韵具备了，还怕自己不出众吗？大家都来读一下像红楼梦这样的好书吧！ 对于新版的电视剧不敢恭维，真有些“红雷梦”的意思。（哈哈）87版是永恒的经典，暑假时候再次回味了一下，好，莫名的感动，最过震撼的是那些顾问们，像周汝昌，杨宪益，启功，沈从文等大师，梦幻组合！估计是空前绝后！这些大师们都接连仙逝了，但是这部电视剧留下了他们不能磨灭的痕迹，向他们致敬！ 这套书样式古朴，文字排版大小适中，又经过仔细的校正，注释，看起来是种享受，现在市场上很少能有与之匹配的！ 卓越的送货速度非常快，配送人员的态度也很好，向他们道声辛苦！谢谢他们！不要多说，现在就开始读书，神交古人吧！
item.text_trans: Zhang Ailing said that the young people of our time have lost a lot compared with the previous generation. For example, they cannot appreciate the Dream of Red Mansions very well. The great leader, Chairman Mao Zedong also said that China has four great, large land, large population, long history and a dream of a red building. A Dream of Red Mansions is the pinnacle of Chinese classical literature. It is the capital that every Chinese person is proud of. However, in the modern lack of spirit, many people are lost in self, do not love to read, become superficial, and only know about many classic works. The outline, and then talked about it, did not go deep into the original, and could not appreciate the subtleties. Reading a good book is like talking to many noble people. It is the so-called living and moving, everyone is very beautiful, always temperament and spirit, the inner charm is possessed, and I am afraid that I am not outstanding? Everyone is coming to read a good book like the Dream of Red Mansions! For the new version of the TV series, I dare not compliment, it really means "red Lei Meng". (Ha ha) 87 version is an eternal classic, once again after the summer vacation, good, inexplicable touch, the most shocking are the consultants, such as Zhou Yichang, Yang Xianyi, Qi Gong, Shen Congwen and other masters, dream combination! Estimated to be unprecedented! These masters have passed away, but this TV series has left traces of their indelible, paying tribute to them! This set of books is simple in style, and the typesetting of the text is moderately sized. After careful correction and annotation, it seems to be a kind of enjoyment. Now there is very little matching on the market! Excellent delivery speed is very fast, the attitude of the delivery staff is also very good, and they are hardworking! Thank you! Don't say too much, start reading now, and pay the ancients!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 真正的第三版，书很不错
item.text: 刚刚拿到散发着油墨香味的书，很厚实，很齐整，纸张洁净，印刷清晰，版次为2008年第三版，作者更改为：曹雪芹（著） 无名氏（续）。看了一下印刷日期，居然是2010年5月第30次印刷，呵呵，刚从印刷厂出来的，看来卓越网并没有积压大量库存，赞一个。
item.summary_trans: The real third edition, the book is very good
item.text_trans: Just got a book with ink scent, very thick, very neat, clean paper, clear print, the third edition of 2008, the author changed to: Cao Xueqin (to) Anonymous (continued). Looked at the printing date, actually the 30th printing in May 2010, huh, huh, just out of the printing factory, it seems that Joyo has no backlog of large inventory, praise one.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 做宣传时，请不要跟李少红扯在一起好不好？
item.text: 因为看到是人民文学出版社出版的，应该比较正规，就买了，新书刚到货，封面就裹着新版红楼的剧照，真是太倒味口了！翻了翻里面，还有一张剧照的书签，又倒了一次味口。具体词句似乎跟我想买那个老版本差不多，我还没有仔细对照查看。拜托了，这样的名著，不必要跟李少红扯在一起，这样不仅起不到促销的作用，还会影响人的味口！还有，纸张质量太差了，太薄太薄！
item.summary_trans: When doing publicity, please don't tie it with Li Shaohong.
item.text_trans: Because the see is published by the People's Literature Publishing House, it should be more formal, bought, the new book just arrived, the cover is wrapped in the new version of the red house's stills, it is too boring! Turned over inside, there is a stills bookmark, and it tasted again. The specific words seem to be similar to the old version I want to buy. I have not checked it carefully. Please, this famous book does not need to be tied with Li Shaohong, so that it will not only play the role of promotion, but also affect people's taste! Also, the paper quality is too bad, too thin and too thin!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 优点：厚厚两大本，价格适中，人民文学出版社，相对严谨和权威一些，书中几乎每页都会在下面放有一些词汇的注解，方便学习。缺点：字稍微小了点，要不可能也没法出成两本了，纸质比字典强点，很容易扯破，看的时候要小心点，因纸质比较薄，稍稍有些透字，但不严重。总结：120回版本，人民文学出版社的校注和修订，有注解，很适合新读者观看，如果是收藏的话则欠点意思，总之还是比较满意的。
item.text_trans: Advantages: thick and thick, the price is moderate, People's Literature Publishing House, relatively rigorous and authoritative, almost every page in the book will have some vocabulary notes below, easy to learn. Disadvantages: The word is a little smaller, it is impossible and can't be made into two books. The paper is stronger than the dictionary. It is easy to tear. When you look at it, be careful. Because the paper is thin, it is slightly transparent. But not serious. Summary: The 120-review version, the notes and revisions of the People's Literature Publishing House, have annotations, which are very suitable for new readers to watch. If it is a collection, it is not meaningful. In short, it is quite satisfactory.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 书的质量很差,纸好象很破的样子```总之很差劲
item.text_trans: The quality of the book is very poor, the paper seems to be very broken. ``` In short, it is very bad.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这个版本较人民文学其它版本的主要特点：1、纸张好，印刷精美，宜于收藏；2、俞平伯校点，启功注释，都是红学权威，注释精炼；3、有插图。 是人民文学出版的红楼梦中较好的版本，适合一般读者阅读收藏。
item.text_trans: This version is more important than other versions of the People's Literature: 1, paper is good, beautifully printed, suitable for collection; 2, Yu Pingbo school points, Qi Gong notes, are red school authority, notes refine; 3, with illustrations. It is a better version of the Dream of Red Mansions published by People's Literature, which is suitable for general readers to read and collect.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 内容不做评价。上下两册，有塑封。纸张不是太薄，但可以看到背面的字，书脊处胶厚1毫米。1982年3月北京第1版，2008年7月北京第3版，2014年3月第44次印刷。印数：888301—938300。对读者而言，如能印成三册或精装，可能更耐读。不过这是畅销书，要长期保持销量畅通，就不能把质量弄的太好。《红楼梦》是经典中的经典，鼓励大家人手一本，读烂后不妨再买一本，读新书还能闻到书香。
item.text_trans: The content is not evaluated. Two volumes above and below, with plastic seals. The paper is not too thin, but you can see the words on the back, and the spine is 1 mm thick. The first edition of Beijing in March 1982, the third edition of Beijing in July 2008, and the 44th edition in March 2014. Number of prints: 888301-938300. For readers, if they can be printed in three volumes or hardcover, they may be more readable. However, this is a bestseller. If you keep your sales open for a long time, you can't make the quality too good. "Dream of Red Mansions" is a classic in the classics. Encourage everyone to have a copy of it. After reading it, you may wish to buy another one. You can smell the book after reading a new book.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 这个版本可能适合小学生阅读
item.text: 有点失望。本着此书评价甚高，因此购买。后来发觉此书实在失去读古典文学的趣味，跟汪原放版本比较，表达更为冗长。其实，红楼梦已经算是白话文小说了，只要读过初中高中的大部分读者，学习过阅读古文的基本知识，都基本能看懂的。没有必要再去读加上现代白话文的版本。这样很没味道。
item.summary_trans: This version may be suitable for primary school students to read
item.text_trans: A bit disappointed. In this book, the evaluation is very high, so buy it. Later, I found that the book really lost the interest of reading classical literature. Compared with the version of Wang Yuanfang, the expression is more verbose. In fact, the Dream of Red Mansions is already a vernacular novel. As long as you read most of the readers of junior high school and high school, you can basically understand the basic knowledge of reading ancient Chinese. There is no need to read the version with modern vernacular. This is very tasteless.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 昨天看到这本书半价，因对人民文学的这个版本心仪已久，赶快订，今天就到了。上下两册均有小的折损，虽不影响阅读，但对爱书的人来说很心痛。快递员也不容易，所以就没有拒收。不知是卓越有意将有小瑕疵的书低价倾销还是运输途中碰坏的。希望卓越能够在这方面改进，让购书人永远满意、永远放心。
item.summary_trans: Poor packaging, the book is broken
item.text_trans: I saw this book half price yesterday. Because I have been interested in this version of the people's literature, I will book it today. Both the upper and lower volumes have small breaks. Although they do not affect reading, they are very sad for those who love books. The courier is not easy, so there is no rejection. I don't know if it is excellent. I want to dump a book with a small price at a low price or a bad one in transit. I hope that excellence can be improved in this respect, so that the book seller will always be satisfied and always assured.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 红楼梦的内容和自己对它的拙见就不在此赘述，只说说这个版本：1.前言：很详细。对此版进行了一定的解说，也对曹雪芹本人和红楼梦进行了一定程度的解说。2.目录：非常整齐。除了一两回不得已，所有的回目都非常的整齐。3.字体：标准的字体，清晰。4.排版：很舒服。左半边是回目，右半边是标题。5.注释：非常详尽。对诗句、对联、古代的用具等进行了详尽的解说，难字和少用字更是加注了拼音。6.纸张：当然是不可能像精装书那样了。挺白的，摸上去滑滑的，不薄也不厚。PS：因为红楼梦版本众多，编者在每回后都附有“校记”，很细心。我初读红楼，这是我第一次买的版本，并不能和其他版本作对比，但这个版本已令我惊喜，是非常好的一个版本。
item.text_trans: The content of the Dream of Red Mansions and its own glimpse of it are not repeated here, just talk about this version: 1. Preface: very detailed. A certain explanation was given to this edition, and a certain degree of explanation was given to Cao Xueqin himself and the Dream of Red Mansions. 2. Directory: very neat. Except for one or two times, all the returns are very neat. 3. Font: Standard font, clear. 4. Typesetting: very comfortable. The left half is the return and the right half is the title. 5. Note: Very detailed. Detailed explanations of poems, couplets, ancient utensils, etc., and hard words and less words are added to the pinyin. 6. Paper: Of course it is impossible to do it like a hardcover book. It is quite white, it feels slippery, not thin or thick. PS: Because there are many versions of the Dream of Red Mansions, the editors are attached with “school notes” after each round, which is very careful. I first read the red building. This is the version I bought for the first time. It can't be compared with other versions, but this version has surprised me. It is a very good version.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 人文社的质量就是这样吗
item.text: 纸张薄，页眉空白多，页眉线正反面不对称，总之印刷排版让人感觉像是盗版，人文社难道就是这个水准吗？四大名著八本书都是这样，这个是对待名著的态度吗？再者，这个价格并不便宜，这样的质量成本有那么高吗？内容没有看，所以给三星。看到过上海古籍的红楼梦插图版，印刷纸张要好得多，而且四本，看起来方便，就是版本不好，所以没有买，我家最早就是买的人文82版的，三本，我都感觉质量比这次的好，失望了。
item.summary_trans: Is the quality of the humanities society like this?
item.text_trans: The paper is thin, the header is blank, and the front and back of the header line are asymmetrical. In short, the print layout makes people feel like piracy. Is the Humanities Society the standard? This is the case with the four famous books and eight books. Is this the attitude towards masterpieces? Moreover, this price is not cheap, is this quality cost so high? The content did not look, so give Samsung. I have seen the illustrations of the red house dreams of Shanghai ancient books. The printing paper is much better, and the four books are convenient. The version is not good, so I didn’t buy it. My family first bought the humanities 82 editions, three books, I feel the quality. Better than this time, I was disappointed.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 内容完整但印刷不太好
item.text: 当时买这部书是看上他的内容比较完整，并且是启功先生校点的，但可能为了节省成本吧，这书的纸张和印刷都有些粗糙，自己随便读读还行，但不可作收藏之用。
item.summary_trans: The content is complete but the printing is not very good
item.text_trans: At that time, I bought this book to see that his content is relatively complete, and it is Mr. Qi Gong’s school. But in order to save costs, the paper and printing of this book are a bit rough, and you can read it casually, but you can’t do it. For collection purposes.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 看到有6折的，马上下单！奇怪啊，下完单再看，就变成了无货了。36元买了套还算超值啊。总体上质量还行，就是纸张的颜色有些暗。
item.text_trans: If you see a 40% discount, order it now! Strange, after reading the order, it becomes out of stock. Buying a set of 36 yuan is still a great value. The overall quality is ok, that is, the color of the paper is somewhat dark.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 昨天晚上下了订单，今天中午收到的，两本书很厚重，装在包里很沉啊~感觉印刷很好，纸张是有一些薄，如果做成三册的话，纸张应该可以用略厚一些的，不反对用再生纸，毕竟再生纸的书很轻，拿着看不累。书页薄，背面的字会隐约透过来，不过不影响阅读。唯一担心的就是评论里说的容易开胶的问题，还没开始看，不知道是不是这么容易开胶，但愿不会吧。唯一有点不足的就是书墨味儿略微发臭，不太好闻~~
item.summary_trans: Very heavy book, printed very well.
item.text_trans: I placed the order last night. I received it at noon today. The two books are very heavy. It is very heavy in the bag. I feel that the printing is very good. The paper is thin. If it is made into three volumes, the paper should be slightly thicker. Some, do not object to the use of recycled paper, after all, the book of recycled paper is very light, holding not tired. The book page is thin, and the words on the back will pass through, but it will not affect reading. The only worry is that the commentary says that it is easy to open the glue. I haven't started to look at it. I don't know if it is so easy to open the glue. I hope it will not. The only thing that is not enough is that the smell of the book is slightly stinky, not very good~~

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 人民文学出版社的《红楼梦》真的很经典！
item.text: 第一次，在亚马逊上写评论~~好书，我就多说些啦~~供下面的童鞋们参考。 在图书馆，淘书的时候，因为发现它的批注特别的好，于是借了这本书（但是82年的），发现就光这批注就有很多值得学习的地方，于是就决定上网买了这本书自己收藏，现在得是经过修订的，因为红学在不断发展，补充和修改了一些陈旧的东西。字体很适中，印刷也还可以，不像其它买家说的上面纸张很薄，这纸张能接受的。学校这本书，有些年头了，所以纸张泛黄，我收到的新书，纸张比较白，反正看着不会刺眼。 亚马逊送来的时候，包装真的好简陋哦，就一个塑料袋，我很担心书会受损呢，要求打开来验一下书，邮递员很爽快地答应了。我翻了一下，共两册，发现下册的被翻的书页处，有被kua的现象，就是不是很平整，凹凹凸凸的，但也不是很严重，我就签收了，就算退了，能保证，下一本，是平整的。 总体来说很不错的。因为我喜欢在书上做标记，所以，对于名著，还是自己买吧~~小时候看《红楼梦》和现在看的感觉又不同了，好好学习，也许会有很大的收获的。其实，我是个很讨厌厚书的人，但这本书，我破天荒的有兴趣~~哈哈，会不会是个好的开始啊？是该认真学习了。
item.summary_trans: People's Literature Publishing House's "Dream of Red Mansions" is really classic!
item.text_trans: For the first time, write a comment on Amazon ~ ~ good book, I will say more ~ ​​~ for the following children's shoes for reference. In the library, when I was in the book, I found that it was particularly good, so I borrowed this book (but 82 years) and found that there was a lot of places worth learning in this note, so I decided to buy it online. The collection of this book itself has now been revised, because Red Learning is constantly evolving, adding and modifying some old things. The font is very moderate and the printing is OK. Unlike other buyers who say the paper is thin, the paper is acceptable. The school book has been around for a few years, so the paper is yellow, and the new book I received, the paper is white, and it will not be glaring anyway. When Amazon sent it, the packaging was really simple. Just a plastic bag, I was worried that the book would be damaged. I asked to open it to check the book. The postman agreed very quickly. I flipped it over and found a total of two volumes. I found that the book pages in the next book were covered by kua. It was not very flat, and the concave and convex were convex, but it was not very serious. I signed it, even if it was retired. Can guarantee that the next one is flat. Overall very good. Because I like to mark in the book, so for the famous book, or buy it yourself~~ When I was young, I saw that "Dream of Red Mansions" and the feeling of seeing it now are different. If you study hard, you may have a lot of gains. In fact, I am a person who hates thick books very much, but this book, I am interested in it!~ Haha, will it be a good start? It is time to study hard.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 虽然出版社的名气比较大，但是里面的内容有点像初中、高中的语文课本，第一次看红楼梦的话，还是岳麓书社的无障碍读本好。
item.text_trans: Although the publishing house's reputation is relatively large, the content inside is a bit like a Chinese textbook for junior high school and high school. The first time I read the Dream of Red Mansions, it is still a barrier-free reading book for Yuelu Bookstore.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 感觉这个版本的注释尚可，装订不好。阅读时有脱页现象。还以为是自己不小心呢，看了其他读者也遇到过这个令人扫兴的问题，看来是出版社的毛病了。怎么不把书弄得薄一些？改为3本或者4本多好。同样的，西游记也是这个装订的问题。记得以前有过上中下3本的西游记的，不知道出版社是怎么想的，故意跟读者过不去。
item.text_trans: I feel that the comments in this version are acceptable, and the binding is not good. There is a page break when reading. I thought it was my own carelessness. I saw other readers have encountered this embarrassing problem. It seems that the publishing house is faulty. Why don't you make the book thinner? It is better to change to 3 or 4 books. Similarly, Journey to the West is also a problem with this binding. I remember that there were three previous Journey to the West, and I didn’t know what the publisher thought, and deliberately couldn’t go with the reader.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 我是买的这本书的kindle版，看了两页退了，后来发现其实可以先发送样章的，以后会注意。本来这个版本应该不错，但是kindle版排版太差。注释和原文混在一起，并且字号也一样大，根本区分不出来，十分影响阅读。希望kindle团队能好好制作一下电子版的书。。
item.text_trans: I bought the Kindle version of this book. After reading two pages, I found that I can actually send the sample chapter first, and I will pay attention to it later. Originally this version should be good, but the kindle version is too badly typeset. The notes are mixed with the original text, and the font size is also the same, which cannot be distinguished at all, which greatly affects reading. I hope that the Kindle team can make an electronic version of the book. .

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 希望亚马逊重视排版的质量啊！不要光注重电子书的推出速度，质量才是根本啊！这个版本是不错，可惜万恶的排版啊！正文注释紧紧挨在一起了，这倒还罢了，只要能分辨出来也可以。问题在于注释和正文的字体及大小完全一样，也没有任何的分隔符号，非常混乱，17元就这样的排版质量？。。。。。想给你们钱赚都难啊！
item.summary_trans: The typele version of the layout! ! ! !
item.text_trans: I hope that Amazon values ​​the quality of typography! Don't pay attention to the speed of e-book launch, quality is fundamental! This version is good, but unfortunately the typesetting! The text notes are tightly tied together, and this is all right, as long as it can be distinguished. The problem is that the font and size of the comment and the body are exactly the same, and there is no separator. It is very confusing. Is the quality of the typesetting of 17 yuan? . . . . . It’s hard to earn money for you!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 书到手里面，不错，文字也好，就是记得以前看过的是四部分，还是三部分发行的，看着比这个顺手多了，太重了，不适合在被窝里看，但字里行间非常清楚，可是说是本好书。对得起这个价格了。
item.summary_trans: Too thick, looking at the hand
item.text_trans: The book is in the hand, it's good, the text is good, just remember that I have seen four parts before, or three parts of the release, look more convenient than this, too heavy, not suitable for watching in the bed, but the lines are very clear, But it is a good book. I am worthy of this price.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 红研所的校注本，相比起一般市面上杂七杂八的所谓校注本还是有一定保障的。不过红研所的本子有个缺陷，那就是它是个综合本，明明前80回的底本是脂本系统的庚辰本，按理说不应该加上程高本系统的后40回，这么拼凑在一起反倒不伦不类了。这么看，倒不如邓遂夫校订的两种脂本（甲戌校本，庚辰校本）和启功先生主持校注北师大版的程甲本校注本来的纯粹。邓遂夫的本子只有脂本的内容，而且还带大部分脂批，校记也是目前较流行的校订本中相对最详细的一种。当然，校订质量见仁见智，我个人觉得还是目前脂本里校订质量比较好的，除此以外，我个人觉得脂本整理本中比较好的还有郑庆山的汇校本，吴铭恩的汇校本等等，俞平伯校本也不错，就是太陈旧了。至于冯其庸的《脂砚斋重评石头记汇校汇评》，周汝昌的《石头记会真》，陈庆浩的《新编石头记脂砚斋评语辑校》和脂本的影印本等等，我们这些不研究红学的一般读者不是买不起，就是没多大必要买，这里略过。北师大版全120回底本都是程高本系统的程甲本，前后相较而言更有条理些，我并不是说程高本的文学性比脂本好，只是说相比起来矛盾更少些。而且北师大版还是目前所有红楼梦版本里注释最详尽的一种，红研所的校注本注释也很多，但不如北师大版。程本系统整理本中其他比较好的，还有过去人文社出的程乙本校注本和冯其庸先生辑校的《重校八家评批红楼梦》等等
item.summary_trans: Nice book, but a little regret
item.text_trans: The school's note book of the Red Institute is still somewhat guaranteed compared to the so-called schoolnotes in the market. However, the book of the Institute of Red Research has a flaw, that is, it is a comprehensive book. It is clear that the first 80 copies of the book are the Geng Chen of the fat system. It is reasonable to say that the last 40 times of the Chenggao system should not be added. It’s not a bad thing. Looking at it this way, it is not as pure as the two kinds of fat books (Tongfu School, Gengchen School Edition) and Mr. Qi Gong presided over the school's note of the North Normal University version of Cheng Jia. Deng Yufu's book is only the content of the fat book, but also with most of the fat, the school is also the most detailed one of the more popular revisions. Of course, the quality of the revision is a matter of opinion. I personally think that the quality of the revision is better now. In addition, I personally think that it is better to have a copy of Zheng Qingshan’s school, Wu Ming’s exchange school, etc. Yu Pingbo The school is also good, it is too old. As for Feng Qiyong's "Liu Zhaizhai Re-evaluation of Stone Recital School Review", Zhou Yichang's "Stone Memorizing the Truth", Chen Qinghao's "Newly Edited Stones and Sticking to the Diet" and the photocopy of the fat book, etc. The average reader who does not study red studies is not able to afford it, or it is not necessary to buy it. It is skipped here. The Beijing Normal University version of the 120-story version of the book is the Chengjia version of the Chenggao system. It is more organized before and after. I am not saying that Cheng Gaoben’s literary character is better than the fat one, only that it is less contradictory. Moreover, the Beijing Normal University edition is still the most detailed one in the current version of the Dream of Red Mansions. There are also many notes on the schoolnotes of the Red Institute, but it is not as good as the Beijing Normal University edition. Others in this book are better, and there are also the notebooks of Cheng Yi and the school of Feng Qiyong, which were published by the Humanities Society in the past.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 一般读者读它就可以了。校勘方面的问题可以不去管。红学家们其实不必眼红这套书的畅销，平常心一点，毕竟人家是国堪本啊。周本、蔡本、邓遂夫校本都可一看，只是周、邓为人不太厚道，批这套新校本有点苛刻。
item.summary_trans: Classic version, the problem still has
item.text_trans: The general reader can read it. The problems in collation can be ignored. In fact, the Red Scientists do not have to be jealous of the popularity of this set of books, usually a little bit of heart, after all, people are the country. Zhou Ben, Cai Ben, and Deng Yufu’s school can all be seen. It’s just that Zhou and Deng are not very kind. It is a bit harsh to approve this new school.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 书的整体质感很不错，拿在手里就有一中历史的感觉，想读的冲动。字体大小适中，行间距较合适我个人觉得还能记笔记。文章的序写的也优美，最后附里的一写东西写的让我很长见识。不过发现了一个错别字，旺儿写成了往儿。呵呵。快看完了，相当的好啊。
item.text_trans: The overall texture of the book is very good. In the hand, there is a sense of history and the urge to read. The font size is moderate, the line spacing is more appropriate, I personally feel that I can still take notes. The preface of the article is also beautiful, and the last one written in the attached book made me have a long experience. However, I found a typo, and Wanger wrote it. Ha ha. It’s pretty good to watch it.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这个版本已经是三版了，书没得说，从原文到注释都很不错，就是外皮上包的那个新红楼梦介绍的封条真是= =|||...不过书是很不错的。
item.summary_trans: This is the third edition, not bad.
item.text_trans: This version is already in the third edition. The book has not been said. It is very good from the original text to the commentary. The seal of the new Dream of Red Mansions on the outer skin is really ==|||...but the book is very good.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 曾在其他网店买过其他同版本的四大名著，都有一层胶纸包好。在卓越买了一套《三国演义》和《红楼梦》，都没外层胶纸。《红楼梦》封面脏了，用水轻抹了一下，封面轻度磨损。心情糟糕，不喜欢这种粗心的服务。
item.text_trans: I have bought four other famous works of the same version in other online stores, all of which have a layer of adhesive tape. In the excellent buy a set of "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" and "Dream of Red Mansions", there is no outer layer of adhesive tape. The cover of "Dream of Red Mansions" was dirty, and it was lightly wiped with water, and the cover was slightly worn. I am in a bad mood and don't like this careless service.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这套书是程乙本为底本的，装订的一版，读不久就要小心。注释的不好，没有红学研究所的通行版的全面，就像大家评论的那样，注的我都知道，我想知道的没有注解。不知道为什么，读起来总觉得和通行版的比不够惬意，可能是某些词语细微的修改，改变了他的意境吧。唯一的亮点是每回前有一张插图，看起来比较舒服。
item.text_trans: This set of books is a copy of Cheng Yi, a version of the binding, you should be careful soon. The comments are not good. There is no comprehensive version of the Hong Xue Institute's general version. As everyone commented, I know that I have no annotations. I don't know why, I always feel that the ratio with the popular version is not enough. It may be that some words are slightly modified, which changes his mood. The only bright spot is that there is an illustration before each look, which looks more comfortable.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 目前为止还没有时间看，不过看包装还不错哦！
item.text_trans: So far there is no time to look at it, but look at the packaging is not bad!

item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 我对书比较满意....似乎有些错别字啊...恩...还有没看多久有掉页的现象啊
item.text_trans: I am quite satisfied with the book.... It seems that there are some typos... Well...has not seen how long it has dropped pages.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 41.10（折后），正版，四大名著一起下单，用了10元优惠券
item.text: 正版的，人民文学出版社的，纸张超级好，注释也很全，可以做学习的工具书。本来要求10月17日夜间送货的，但是未送，无奈打电话给客服（亚马逊这个做的超级好，用手机查询客服之后，点击“让客服联系我”，客服会主动给顾客打电话，省了电话费，呵呵），然后查询了一下跟踪包裹，就发现正在派送，联系派送师傅，师傅说午饭后送货。果然下午一点准时送来了，好重呀，因为一块儿买了四大名著，共计八册，都是正版，这个四大名著从初中还是高中时就想买了，等了20来年了，终于出手买了，四大名著原价197.00元，折后价共计133.00元（6.751折），用了10元优惠券之后123元（6.244折）。本册正价59.70，折后41.10，6.91折，这四大名著亚马逊直销的折扣每一个都不同《水浒传》34.8元（原价50.6元，6.91折），《西游记》29.5元（47.20元，6.21折），《三国演义》27.60元（原价39.50元，7折），网上买东西还要精打细算呀
item.summary_trans: 41.10 (after discount), genuine, four big famous books together, with a 10 yuan coupon
item.text_trans: Genuine, People's Literature Publishing House, the paper is super good, the notes are also very complete, you can do the reference book for learning. Originally asked for delivery on the night of October 17, but did not send, but no help to call the customer service (Amazon is doing this super good, after using the mobile phone to query customer service, click "let customer service contact me", customer service will take the initiative to call the customer, Saved the telephone bill, huh, huh), and then inquired about tracking the package, found that it is being dispatched, contact the delivery master, the master said delivery after lunch. Sure enough, I sent it on time in the afternoon. It’s so heavy, because I bought four famous books together, a total of eight books, all of which are genuine. The four famous books wanted to buy from junior high school or high school. After waiting for 20 years, finally I bought it, the original price of the four famous books was 197.00 yuan, and the discounted price was 133.00 yuan (6.751 fold). After using the 10 yuan coupon, it was 123 yuan (6.244 fold). The regular price of this book is 59.70, after discount 41.10, 6.91 fold, the discounts of these four famous Amazon direct sales are different from "Water Margin" 34.8 yuan (original price 50.6 yuan, 6.91 fold), "Journey to the West" 29.5 yuan (47.20 yuan, 6.21 fold), "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" 27.60 yuan (original price 39.50 yuan, 30% off), online shopping must be carefully calculated

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 网上购物，就这一点困扰我，因为到实体店购买，可以看得见摸得着，《红楼梦》这样的经典，不在于抢先的问题，而是能不能藏得有意义一点，下单前想找一本品相好一点的，找来找去，拿到手上后，觉得又被忽悠了。唉……

item.text_trans: Online shopping, I am bothered by this, because to the physical store to buy, you can see and feel, the classic "Dream of Red Mansions" is not in the preemptive problem, but can not hide the meaning, before the order Looking for a better product, looking for it, after getting it, I feel that it has been fooled. Ugh……

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 人民教育出版的书我一直很有好感。这次在亚马逊买的红楼梦很满意，虽然比预期晚到了一天。书里的插图都是明清版本的，纸页轻薄柔软，翻起来有一种看古代线装本小说的感觉。也未发现书里有什么错乱的地方，还算不错的一次购书经历。
item.text_trans: I have always had a good impression on the books published by the People's Education. The Dream of Red Mansions bought at Amazon was very satisfied, although it was a day later than expected. The illustrations in the book are all in the Ming and Qing Dynasties. The paper sheets are light and soft, and there is a feeling of looking at the ancient line-loaded novels. I haven't found any confusion in the book. It's a good experience in buying books.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.text: 第一册有一处勒痕，第二册封皮有处小破损，其余完好。已经是2014年46次印刷，大概翻了一下印刷没有很多评论说的那么差、纸张也没有那么透，书脊胶水也没有那么薄，总之清晰悦目，装订质量不错，不是很容易散架的样子。每年都得印刷好几次有时好有时孬，有时也得碰运气，不过总会越来越好的罢。就像我06年买的一本西厢记一样墨色深一块浅一块，而14年刷的却很清晰。这套是以庚辰本为底本校注的相比市面上其他版本其价值不言而喻，能读到这么多版本的红楼梦（包括影印本）我感到很幸福！
item.summary_trans: Dream of the Red Chamber (set of volumes) (new edition of People's Literature)
item.text_trans: The first volume has a flaw, and the second cover has a small break and the rest is intact. It is already 46 prints in 2014, probably flipped over the printing. There are not many comments that are so bad, the paper is not so transparent, the spine glue is not so thin, in short, clear and pleasing, the binding quality is good, not very easy to fall apart. I have to print it several times a year, sometimes it’s sometimes awkward, sometimes I have to try my luck, but it’s always getting better. Just like the one in the West Chamber I bought in 2006, the ink is dark and shallow, and the 14-year brush is very clear. This set is based on the Gengchen book. Compared with other versions on the market, the value is self-evident. I am very happy to read so many versions of the Dream of Red Mansions (including photocopies)!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 原书要给100分，但是印刷质量很差
item.text: 纸怎么那么差？纸太薄了。另外印的字看着也不舒服。手写个字都快要破掉的感觉，都没法手写批注。这样的纸和印刷也就顶多值个三十块钱。不能再高了！另外，底下的备注，写得不怎么对，写备注的人文化功底太差，对佛和道的了解不够。红楼梦原书是个已经悟了此世界为虚幻的人写的，不从此角度解读，都不怎么通。光讲里面的“现实”意义，是肤浅了。
item.summary_trans: The original book is going to give 100 points, but the print quality is very poor.
item.text_trans: How is the paper so bad? The paper is too thin. The printed words are not comfortable. The feeling of handwriting a word is about to break, and there is no way to write a comment. Such paper and printing are worth at most thirty dollars. Can't be higher anymore! In addition, the notes below are not written correctly. The cultural background of the people who wrote the notes is too poor, and the understanding of the Buddha and the Tao is not enough. The original book of A Dream of Red Mansions is written by people who have realized this world as an illusion. It is not very difficult to interpret from this perspective. The meaning of "reality" in the light is superficial.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 说是名家校注 一点也不详实 唬人的
item.text_trans: Said to be a famous school note, not at all savage

item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 之前看各种评论，有的说很差~一直很忐忑~收到书很高兴~发货速度超快的~书书的颜色和图片上有点差别~是那种淡淡的鹅黄色的~不过还是很喜欢的~书还没有看,简单地翻了翻，感觉还不错的样子~总之很喜欢~第一次在亚马逊买书，很愉快的经历！！！

I simply flipped it over and it feels pretty good~ I like it very much~ I bought a book at Amazon for the first time, a very enjoyable experience! ! !

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
