item.text: 书拿到了，很喜欢啊，哈哈~~~推荐给大家，纸张很好，不像前些人说的那样，而且还有注释，是本很不错的书！！
item.text_trans: The book got it, I like it very much, haha~~~ recommend it to everyone, the paper is very good, not like the previous people said, and there are notes, this is a very good book! !

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 老师说不要买人民文学的本子，不要看周汝昌冯其庸刘心武等~= =但相对于杂七杂八的出版社，人民文学还是要好一点，至少不会像我小时候看到的删掉判词和大量诗词的简本~脂砚斋评点本固然是极好的，不过我觉得这样完整的一个还是必要，且有比较才知高下。先读这本，才会知道脂评本的好~再去了解不同版本的细微差距~不必开始就战战兢兢，放开读吧！
item.text_trans: The teacher said that you should not buy the book of people's literature, don't look at Zhou Yichang, Feng Qiyong, Liu Xinwu, etc. ~= = But compared to the miscellaneous publishing house, the people's literature is still better, at least not as simple as I saw when I was a child, deleting the verdict and a lot of poetry. ~ The fat meal review is certainly excellent, but I think this complete one is still necessary, and there is a comparison to know. Read this book first, you will know the fat review book is good ~ then to understand the different gaps of different versions ~ do not have to start to fight, let go read!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这套书是我买的红楼版本最满意的版本，书中把一些难点字词都做了标注，每章后还把不同版本的不同之出列了出来，是一本非常好的普及版本，当然，这只是对于通读普及本的读者而言的，如果对红楼要做深入研究，最好够古本，但本版本也是很好的参考。
item.text_trans: This set of books is the most satisfactory version of the red building version I bought. The book has marked some difficult words. After each chapter, the different versions of the different versions are listed. It is a very popular version. Of course, this is only for the readers who read the popular books. If you want to do in-depth research on the red building, it is best to have an ancient version, but this version is also a good reference.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 这就是2008年最新版，“无名氏续”
item.text: 仔细看了各位的介绍，才敢买这本标注“曹雪芹 高鹗”著的《红楼梦》。在此还是要更正一下，现在发货的版本就是改为“曹雪芹著 无名氏续 程伟元、高鹗整理”的2008年人民文学出版社新版的了。市场上价格一般在75-80折，现在67折算是比较便宜的了。欲购速从啊！人民文学的四大名著新书也就在这个折扣了，估计也没有多少降价空间了。
item.summary_trans: This is the latest version of 2008, "Anonymous Continued"
item.text_trans: After carefully reading the introductions, I dared to buy this "Dream of Red Mansions" marked "Cao Xueqin Gao Yan". Here, we still have to correct it. Now the version of the shipment is changed to the new edition of the 2008 People's Literature Publishing House of "Cao Xueqin, Anonymous Continued Cheng Weiyuan, and Gao Wei." Prices on the market are generally 75-80% off, and now 67% is relatively cheap. Want to buy speed! The four new books of the People's Literature are also at this discount, and it is estimated that there is not much room for price cuts.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 买回来是2010年3月印刷的。高鹗已经被归入整理人的名字里，后八十回作者是无名氏。这是第三次修订版的，修订于2008年。按照修订者的说法，第二次修订是 12 年后，第三次修订也隔了 13 年，所以即便按照 12 年修订一次的情况来判断，下一次修订也不会早于 2020 年。所以要买的同学不用等什么更新的版本了，除非你真的有耐心。（还不知道 2020 年通货膨胀成什么样）另外，这本书还是应该做成上中下三册，现在的厚度与字典无异。最后，最重要的一点是，人文社的红楼梦的底本是庚辰本。
item.text_trans: I bought it back in March 2010. The sorghum has been classified in the name of the organizer, and the author of the last eighty is Anonymous. This is the third revision, revised in 2008. According to the revisionist, the second revision is 12 years later, and the third revision is also 13 years apart, so even if it is judged in the 12-year revision, the next revision will not be earlier than 2020. So the students who want to buy don't have to wait for a newer version, unless you really have patience. (I don't know what inflation will be like in 2020.) In addition, this book should be made in the middle, lower, and third volumes. The thickness is now the same as the dictionary. Finally, the most important point is that the foundation of the Dream of the Red Chamber of the Humanities Society is Geng Chenben.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 很实在的版本。经典
item.text_trans: Very real version. classic

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 刚开始还担心像其他买家说的那样 会有种种质量问题 但是到手后真是出乎意料 书的质量以及包装都很好 书里的字也很清晰 纸质很好 注释很到位 同学都说买的很值 非常满意的一次购物
item.text_trans: At first, I was worried that there would be various quality problems like other buyers said. However, the quality of the unexpected books and the packaging are very good. The words in the book are also very clear. The paper is very good. The comments are in place. Very worthy of a shopping

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 书不错，要说的是卓越。一颗文学史上的璀璨明珠黏着几个刺眼的脏手印，暴殄天物。请你们怀着对文化的尊重做生意。
item.text_trans: The book is good, what is to say is excellence. A bright pearl in the history of literature has a few glare and dirty handprints, and it is a violent thing. Please do business with respect for culture.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 书是好书，但作为人民文学出版社的产品，印刷裁切非常差劲，相当失望，基本属于残次品。书本根本不是长方形，底边完全切歪了，而且内页也歪歪斜斜的，非常不满意。很想退换，但耽搁了几天，刚发现退货窗口29日已经关闭了……不爽，本想买来收藏的，现在只想想搁地摊卖了！请问哪里能讨说法？
item.text_trans: The book is a good book, but as a product of the People's Literature Publishing House, the printing cuts are very poor, quite disappointing, and basically belong to the defective products. The book is not rectangular at all, the bottom edge is completely cut, and the inner page is also skewed, which is very unsatisfactory. I really want to return, but I have been delayed for a few days. I just found out that the return window has been closed on the 29th... I am unhappy, I wanted to buy the collection, but now I just want to sell it! Where can I discuss?

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 内容很好，注释详尽，适合初读着，字体看起来也舒服，只不过质薄得过分啊~真怕看几遍就翻破了。。。
item.summary_trans: Paper thin is the only flaw ~~
item.text_trans: The content is very good, the notes are detailed, suitable for first reading, the font looks comfortable, but the quality is too thin~ I am afraid that I will turn it over after reading it several times. . .

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)

item.text: 送货速度很给力，书本质量印刷都很好，不过就像别人说的，要是能分为四册就好了，两本有点厚，读起来不好驾驭。不过总的来说还是很喜欢！
item.text_trans: The delivery speed is very strong, the book quality printing is very good, but as others have said, if it can be divided into four volumes, the two books are a bit thick, and they are not easy to read. But in general, I still like it very much!

item.summary_trans: The word is a bit small
item.text_trans: After waiting for a week, I felt that the words were a little small and I was tired when I looked at my eyes. I saw that compared with the People's Literature Publishing House, some places deal with a little simple, a bit of text is not satisfactory.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 文学本身不必说了，书的外在质量很好。值得购买！
item.text: 文言文，最喜欢原汁原味的，每页下方配有注释，如果说连四大名著都没读过，真的不好意思见人，当然别当做是任务来读，本书即能娱乐身心，又能提高文学素养，我读我快乐！虽然个人还是更喜欢《三国》，三国更运筹帷幄和霸气一点，而红楼梦则是细致到每个人物、每个细节，尤其喜欢王熙凤这个火辣的女子！推荐购买此版本。
item.summary_trans: The literature itself does not have to be said, and the external quality of the book is very good. worth buying!
item.text_trans: Classical Chinese, most like the original, with comments on the bottom of each page. If you haven't read even the four famous books, you are really embarrassed to see people. Of course, don't be a task to read, this book can entertain the body and mind, and Can improve literacy, I am happy to read! Although the individual still prefers the "Three Kingdoms", the Three Kingdoms are more strategizing and domineering, while the Dream of Red Mansions is meticulous to every character, every detail, especially the hot woman like Wang Xifeng! It is recommended to purchase this version.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: Kindle版的《红楼梦》注释与正文“高度融合”，根本无法阅读，废物一件
item.text: 作家出版社出版的《红楼梦》此Kindle版，注释与正文“高度融合”、“浑然一体”，根本无法阅读，废物一件，无奈又下了别的版本阅读，不改进的话，大家别再下载此版本了，以免上当受骗—白费钱。
item.summary_trans: The Kindle version of "Dream of Red Mansions" is highly "integrated" with the text, and cannot be read at all.
item.text_trans: The Kindle version of "Dream of Red Mansions" published by the Writers Publishing House, the annotations and the text "highly integrated", "integrated", can not be read at all, waste, but helpless to read other versions, if not improved, please do not download This version is out, so as not to be deceived - in vain.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 还有两天就要过年了，本来这次的订单下的就是抱着试试看的心态，心里也知道年前不太可能送到了，但是内心还是很期待，春节长假，很想再重温一遍《红楼梦》但是家里的版本只有前八十回，所以这次想看看这个版本的，所以还是很急的。今天晚上，亚马逊的快递员来敲我家的门，看着他冻红的脸，还有书拿到手后冰冷的外皮，我心里真的充满了歉意，无论如何，因为我，给他在除夕的头两天的这一天增加了工作量。心里很想跟他说一声：新年快乐，但是由于害羞还是没能说出口，如果有可能的话，希望我在这里写下的文字能被那位快递员看到，希望他能早点回家，和家人团圆。
item.text_trans: There are still two days to go through the New Year. Under this order, I have a mentality of trying to see it. I know that I am not likely to be sent before, but I am still looking forward to it. I want to revisit it during the Spring Festival holiday. "Dream of Red Mansions" but the version of the home is only the first eighty, so I want to see this version this time, so it is still very urgent. Tonight, Amazon’s courier came knocking on my door, looking at his frozen face, and the cold skin of the book after I got it. My heart was really full of apologies, anyway, because I gave him on New Year's Eve. The first two days of the day increased the workload. I really want to say to him: Happy New Year, but I still can't say it because I am shy. If possible, I hope that the words I wrote here can be seen by the courier, I hope he can go home early, and Family reunion.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 有人说，里面讲了阶级斗争。死的几个丫鬟就是。里面讲到了爱情和家族。这本书是和金瓶梅对比来才存在的。记得有种说法，以前是四大奇书，后来便成了四大名著。不同之处，就是用《红楼梦》代替了《金瓶梅》，理由是考虑到金瓶梅的传播和影响不利于进行传统文化的传播。金瓶梅是赤裸的市井生活，红楼梦只是把这种生活诗意化了。里面一样有淫，不过，只是一条暗线，而并没有拿到场面上来说。纵观全书，更像是曹雪芹历经了一世的繁华，颓败之后的无限怀念之作。犹如李煜的亡国之后感佩人心的词。
item.summary_trans: Classic, no need to say more
item.text_trans: Some people say that it is about class struggle. A few tricks of death are. It talks about love and family. This book is only in contrast to Jin Ping Mei. I remember that there was a saying that it used to be four great books, and later it became four famous books. The difference is to replace "Jin Ping Mei" with "Dream of Red Mansions" on the grounds that the spread and influence of Jin Ping Mei is not conducive to the spread of traditional culture. Jin Pingmei is a naked city life, and the Dream of Red Mansions just poetically like this life. It is as kinky as it is, but it is just a dark line, but it is not taken from the scene. Throughout the book, it is more like Cao Xueqin's prosperous life after the defeat of the world. Like Li Wei’s words after his death.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 终于买了一套红楼梦。早在高考之后就想买了。一直拖着。现在为了逼毕业论文，图书馆恰好没有这本书的最新版本了，所以 索性买了这么一套。价格公道，书的质量也很好。只是每一页都有很多注解，回目之后还有校注详解，挺不领编者情的。不过确实适合初读者读！推荐大家买这么一套纸质版，放在床头，随时翻看阅读。
item.text_trans: Finally bought a set of Dream of Red Mansions. I wanted to buy it after the college entrance examination. Always dragging. Now in order to force the graduation thesis, the library does not have the latest version of this book, so simply bought such a set. The price is fair and the quality of the book is also very good. Just every page has a lot of annotations, and after the return, there are also detailed notes on the school notes, which are quite unacceptable. But it is really suitable for the first readers to read! Recommend everyone to buy such a set of paper, put it on the bed, and read it at any time.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 书是好书，就是太厚，不适合拿着阅读，强烈要求出4册本，好还念75年版的4本一套的红楼梦，那时就是没有这么多的注释，可惜07版的书也不知所踪了。
item.text_trans: The book is a good book, it is too thick, not suitable for reading, strongly demanding 4 volumes, so I still read the 4th edition of the Red Mansion Dream of the 75-year edition. At that time, there were not so many comments, but the 07 edition of the book also I don't know where I am going.

item.author: 曹雪芹

item.text_trans: Very good, the version is very good, the annotation is very detailed!

item.text: 字有些小 但是能看的请 总的来说不错

item.text_trans: This version of the Dream of Red Mansions has a lot of detailed annotations, especially the annotation of ancient poetry, which is of great help to understanding the Dream of Red Mansions.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 开始恶心卓越的售后服务了！！！
item.text: 从我31号收书发邮件给你们卓越售后，过了4天才把我要换的书寄来，好笑的是只寄了一本《左岸琴声》来换，其余5本《红楼梦》等等到现在都没见影儿；更好笑的是寄来的唯一一本书和我要换的书一样，又是褶皱又是压痕，试问这和没换有什么区别！卓越不想诚心待人就算了，没必要做样子，做给谁看啊？！ 对卓越不再有什么期望了！原来你们就是这么售后服务的！！！也再也不会光顾卓越这家蒙骗消费者的黑店了！！！彻底失望。不过也好，让我看清了两件事：一，卓越的书，原来没有一本是全新完好的书，都是不知从哪里运来的压箱底卖不出去的破书和瑕疵书；二，卓越的所谓认真负责的工作人员，根本没有，都是尸位素餐！ 由这次换书的事情，让我深刻了解到，卓越没有任何诚信可言！我知道你们也不会给我换书了，无所谓，就当被咬了，吃一堑长一智，不会再在你们的旧货店买书了！！！！！！
item.text_trans: I sent you an e-mail from the 31st book to give you excellent after-sales service. It took me 4 days to send the book I want to change. The funny thing is that I only sent a copy of "Luohai Qinsheng" to change, the other 5 "Dream of Red Mansions" and so on. I haven't seen anything yet; the only thing I laughed at is that the only book I sent was the same as the one I wanted to change, and it was folds and indentations. I would like to ask if there is any difference between this and no change! Excellence doesn't want to be sincere, even if you don't have to look like it, who do you want to see? ! No longer have any expectations for excellence! It turns out that you are such after-sales service! ! ! Never again will not be able to patronize this black shop that deceives consumers! ! ! Thoroughly disappointed. But fortunately, let me see two things: First, the excellent book, there is not a book that is completely new, and all the books and scripts that are not sold from the bottom of the box are not sold; The outstanding so-called serious and responsible staff, there is no such thing as a corpse meal! From this book exchange, I deeply understand that there is no integrity in excellence! I know that you will not change books for me. It doesn't matter, you should be bitten, eat a long, smart, and will not buy books in your thrift store again! ! ! ! ! !

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)

item.text: 滴不尽相思血泪抛红豆，开不完春柳春花满画楼。睡不稳纱窗风雨黄昏后，忘不了新愁与旧愁。咽不下玉粒金莼噎满喉，照不尽菱花镜里形容瘦。展不开的眉头，捱不明的更漏。呀，恰便似遮不住的青山隐隐，流不断的绿水悠悠。————————凌云飘飘
item.text_trans: The drops of love and tears throw red beans, and the spring and spring flowers are full of paintings. After sleeping in the wind and rain at dusk, I can’t forget the new and old. Can not swallow the jade grain gold 莼噎 full throat, can not be seen in the mirror. The brows that can't be opened are more unclear. Yeah, it’s just like the hidden green hills, the continuous green water. ———————— Lingyun fluttering

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 买之前看到很多评论说这本书纸张很差，但还是怀着胆战心惊的心情买了。买回来一看，纸张虽然不是太好，印刷也确实有些透，但只是一点点，不至于背面也能看见前一页的字。绝对不影响阅读！！！我最先读的是删减版的《红楼梦》，所以想再看一遍足本的，删减版的很糟糕，删得很没味道。如果对纸张要求特别高的人就别买了，但我觉得像这本长篇著作，要求纸张够好够厚，岂不是要三大本才行？况且人民文学这种大出版社，又是再版，书里应该不会出现错字和印刷错误，你总不希望捧着一本纸张倍儿厚实，却满篇乱码的名著吧？
item.text_trans: Before I bought it, I saw a lot of comments saying that the book was very poor, but I still bought it with fear and fear. When I bought it back, the paper was not so good, and the printing was really transparent, but it was only a little bit, and I could not see the words on the previous page on the back. Absolutely does not affect reading! ! ! The first thing I read was the cut version of "Dream of Red Mansions", so I wanted to read it again. The cut version was very bad, and it was very tasteless. If you have a particularly high demand for paper, don't buy it, but I feel like this long work requires that the paper is thick enough. Isn't it necessary to have three books? Moreover, the big publishing house of People's Literature is reprinted. There should be no typos and typographical errors in the book. You don't want to hold a paper with a thick, but garbled masterpiece.

item.text: 人民文学出版社的这套红楼梦是用庚辰本为底本，对比起程甲、程乙本来说更为经典，2017年一印10000册，比想象中要多，最好控制在5000册更妙，至于收藏价值——仁者见仁，智者见智吧。随缘就好。总体来说纸张印刷还算不错，毕竟价钱摆在那，但是遗憾的是八十回后就没有戴老的插图作品了，算是美中不足吧，等着2018年上海书展看能不能见着戴老，求个签名钤印，就心满意足了。
item.summary_trans: A squid about the People's Literature Publishing House, the latest version of the Dream of Red Mansions
item.text_trans: The People's Literature Publishing House's Dream of Red Mansions uses Geng Chen as the base. Compared with the starting A and Cheng Yi, it is more classic. In 2017, 10,000 copies were printed, more than expected, and it is better to control 5,000. As for the value of the collection - the benevolent sees benevolence, the wise sees wisdom. Just follow the edge. In general, paper printing is not bad, after all, the price is there, but unfortunately, after 80 years, there is no old illustrations, it is a fly in the ointment, waiting for the 2018 Shanghai Book Fair to see if you can see Dai Lao, If you ask for a signature, you will be satisfied.

I ordered a new version of People's Literature on the website, but I opened it, not! Say what is unpacked and not returned! Everyone thinks, don't open it, how to know which year it was published, and how to know which publishing house is published. con man! item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 要说中国最好的书是哪一部，别的不敢说，史学类当数司马迁的《史记》，而文学类，曹雪芹的《红楼梦》无愧为第一！这次的人民文学版新版总体还是不错的，注释比较详细、精当，是其他版本比不上的优点。至于纸张嘛，本人感觉一般，配得上打折后的价位，只是装订得差了些，而且下册正文之后就是封底了，连一张衬页都没有，未免显得太吝惜了，一张纸能值多少钱呢？最气人的是夹在书中的“纪念卡”和腰封，则明显就是做广告嘛。本来腰封上的图案还看得过去，但却在卡和腰封上写上了“李少红执导电视剧唯一依据底本”，这句话真叫人恶心，简直就是商业炒作。要知道，版本再好，电视剧拍得不好，一样是烂戏！经过多次修订的人文版《红楼梦》从内容上来说本来是不错的，起码不比其它版本差，又何须要打这种画蛇添足的广告呢？人文社也未免太不自信了嘛！这个版本要是能配上彩色插图，做成精装本，分为三到四册装订，那就几近完美啦！就是价钱再贵一倍，也值得！
item.text_trans: To say which one of China's best books is, don't dare to say that the history class is Sima Qian's "Historical Records", while the literary class, Cao Xueqin's "Dream of Red Mansions" is innocent as the first! The new version of the People's Literature Edition is still good overall. The comments are more detailed and precise, which is an advantage that other versions cannot match. As for the paper, I feel that it is generally worthy of the discounted price, but the binding is worse, and the bottom of the next volume is the back cover. Even a line is not too much, it seems too much regret, a piece of paper can How much is it worth? The most irritating thing is the "commemorative card" and the girdle that are sandwiched in the book. It is obviously advertising. Originally, the pattern on the girdle was still visible, but it was written on the card and the waist seal. "Li Shaohong directed the TV drama based on the original." This sentence is really disgusting, it is simply commercial speculation. You know, the version is good, the TV series is not good, it is a bad game! The human version of "Dream of Red Mansions", which has been revised many times, is originally good in terms of content. At least it is not worse than other versions. Why do you need to play such a superfluous advertisement? The humanities community is too unconfident! If this version can be equipped with color illustrations, made into a hardcover book, divided into three to four bookbinding, it is almost perfect! The price is twice as expensive, it is worth it!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 这个版本比不上红学研究所的版本
item.text: 这个版本比不上红学研究所的版本。首先说外观：并没有体现出古典美学的风采，也没有卓越图片上那么靓丽，显得‘旧、俗’。用纸一般、装订一般不过这两样还算可以。再说内容：是俞平伯校点前80回+程乙本后40回，启功先生作的注释（启功注释的年代是六七十年代，大家都知道那时候文化大革命吧，当时对《红楼梦》盯的很紧，启功先生对注释《红楼梦》进退两难、举步维艰---参看周汝昌《北斗京华》---我看的也马虎，说错了我就删掉）。注释非常少可以忽略不计。这套《红楼梦》在通行本里算是最不通行的，又比不上脂批本。除非你对俞平伯校前80回感兴趣，否则还是买红学研究所的通行版吧。
item.summary_trans: This version is not comparable to the version of the Hongxue Institute.
item.text_trans: This edition is not comparable to that of the Red Institute. First of all, the appearance: does not reflect the classical aesthetic style, nor is it so beautiful in excellent pictures, it appears "old, vulgar". Paper is generally used and binding is generally used, but both are acceptable. What's more, Mr. Qigong's commentary (the age of Qigong's commentary was in the 1960s and 1970s. Everyone knows that the Cultural Revolution was in that time. At that time, Mr. Qigong's commentary on A Dream of Red Mansions was in a dilemma and difficult steps. See Zhou Ruchang's Beidou Jinghua, which I read carelessly and mistakenly. I'll just delete it. Very few comments are negligible. This set of Dream of Red Mansions is the least popular in the current edition, and it is not comparable to the fat edition. Unless you are interested in Yu Pingbo's first 80 chapters, you should buy the current edition of the Institute of Redology.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)

item.summary_trans: Comment on the Dream of Red Mansions (upper and lower)
item.text_trans: Printing is not bad, but if you want to deeply understand the red building, it is recommended not to buy Cheng Yiben. Because this version is the most serious one of the original deletions, it is recommended to buy a scorpion, or buy a fat review. Also, this book is not crust.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 同一批下单的书，包装差别大，简陋到不能再简陋
item.text: 书我还没翻开看，什么正不正版我已经不care了。但是请告诉我四大本书，那么厚，就给我搞个薄薄的塑料袋寄过来，我在茫茫快递中差点没发现它们，请问，这过程丢掉了怎么办。做事情可不可以认真点。还要吐槽一下快递，第一天六点半了给我打电话，告诉我没开门，今天我们已经下班了不能再送，明天送，可以啊，我能接受；第二天，等了一整天都没给我打电话，晚上实在等不了了，翻出来电话打过去，“今天没给你派，明天吧”好几年了我好像都没遇到过这么淡定的小哥，不按时派送，没有告知，电话打过去，还一副理所当然的样子，第三天我看到快递就烂成那个损出。您哪来的内在平和，处事不惊啊。最后，如果我不给个差评是不是就会淹没在人海。
item.summary_trans: The same batch of books, the packaging is very different, so simple that it can no longer be simple.
item.text_trans: I haven't looked through the book yet. I don't care if I am not genuine. But please tell me four books, so thick, I will send them a thin plastic bag. I almost didn't find them in the courier. What should I do if this process is lost? Do you have something to do seriously. I have to spit on the courier. I called my phone at 6:30 on the first day and told me that I didn't open the door. Today we have got off work and can't send it again. I can send it tomorrow. Yes, I can accept it. The next day, I waited all day. I didn't call me. I couldn't wait for it at night. I turned over and called and said, "I didn't send you today, tomorrow." For several years, I didn't seem to have encountered such a calm little brother. I didn't deliver it on time. Informed, the phone hit the past, but also a natural look, the third day I saw the courier rotten into the loss. Where are you from the inner peace, do not be surprised. Finally, if I don't give a bad review, it will be drowned in the crowd.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 书脊纸质，书面布料，可惜了！
item.text: 记得小时候看人文社的四大名著平装本，真是爱不释手，这种痴迷阅读，也是对自己的一种文学启蒙！很多年了，期盼人文社推出精装版，现在终于等到人文版四大名著的精装本的出版，喜见当当有售，所以毫不犹豫地就下单订购全套四种，下单后满是期待！收到后迫不及待地开箱拆封，满以为是个大大的惊喜！哎呀，太可惜了:布料精装倒是布面不假(而且布料还很好)，但最容易破损的地方——原本最该使用布料的书脊却是用的很不赖磨的那种白色的纸！厚厚的精装书，纸质的书脊很不赖磨，可能翻不了几次，纸质书脊就裂口了，这可难为了读者，翻阅时一定要平放桌面，小心轻翻，不然，书脊就烂了！这还有，书盒不是全布料，侧面居然也是纸，盒子正反两面都是布料，质量好，但两个侧面却是不耐磨的纸，纸和布料的结合处很容易断裂，四个书盒还没有拆封就发现有两个盒子布纸结合处已经断裂，还有盒子太紧，放书进盒和取出是一个技术活，稍不小心，纸质的书脊就断裂了！这不是最伟大的设计是什么？应该向装帧设计者颁发奇葩设计奖！反人类的设计！彻底打消了我以前想购藏两套的想法！
item.summary_trans: Spine paper, written cloth, a pity!
item.text_trans: I remember when I was a child, I read the four major masterpieces of the Humanities Society. I really love it. This obsessive reading is also a kind of literary enlightenment for myself! For many years, I hope that the Humanities Society will launch a hardcover edition. Now I have finally waited until the publication of the hardcover edition of the four famous editions of the Humanities Edition. I like to sell it, so I don’t hesitate to order a full set of four orders. look forward to! After receiving it, I couldn’t wait to unpack and unpack it. I thought it was a big surprise! Oops, it’s a pity: the cloth is hard and the fabric is not fake (and the fabric is still very good), but the most vulnerable place to break - the original spine that uses the fabric is the kind of white paper that is very hard to use! The thick hardcover book, the paper spine is not bad, it may not turn a few times, the paper spine will be broken, which is difficult for the readers. When reading, be sure to lay the table flat, carefully flip it, otherwise the spine will be bad. Now! In addition, the book box is not full fabric, the side is actually paper, the box is cloth on both sides, the quality is good, but the two sides are not wear-resistant paper, the combination of paper and cloth is easy to break, four The book box has not been unpacked and found that there are two boxes of cloth and paper joints have been broken, and the box is too tight, put the book into the box and take out is a technical activity, a little careless, the paper spine is broken! Isn't this the greatest design? The design award should be awarded to the finishing designer! Anti-human design! I completely dispelled the idea that I wanted to buy two sets before!

item.author: 曹雪芹

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 国庆以后送到的，然后就开始练习了。刚开始的进度慢，我只要求自己每天练4个字，因为要体会笔画的格局，需要细心琢磨。不过练了一段时间以后，对于笔画的位置有了一定的感受，速度就能稍微快一点。但是平均我每天还是4个字的样子，到目前为止写字是大有进步！另外，感觉练字还是非常怡情养性的，我打算长期坚持。买这本吴玉生的时候，还买了一本田英章的楷书常用7000字。但是我发现，实际上你只要认真地练，一本就够了。吴玉生这本我琢磨能练至少一年半载的。而且从日常写字的角度看，纯楷书的实用性不大。练了行楷以后，我就不那么想练楷书了。——当然，这只是我的个人感受。
item.text_trans: I sent it after the National Day, and then I started practicing. At the beginning, the progress was slow. I only asked myself to practice 4 words every day, because I need to understand the pattern of strokes and need to be careful. However, after practicing for a period of time, the position of the stroke has a certain feeling, and the speed can be slightly faster. But on average, I still look like 4 words every day. So far, writing is a big improvement! In addition, I feel that the wording is very pleasant, I intend to stick to it for a long time. When I bought this Wu Yusheng, I also bought a 7000-word script from Tian Yingzhang. But I found that in fact, as long as you practice seriously, one is enough. Wu Yusheng, this one, I can practice for at least a year and a half. And from the perspective of everyday writing, the practicality of pure scripts is not great. After practicing the practice, I didn't want to practice the book. - Of course, this is just my personal feeling.

item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 这个版本不好，推荐周汇本！
item.text: 以庚辰本作为底本，参考其他古本，可本身仍有大量违背曹雪芹原旨之处。红楼研究所作为官方权威机构研究成果十分值得商榷，至今依旧将高鹗续书与前八十回合印，固执己见。强烈推荐周汝昌汇校本红楼梦！
item.summary_trans: This version is not good, recommend Zhou Huiben!
item.text_trans: Taking Geng Chen as the base, referring to other ancient books, there are still a lot of violations of Cao Xueqin's original purpose. The research results of the Red House Institute as an official authority are very debatable. So far, the high-sorghum sequel and the first eighty rounds have been printed and stubborn. I highly recommend Zhou Hongchang's school red dream!

"Chinese Classical Literature Reader Series", People's Literature Publishing House, 2008 edition, two volumes; 3. "Four Masterpieces Collector's Edition", People's Literature Publishing House, 2018 edition, hardcover two Volume; (The three are the same version) 4, Zhi Yanzhai re-evaluation of the stone (Geng Chenben), People's Literature Publishing House, hardcover four volumes; 5, Yu Pingbo School, Qi Gong Note, People's Literature Publishing House 2000 edition, Two volumes; 6, Zhi Yanzhai approved, Zhou Yichang school to order a stone note, Yilin Press, two volumes.

However, it is obvious that the level of the first 80 and the last 20 is not a grade at all. The ending of this supplement can only be said to be barely filling out the pit of personal destiny. Really, the entire Jiafu was finally protected by Tian En, and he was fed, saying that a good white earth was really clean.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 我在亚马逊购书好多年了，从高中时候起，我就喜欢在亚马逊买书。以往都是迫不及待想看到快递员把那崭新的书给我送来，直至如今心惊胆战，怕发来的书本，要不纸质太差，要不折痕太深，要不错漏百出。 这次，在这里买了一部《红楼梦》，首先书面折痕严重，似被以重物所压，如果是快递运输有误导致出如此现象，亦能理解。但是书中看了第五章就发现有4，5处字面，以及印刷错误！这是我不能容忍的。小弟才疏学浅，但还叫上过初中，所以不知道什么叫做（衣衫”蓝褛“）？
item.text_trans: I have been buying books at Amazon for many years. From high school, I like to buy books at Amazon. In the past, I couldn’t wait to see the courier send me the new book. Until now, I’m scared, I’m afraid that the books I’m sending will be too bad, or the creases will be too deep. This time, I bought a "Dream of Red Mansions" here. First of all, the written crease is serious. It seems to be crushed by heavy objects. If it is caused by mistakes in express delivery, it can be understood. But when I read the fifth chapter in the book, I found that there are 4, 5 literals, and printing errors! This is something I can't tolerate. The younger brother was too shallow, but he was also called junior high school, so he didn't know what it was called (clothing "blue 褛")?

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 出于对名著版本的慎重，买之前看了很多评论，还是决定买人民文学版的，毕竟是影响最大的版本。书到手后仔细翻阅，跟书店的一样，中规中矩，绝没有有些评论说的那么差。纸张厚度正常，毕竟不是精装，如果说这个版的书有重影，那么国内90%以上的书都有同样问题。希望能给后来的买家提供较真实的感受，呵呵。
item.text_trans: Out of caution about the edition of famous works, I read a lot of comments before buying, and decided to buy the People's Literature edition. After all, it is the most influential edition. Read the book carefully after you get it. Like the bookstore, it's not as bad as some reviews say. Paper thickness is normal, after all, not hardcover, if this edition of the book has a double shadow, then more than 90% of the domestic books have the same problem. Hope to give later buyers a more real feeling, ha ha ha.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 作者署名变了，这是重大变化
item.text: 今年年初，人民文学出版社推出了《红楼梦》（珍藏版），扉页上作者署名变成了“（前八十回）曹雪芹著，（后四十回）无名氏续，程伟元、高鹗整理”。1982年《红楼梦》新校本出版时，署名为“曹雪芹、高鹗著”。如今发生明显的变化，一时间引发社会广泛关注。
item.summary_trans: The author's signature has changed, this is a major change
item.text_trans: At the beginning of this year, People's Literature Publishing House launched "Dream of Red Mansions" (collector's edition), and the author's signature on the title page became "(the first eighty) Cao Xueqin, (the last forty times) Anonymous continued, Cheng Weiyuan, Gao Wei finishing." When the new school book of "Dream of Red Mansions" was published in 1982, it was signed as "Cao Xueqin and Gao Biao". Significant changes have taken place today, which has caused widespread concern in the society.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)

item.text_trans: The new three edition will be available soon, this old version (two editions) is too many mistakes! Please pay attention! ! !

I bought 35 yuan, and today I came to the comment and found that it has risen by 10 yuan. The price increase of Amazon is harder than the stock market!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 昨天看了半天大家的对这套书的评论，有说好的，也有说不好的，心里也弄不清楚到底买不买了，总结一下，还是评论好的居多，于是就怀着“大不了上次当”的想法买了这套书。今天就拿到书了，速度真的挺快！第一次在卓越买东西，这一方面真的不错，配送服务一流！下面说书吧，总体还不错，肯定是正版书，标准的宋体五号字，1.5倍行距（和打印的大小一样），这么说大家就明白了。纸张也可以，单张纸的厚度和学校的教材书的纸的厚度差不多，可以了吧，呵呵。。。内容就不说了，因为还没看呢，呵呵呵要说稍微有点美中不足的是，纸张稍微有点发黑，但不是想象中的那么黑，只是黑一点点而已，想买的朋友尽可以放心买。两本书的厚度差不多，不是很厚，躺在床上看挺好的。人民文学出版社的书，50多块钱，我觉得挺值的对了还有朋友反映书的印刷是不是清晰，我可以负责人的回答，印刷十分清晰，想买的朋友大可放心。另外，买之前我还把此书和那个人民文学出版社的紫红皮的红楼梦做了比较，当然只是网上的一些评论，各有千秋吧，爱好插图的可以买这本，想研究深入些的可以买那本，都不错。
item.summary_trans: The process of buying a book online
item.text_trans: Yesterday, I watched the comments of this set of books for a long time. Some of them said that they are good, but they also said that they are not good. They can’t figure out whether they can buy or not. In summary, they still have a good comment, so they are not big. The idea of ​​"being last time" bought this set of books. I got the book today, and the speed is really fast! The first time I bought something in excellence, this is really good, and the delivery service is first class! Let's talk about it, the overall is not bad, it must be a genuine book, the standard Song No. 5 word, 1.5 times the line spacing (the same size as the print), so everyone will understand. Paper can also be, the thickness of the sheet of paper is similar to the thickness of the paper in the school textbook, you can, huh, huh. . . The content will not be said, because I haven't seen it yet, hehehe said that it is a little bit of a fly in the ointment, the paper is a bit black, but not as black as you think, just a little black, just want to buy a friend can rest assured to buy . The thickness of the two books is similar, not very thick, and it looks good in bed. The book of People's Literature Publishing House, more than 50 yuan, I think it is quite right. There are friends who reflect whether the printing of the book is clear. I can answer the person in charge, the printing is very clear, and the friends who want to buy can rest assured. In addition, before I bought this book, I also compared this book with the red-red dream of the purple-red skin of the People's Literature Publishing House. Of course, it is just some comments on the Internet. Each has its own merits. You can buy this book if you like it. If you want to study it, you can buy it. Ben, all good.

There are more than one hundred miles in the town of the county town, which brings me a lot of troubles. I hope to use the postal mail next time.

item.text_trans: The frame making is not ideal, the spine is not cloth is paper, the cover is cloth, and it is regrettable to cut corners! The ridged hardcover is still well done by the Zhonghua Book Company's philanthropic series! The collection of the Humanities Society is a pity.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 战神书写了流传世间千百年的神话，不老不死，战阵中浴血冲杀的亡灵很难想象文弱清癯的少年，如何成长为骁勇善战的武士......这个事件发生在千百年以前...（这些女子是否为人残忍的杀害？惨绝人寰的灭门惨案）以上都是我想说的话。
item.text_trans: God of War wrote the myth that has been passed down for thousands of years in the world. It is not old or dead. It is hard to imagine the weak and clear youngsters in the battlefield. How to grow into a brave warrior... This incident happened thousands of years ago. ... (Is these women cruelly murdered? The horrific killings of the people) These are all things I want to say.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)

item.text_trans: The first reading of "Dream of Red Mansions" recommended the Geng Yicheng version of the People's Literature (this book), or the dream draft version of Yuelu Shushe, or the Cheng Yi version of the writer.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 人民文学社两种通行版本的质量比较
item.text: 暗白封面《红楼梦》是由红学专家俞平伯先生校点启功先生作注的，有插图。与红色封面的中国古典文学读本从书相比，姑且不论内容上的得失，单就产品质量来看，无论纸印还是装订，白封本好得多。将两部放在一块，足可看出白封本是正版，而红封本则像仿制品。红封本纸张软，背胶薄，切割粗糙，像一次性消费品。曾经手买过几次，出自不同的承运商，都差强人意。可是，这又是读《红楼梦》绕不过去的通行版本。建议：《红楼梦》，选以上两种，相互参看。《三国演义》，两种皆可，选其一。《水浒传》和《西游记》最好选插图本，纸印和装订较好。红封本，2008年第3版，目前发现一个小小的错误：修订过的《前言》第2页“按生于乙未说是虚岁十四岁，按生于甲辰说是虚岁十五岁。”“十五岁”有误，1982年版《前言》说“五岁”应该是对的，因为在同一轮甲子纪年内，乙未年与甲辰年相距大致九年。
item.summary_trans: Comparison of the Quality of Two Popular Versions of People's Literature Society
item.text_trans: The dark cover "Dream of Red Mansions" was written by Mr. Yu Pingbo, the red expert, and Mr. Qi Gong, with illustrations. Compared with the red cover of the Chinese classical literature reading book, regardless of the content of the gains and losses, in terms of product quality, whether it is paper or binding, white seal is much better. Putting the two parts together, you can see that the white seal is genuine, and the red seal is like a fake. The red seal paper is soft, the adhesive is thin, and the cut is rough, like disposable consumer goods. I have bought it a few times, and I have been unsatisfactory by different carriers. However, this is another popular version of the book "Dream of Red Mansions". Suggestion: "Dream of Red Mansions", choose the above two, see each other. "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms", both can be chosen. "Water Margin" and "Journey to the West" are best to choose an illustration, paper printing and binding is better. Red Seal, 3rd edition in 2008, has found a small mistake: the revised "Foreword" on page 2 "By birth to B, it is said that it is 14 years old, and it is said that it is a fifteen year old. "The fifteen years old" is wrong. The 1982 edition of the "Foreword" said that "five-year-old" should be correct, because in the same round of the Jiazi years, the second year of the second year is about nine years away from the year of Jiachen.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 什么是质量呢？是内容还是纸张或者印刷？我认为内容才是最主要的，其次才讲印刷和纸张吧，当然，三者结合起来才是最棒的。迄今为止，国内出版的红楼梦，从校对到注释，再到受众，似乎还没一本能顶过这个的吧，这本依然是老中青三代阅读的最佳版本，是不二之选。人文版这“四大名著”目前最为人诟病的，大概就是纸张和装订了。纸张差但定价似乎也还算适中，因为是价格决定纸张。装订上，原来除三国外，都是三册，现在全部成两册了，特别是红楼梦，两册读起来确实不方便，这似乎也应该是人文社为了降低成本的举措吧。我倒是建议出版社在出版这个普及本的同时，再出版一种精装版，让想收藏的人可以拿来显摆，呵呵（其实在90年代初，人文社就出版过珍藏本，16K精装带函套，印刷装帧均十分精美，惟不大适合阅读，特别是携带，希望能出个32K精装，且每册不要太厚的）。
item.text_trans: What is quality? Is it content or paper or printing? I think that content is the most important thing. Secondly, it is about printing and paper. Of course, the combination of the three is the best. So far, the domestic publishing of the Dream of Red Mansions, from proofreading to annotations, to audiences, seems to have not yet been able to get through this, this is still the best version of the three generations of reading, is the best choice. The "four great masterpieces" of the humanities version are currently the most criticized, probably paper and binding. The paper is poor but the pricing seems to be moderate, because the price determines the paper. Binding, in addition to three foreign countries, are three volumes, now all into two volumes, especially the Dream of Red Mansions, the two books are really inconvenient to read, it seems that it should also be the Humanities Society in order to reduce costs. I would suggest that the publishing house publish a hardcover version at the same time as publishing this popular version, so that people who want to collect it can show it, huh, huh (in fact, in the early 1990s, the Humanities Society published a collection of books, 16K hardcover letter Sets, printing and binding are very beautiful, but not suitable for reading, especially carrying, I hope to produce a 32K hardcover, and each volume is not too thick).

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 本来还在犹豫到底这么多版本该选哪个，看见大家对这个版本评价那么高，于是就买了这个版的，结果拿到书以后很失望，印刷质量不怎么样，纸张很薄，都能看见反面的字了，给人感觉很劣质，虽然不相信卓越会卖盗版书，但这本似乎根盗版差不多，在卓越买了那么多书，这本的质量最差。
item.text_trans: I was still hesitating to choose which version of the version. I saw that everyone was so high on this version, so I bought this version. After I got the book, I was disappointed. The printing quality is not good. The paper is very thin and can be seen. The opposite word, it feels very inferior, although I don't believe that excellence will sell pirated books, but this seems to be almost the same as piracy. I bought so many books in excellence, the quality of this book is the worst.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 书是正版，感觉质量很好，物美价廉，到自提点去取件，还不要运费，很愉快的一次购物！
item.text_trans: The book is genuine, feels good quality, good quality and low price, to pick up the pieces from the point of mention, not to freight, very happy shopping!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 近几年人民文学出版社四大名著版本装帧水准大不如以前，平装不说，分册不合理，胶装过厚极易开裂，纸张也不好。看看家里收藏的十几、二十年前人文社的绸面精装32开、16开带书函的四大名著典藏本十分感慨！我常想，人文社如果再出一套值得收藏的四大名著典藏版，我还是会再收一套的。可惜多年愿望一直落空。人文社难道不能为爱书人、藏书人出版一套值得收藏的版本吗？不能把市场细化一下吗？
item.summary_trans: Why not come out of hardcover?
item.text_trans: In recent years, the editions of the four major masterpieces of People's Literature Publishing House are not as good as before. The paperback is not said. The volume is unreasonable. The glue is too thick and easy to crack, and the paper is not good. Look at the collection of more than a dozen or twenty years ago in the collection of the Humanities Society's silk face hardcover 32 open, 16 open book with four letters of the book is very emotional! I often think that if the Humanities Society has another set of four great collections worth collecting, I will still collect one more. Unfortunately, many years of wishes have been lost. Can the humanities community not publish a set worthy of collection for the book lovers and collectors? Can't you refine the market?

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 评论中诟病较多的纸张薄、书籍薄的问题，在我这儿没发现，或者不觉得。也就是说，对书籍的装帧质量很满意。对于书籍内容，特意看了评论中提及较多的几个地方，对于46回把凤姐评价鸳鸯的“可恶的”改为“极有心胸识见的丫头”，同样不解；对于这么大的改动，居然没有校记，更不可理解。
item.summary_trans: Just got the book, better than expected
item.text_trans: The problem of thin papers and thin books with more ills in the comments was not found in me, or I don’t think so. In other words, the quality of the book's binding is very satisfactory. For the contents of the book, I specially read a few places mentioned in the comments. For 46 times, I changed the "bad" of Feng’s evaluation to "the one who knows the most," but also for such a big change. There is no school record, but it is even more incomprehensible.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 把高鹗改成“无名氏”是一大进步，因为至今没有证据证明后四十回是高鹗写的，只能证明高鹗是整理者。不过这个第三版序言写的火气太大，一看就是要找人打架，我觉得这样权威的红楼梦校注本序言居然写得这样小家子气，真是太让人寒心了，某些红学“权威”的确是有些霸道。另外从第二版就看出有些修改其实不一定是好事，例如“冷月葬花魂”改成了“冷月葬诗魂”，从中看出校订组内部意见的不统一。
item.summary_trans: I hope that the better the better.
item.text_trans: It is a great progress to change the sorghum into "Anonymous", because there is no evidence to prove that the last forty is written by Gao Wei, only to prove that Gao 鹗 is the organizer. However, the preface to this third edition is too flamboyant. At first glance, it is to find someone to fight. I think that the predecessor of this authoritative red house dream book is actually written like such a small family. It is really chilling. Some red school "authority" is indeed Some are overbearing. In addition, it can be seen from the second edition that some modifications are not necessarily good things. For example, the "cold moon burial flower soul" has been changed to "cold moon burial poetry soul", from which it can be seen that the internal opinions of the school group are not uniform.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 《红楼梦》是一部百科全书式的长篇小说。以宝黛爱情悲剧为主线，以四大家族的荣辱兴衰为背景，描绘出18世纪中国封建社会的方方面面，以及封建专制下新兴资本主义民主思想的萌动。结构宏大、情节委婉、细节精致，人物形象栩栩如生，声口毕现，堪称中国古代小说中的经 典。
item.text_trans: "Dream of Red Mansions" is an encyclopedic novel. Taking Baodi’s love tragedy as the main line and the rise and fall of the four major families as the background, it depicts all aspects of Chinese feudal society in the 18th century and the burgeoning of emerging capitalist democratic thoughts under feudal autocracy. The structure is grand, the plot is euphemistic, the details are exquisite, the characters are vivid and the voices are vivid. It is a classic in Chinese ancient novels.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 是12年新批次印刷出厂的，有一层塑料纸覆膜。封皮和内页都是完全崭新毫无瑕疵，无污迹无缺页无错印，没有任何运输方面的人为损坏或者其他不妥之处。不知道为什么那么多人说这书质量不好，总之我拿到的胶印还是比较顺眼的，不至于翻翻就散架。
item.text_trans: It is a 12-year new batch of printing factory, with a layer of plastic paper film. The cover and the inner pages are completely new and flawless. There are no smudges and no missing pages. There is no man-made damage or other irregularities in transportation. I don't know why so many people say that the quality of this book is not good. In short, the offset printing I got is quite pleasing to the eye, so I won't fall apart.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹

item.text_trans: The color of the cover is not as deep as the picture, but it looks better~~~~ I hope I can finish reading this time~~~

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 上个星期四下的订单,今天就拿到手了.对于卓越的送货时间一直是很满意的.但是这上下两册书的纸张质量实在不敢恭维,感觉有些失望.前些天买的钱钟书的<围城>和<人兽鬼>的质量就很好,怎么这<红楼梦>的印刷那么差呢.希望卓越在进货的时候注重一下书本的纸张和印刷质量.
item.summary_trans: Paper printing quality is not very good
item.text_trans: The order placed last Thursday, I got it today. I have been very satisfied with the excellent delivery time. But the paper quality of the two books is really flattering, I feel a little disappointed. I bought the money clock a few days ago. The quality of the book 'Besieged City> and <Human Beasts> is very good. How can this printing of "Dream of Red Mansions" be so bad? I hope that excellence will pay attention to the paper and printing quality of books when purchasing.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 有农村的小朋友，想看中国的四大名著，我就买了。其实我一直没有怎么仔细看过这四大名著。红楼梦，我看不懂，那些书中的诗词不是我这个水平能欣赏的，只是看故事而已。希望孩子们能看懂一些。
item.text_trans: There are children in the countryside who want to see China's four famous books, I bought them. In fact, I have never looked at these four great masterpieces carefully. Dream of the Red Chamber, I can't understand, the poems in those books are not what I can appreciate at this level, just to read the story. I hope the children can understand some.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 此书总的印刷质量不错，但刚看了下当时的初版前言，就发现好几个错误。如雪芹的父亲写成“曹頫顒”，“五岁”写成“十五岁”...不知正文还有多少错误？人民文学出版社的质量应不错啊!怎么会这样呢？另外，如果印成三本且开本再大点就好了，两本太厚了，手拿书时太重!
item.text_trans: The total print quality of this book is good, but I just saw the preface of the first edition and found several errors. For example, Xue Qin’s father wrote “Cao Yuxi” and “Five-year-old” wrote “15-year-old”... I don’t know how many mistakes in the text? The quality of the People's Literature Publishing House should be good! How can this be? In addition, if you print three copies and open the book, it will be fine. The two books are too thick, and the book is too heavy when you take the book!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这到底是哪个版本啊？包装日期写2008年7月，出版日期是2004年8月，2008年7月的第三版是1602页，而且作者是曹雪芹和无名氏，书中注后四十回由程伟元和高鹗整理，希望卓越工作认真些，否则读者不知道如何下单了。
item.text_trans: Which version is this? The date of packaging is written in July 2008, the publication date is August 2004, and the third edition in July 2008 is 1602 pages, and the author is Cao Xueqin and Anonymous. After the note in the book, the 40th time is compiled by Cheng Weiyuan and Gao Wei. Excellent work is serious, otherwise the reader does not know how to place an order.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 共两本，每本都超厚超重，字还是挺清楚的，就是有点小，而且纸张比较薄，还有点发黄，这好像是这一版的四大名著共有的问题呀，人民文学出版社是要节约成本了吗？而且发货比平时慢很多，难道卓越亚马逊最近太繁忙了？
item.text_trans: A total of two books, each of which is super thick and overweight, the word is quite clear, it is a little small, and the paper is relatively thin, and there is a bit of yellowing. This seems to be a problem shared by the four famous books of this edition. People's Literature Publishing House Is it cost savings? And the shipment is much slower than usual. Is it that Amazon is too busy recently?

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 最初读《红楼梦》就是看得这个版本，校对精审，注释简明，值得推荐！
item.text_trans: The first reading of "Dream of Red Mansions" is to see this version, proofreading and review, concise notes, worthy of recommendation!

item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 看了很多的评论，褒贬不一，但还是下决心买了。等书来了之后发现，这是一套很好的书，无论是质的质量，印刷的质量，还是快递员的服务态度，都是令人满意的。
item.text_trans: I read a lot of comments, mixed, but still determined to buy. After the book came, it was found that this is a very good book, whether it is the quality of the quality, the quality of the printing, or the service attitude of the courier, are satisfactory.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 1.段落分解不合理，每章几乎很少有段落，看起来很不舒服。2.现在都说红楼梦的作者不能确定，这里还用高鹗，太不够严谨。3.十七十八章本该分开，可是没有分。
item.summary_trans: Can only make do with it
item.text_trans: 1. Paragraph decomposition is unreasonable. There are very few paragraphs in each chapter, which looks very uncomfortable. 2. Now it is said that the author of the Dream of Red Mansions cannot be sure that it is still sorghum, not too strict. 3. The seventeenth and eighteenth chapters should have been separated, but there is no division.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 纸张没有有的网友说的那样不堪，和书店一般书的纸张差不多。买之前最担心的是网友说的散页的问题，买回来后目前没发现胶水不牢的情况。。前天还不小心淋了雨。上册全淋湿了。但是书也没有散。这本书的注释比较详细。这个价钱买到这个版本这个质量的上下两册。个人认为很不错了。
item.text_trans: The papers that no one has said are as bad as the ones in the bookstore general book. The most worrying thing before buying is the problem of the loose leaf that the netizen said. After buying it, I have not found any glue that is not strong. . I was accidentally drenched the rain the day before yesterday. The whole book was wet. But the book is not scattered. The notes in this book are more detailed. This price buys two versions of this quality of this version. Personally think it is very good.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 由研究所新篇的版本，很明显地融合了近段时间新的红学研究成果，使这套书给人更专业更值得品味的感觉。阅读起来很舒服，合适的字体及大小、恰当的注释，让新接触这本书的人和老读友们都能各得其所。 真正喜欢读红楼梦的人想必对人生都有一种强烈的好奇心和探索欲。这部古典名著对今天我们的文化传承是一种载体，也是一盏指示灯。作为80后，我对这部书的感悟灵感仿佛来源于骨子里，也许大家都是一样的，因为我们都在中国这片土地上生活着，因为我们都呼吸着华夏文明的空气。。。
item.text_trans: From the new version of the Institute, it is clear that the new red research results have been combined in recent times, making this set of books more professional and more worthy of taste. It's comfortable to read, the right font and size, and the right annotations, so that new people and old readers can get what they want. Those who really like to read the Dream of Red Mansions must have a strong curiosity and desire to explore. This classical masterpiece is a carrier for today's cultural heritage and a light indicator. As a post-80s, my inspiration for this book seems to come from the bones. Maybe everyone is the same, because we all live on this land in China, because we all breathe the air of Chinese civilization. . .

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 上世纪八十年代就购买过，4.1元，都翻散了，购买一套新的收藏！
item.text_trans: Purchased in the 1980s, 4.1 yuan, all turned over, buy a new collection!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 书脊的胶太薄了，买的《西游记》到手有一本书脊就是折的。《红楼梦》的印刷没问题，纸张薄一些也还行，只是由于书厚，打开放在床上，自己马上变成了两本，倒是有封面连着。另一本也是天生来就是书脊轻微开裂的，等看到那本后，分开是一定的。请人民文学出版社要求印刷厂制作上用些好胶。我准备用吹风机把胶吹软，试试。哪位朋友有好的办法也请告诉我。

The printing of "Dream of Red Mansions" is no problem, and the paper is thinner. It is just because the book is thick and opened on the bed. It immediately became two books, but there is a cover attached. The other one is also born to be a slight crack in the spine. After seeing the book, the separation is certain. Please ask the People's Literature Publishing House to ask the printing factory to use some good glue. I am going to blow the glue with a hair dryer and try it. Please tell me which friend has a good way.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 《红楼梦》校注本第三版（2008年7月）正式出版
item.text: 《红楼梦》校注本三版序言 本书初版于1982年，至今忽忽已历二十五周年，发行量已逾三百五十万套。1994年，当此书面世十二年的时候，我们曾修订过一次，改正了初版中的一些疏漏讹误，也吸收了红学研究上的新成果。现在距离上一次的修订，又已过了十三个年头。红学是一门最具群众性的学问，它拥有的研究队伍和读者，可能远比其他学科的人数要多得多。这十三年的过程，在红学的研究上，自然又有很多的收获，因此，我们决定再次进行修订。
item.summary_trans: The third edition of the "Dream of Red Mansions" is officially published (July 2008)
item.text_trans: The Preface to the Third Edition of "Dream of Red Mansions" The first edition of this book was published in 1982. It has been the 25th anniversary of the past, and the circulation has exceeded 3.5 million sets. In 1994, when the written world was twelve years old, we revised it once, corrected some of the omissions in the first edition, and absorbed new results in the study of red studies. It’s been 13 years since the last revision. Redology is one of the most mass-oriented scholarships. It has a much larger research team and readers than any other discipline. In the course of these thirteen years, in the study of Hongxue, there are naturally many gains. Therefore, we decided to make revisions again.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 建议出版一套更加经典的四大名著
item.text: 作为中国传播最广的文学名著，目前世面上出版的四大名著不下上百种，但质量参差不齐，总之大多都是为一个“钱”字，可以说没有一本作为传家之宝让人珍藏一辈子。人民文学出版社出版的四大名著相对较好，但问题也不少：一是新版没有精装本，不好存放，也没档次；二是装订质量不高，中间容易断裂，特别是《红楼梦》非要装成两卷本，实在太厚；三是选择的版本不够统一，太过芜杂，读者意见较大。因此，建议人民文学出版社认真总结过去出版四大名著的经验教训，精益求精，下决心出版一套质量更高、读者更满意的精典版本！
item.summary_trans: It is recommended to publish a more classic four classics.
item.text_trans: As the most widely disseminated literary classic in China, there are currently no fewer than one hundred masterpieces published in the world, but the quality is uneven. In short, most of them are for a "money". It can be said that none of them is a treasure of the family. People treasure a lifetime. The four famous works published by People's Literature Publishing House are relatively good, but there are also many problems: First, the new version has no hardcover, not good storage, and no grade; second, the quality of binding is not high, and the middle is easy to break, especially "Dream of Red Mansions" It is too thick to be loaded into two volumes; the third is that the selected version is not uniform enough, too noisy, and the readers have a larger opinion. Therefore, it is recommended that People's Literature Publishing House carefully summarize the lessons and lessons of the past four famous masterpieces, strive for excellence, and resolve to publish a classic version with higher quality and more satisfying readers!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 红楼梦对这本书的评论太多了。绝对世界数一数二的大师级作品顶礼膜拜，中国能有红楼梦曹雪芹幸甚，我们能看到更是不知占了多大便宜，同时也为把模糊的记忆清洗了一下让他永远留在我们心中。（后40回是高鄂续作看看也无妨）但那绝不是曹公的笔墨更不是他老人家的原意。 套用电影罗马假日片尾，有记者问安妮公主您最喜欢世界哪个城市，她说罗马。要是有人问我你读过的书中最喜欢哪部我也会像她怀揣的情感这样说：“红楼梦，红楼梦无疑是红楼梦！
item.text_trans: A Dream of Red Mansions has too many comments on this book. Absolutely one of the best masterpieces in the world, we can have a dream of red dreams. Cao Xueqin is fortunate. We can see how much it is cheap, and at the same time clean up the vague memory so that he will stay in our hearts forever. (The last 40 times is a high-level sequel to see if it is no problem.) But that is not the original intention of Cao Gong is not the original intention of his old man. Applying the movie Roman holiday ending, a reporter asked Princess Anne what city you like most, she said Rome. If someone asks me which book you like the most, I will say like her emotions: "Dream of Red Mansions, Dream of Red Mansions is undoubtedly a Dream of Red Mansions!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 人民文学出版社目前市场上的红楼梦整理本主要有两种，一种是红楼梦研究所以庚辰本为底本的校注本，目前最新的是第三版（淡红色封面）。另一种是俞平伯校本，底本是戚序本，启功注释（白色封面或中学生新课标本）。这本书就是俞校本，但不明白卓越为什么缺货，北京各书店都有大量销售，人文出版社也就在北京，居然缺货。
item.text_trans: The People's Literature Publishing House currently has two main types of Dream of Red Mansions on the market. One is the study of the Dream of Red Mansions, so Geng Chen is the base of the school, and the latest is the third edition (light red cover). The other is Yu Pingbo's school, the bottom is the preface, the Qigong notes (white cover or new student specimens). This book is Yu School, but I don't understand why excellence is out of stock. There are a lot of sales in Beijing bookstores. The Humanities Publishing House is also in Beijing, and it is out of stock.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 我得到书后，看了非常愤怒，他们竟然偷天换日，不加任何校注，就把原文给改了，第25回赵姨娘跟马道婆说的加进了“真真把人气杀，叫人一言难尽。我白和你打个赌”，第46回615页行5，把“可恶的”改为“极有心胸识见的丫头”，我估计是采用的程本，但他们不敢在校注中说明，怕读者骂！混蛋们以为是“择善而从”，其实是点金成铁！更何况违背基本的校订原则！敢于这么干并最终拍板的，只有冯其庸！请问，出现了这种情况，所谓的权威校本，还有一点点价值吗？我气得写不下去了，读者自己体察吧！
item.text_trans: After I got the book, I was very angry. They turned the day and changed the day. Without any school note, they changed the original text. The 25th time Zhao Yu Niang and Ma Daopo said that it was added. "It’s really killing people. It’s hard to say. White and you bet", the 46th line on page 615, line 5, changed the "detestable" to "very eager to see the girl", I guess it is the use of Chengben, but they dare not explain in the school note, afraid Readers! The bastards thought it was "choosing good and getting from", in fact, it was a golden iron! Not to mention the basic principles of revision! Dare to do this and finally make a decision, only Feng Qiyong! Excuse me, has this situation, the so-called authoritative school, is there a little value? I can't write it, and the readers can see it!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: “从《红楼梦》反映的思想倾向来看，作者具有初步的民主主义思想，他对现实社会包括宫廷及官场的黑暗，封建贵族阶级及其家庭的腐朽，封建的科举制度、婚姻制度、奴婢制度、等级制度，以及与此相适应的社会统治思想即孔孟之道和程朱理学、社会道德观念等等，都进行了深刻的批判并且提出了朦胧的带有初步民主主义性质的理想和主张。这些理想和主张正是当时正在滋长的资本主义经济萌芽因素的曲折反映”。写这句话的人就是文化上的卖国贼！
item.text_trans: "From the perspective of the ideological tendency reflected in "Dream of Red Mansions", the author has preliminary democratic ideas. His darkness to the real society, including the court and officialdom, the decay of the feudal aristocracy and his family, the feudal imperial examination system, the marriage system, and the slave system. The hierarchical system, and the social ruling thoughts that are compatible with it, namely the Confucius and Mencius, the Cheng and Zhu philosophical studies, the social moral concepts, etc., have all been deeply criticized and put forward the ideals and propositions with the initial democratic nature. And the claim is the tortuous reflection of the budding factors of the capitalist economy that was growing at the time." The person who wrote this sentence is a cultural traitor!

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 方便一般阅读者阅读的本子
item.text: 这套《红楼梦》所据的是程乙本，也就是程伟元和高鹗在程甲本之后修补印制的第二个本子，也即《红楼梦》这部书作为一部完整的一百二十回著作的第二次亮相，其内容较程甲本多出约两万字，对一些初印中的疏漏进行了增补，例如，补上了程甲本中没有的《芙蓉女儿诔》，使全书更加完整。它的印行，结束了《红楼梦》的传抄时代，使《红楼梦》得到了广泛传播，可以称为《红楼》功臣（自然，从另一个角度说，有人亦将它贬为曹氏罪人）。 诚然，程乙本对《红楼梦》原稿的偏离较其他那些抄本，甚至程甲本更严重。但如果不是搞专业的红学研究，从普及性阅读的角度出发，我则认为程乙本其实倒不失为一个普及《红楼梦》的较好的全本。作家出版社的这套书封面精致，注释得当，我认为是便于一般读者阅读的，值得向大家推荐。 当然，如果还想进一步研究诸本异同，沿波讨源，那么可以再来看看其他的抄本（但抄本毕竟都不全，最终还是要靠印本补全，例如炒的很火的周汝昌汇校本毕竟只有八十回，不便普通读者观瞻）。印象中，中华书局出过程甲本，影响最大的人民文学出版社版是以庚辰本为底本，另外还有其他的一些本子大家都可以参考。
item.summary_trans: a book that is convenient for general readers to read.
item.text_trans: This set of "Dream of Red Mansions" is based on Cheng Yiben, the second book that Cheng Weiyuan and Gao Wei repaired and printed after Cheng Jiaben, that is, the book "Dream of Red Mansions" as a complete book of 120 books. The second appearance, its content is about 20,000 words more than Cheng Jiaben, and some omissions in the initial printing have been supplemented. For example, the "Furong Daughter", which is not included in Cheng Jiaben, has been added to make the whole book more complete. Its printing has ended the era of the "Dream of Red Mansions", which has made "Dream of Red Mansions" widely spread. It can be called the "Red House" hero (naturally, from another perspective, some people have also turned it into a sinner of Cao). It is true that Cheng Yiben’s deviation from the manuscript of A Dream of Red Mansions is more serious than that of other manuscripts. However, if it is not for professional red studies, from the perspective of universal reading, I think that Cheng Yiben is actually a better copy of the popular "Dream of Red Mansions". The book cover of the writer's publishing house is exquisite and well-documented. I think it is convenient for general readers to read. It is worth recommending to everyone. Of course, if you want to further study the similarities and differences, and ask for the source along the wave, then you can look at other transcripts (but the transcripts are not complete after all, and ultimately you still have to rely on the prints to complete, such as the very hot fire of the Zhou Yichang school, after all, only Eighty times, it is inconvenient for ordinary readers to see). Impression, Zhonghua Book Company out of the process, the most influential People's Literature Publishing House is based on Geng Chen, and there are other books that everyone can refer to.

item.name: 红楼梦(套装上下册)(人民文学版新版)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 1. 乌托邦与田园牧歌1.1乌托邦乌托邦（Eutopia）是什么？有很长一段时间人们强调它的不可实现性，却忽视了它真正的内在涵义与倾向，在《希望的原理》的导言中，布洛赫认为“乌托邦的”是个褒义词，也即与人类相称的希望及其包括的全部内容。实际上，这个概念所标示的东西存在于逐渐能够容纳任何所与物的意识的边缘域（horizon）中，存在于越升越高的上升的视野边缘（horizon）中。朝向尚未实现的可能性的盼望、希望和意向，它们并不仅仅是人类意识的基本特性；如果得到具体的教正和把握，那么它们也是客观实在整体的一个基本的规定性（determination）（陈岸瑛.2000）。对于对象的论述包括两个部分，一方面是对乌托邦形态构成的描述，另一方面其次是对乌托邦与现实的关系进行描述，同时分析乌托邦本身和他的创造者。3 大观园余英时认为，曹雪芹在《红楼梦》里创造了两个鲜明而对比的世界。这两个世界，分别把它们称为 “乌托邦的世界”和“现实的世界”。这两个世界，落实到《红楼梦》这部书中便是大观园的世界和大观园以外的世界（余英时.2001）。这两个世界的对立主要在于“情”与“淫”上，本文主要借用他的说法进行阐述。3.1 大观园的产生余英时认为大观园便是太虚幻境的人间投影，庚辰本脂批有这样一条： 大观园系玉兄与十二钗之太虚玄境，岂可草率？这里“玄境”的“玄”字其实就是“幻”字，一定是抄者的笔误，因为这一条里还有好几字写错了。所以根据脂砚斋的看法，大观园便是太虚幻境的人间投影（余英时.2001）。而贾宝玉梦游太虚幻境的所见与大观园有诸多重合。在现实的建造过程中，大观园的现实基址主要是由两处旧园于合成的：即宁府的会芳园和贾赦住的荣府旧园。这两个园子都是现实世界上最肮脏的所在，而却为后来大观园这个最清净的理想世界提供了建造原料和基址。《红楼梦》中干净的理想世界是建筑在最肮脏的现实世界的基础之上（余英时.2001）。3.3 “大观园”与现实“大观园”虽然是曹雪芹构造的理想的乌托邦，但是它与现实的关系密切，前述它的原址是现实中最肮脏的所在，而且通过“黛玉葬花”的情节显示了它与外部的肮脏世界仍有联系，只能保持自我的精神清洁，最后在外部世界的入侵之下，“大观园”最终分崩离析，走向覆灭。作为乌托邦的“大观园”与现实的关系有三点值得关注，首先它是源自现实，与现实世界有着一定的交流；其次乌托邦中的人们虽然厌恶外部世界，但是对现实不是没有认知，只是尽量抗拒外部世界；最后，现实世界毕竟在力量上大大强于乌托邦，所以不可避免的走向覆灭，因为它在本质上是为了与现实相立而存在的，所以它越是美好的部分，被毁灭得就越彻底。4 从“桃花源”到“大观园”相较于陶渊明的“桃花源”，曹雪芹创造的“大观园”虽然同样是一种对于现实的反动，却与现实有着更密切的联系，而最重要的是他又亲手毁灭了他的乌托邦。在这里，中国的“士”不再纠缠于价值趋向相异的救世与自救两大价值体系（虽然这倒是一个相互补充的整体，“士”从中总是立于不败之地），而是清醒地认识到历史演进的规律，历史在某种程度上来说是不以人的意志为转移的，特别是人的努力总是在同一水准上回旋时。虽然无法提供建设性的道路，但至少不在原地徘徊，乌托邦的“大观园”是直面惨淡的人生的产物，虽然它是一个“无”，但是是新的建设的起点。从“桃花源”到“大观园”，中国古典文学所营造的乌托邦在延绵了近2000年后走向毁灭.《红楼梦》中的大观园蕴涵了乌托邦理念的精髓，尽管最后曹雪芹又自己粉碎了它。而《红楼梦》的终极维度则是佛教的“空”，这使得《红楼梦》的世界中没有一个新的历史观念和历史景象的维度，这个新的维度也可以说就是“现代性”。所以《红楼梦》是无法展现历史远景形象（未来的时间指向）的小说，它的最终结局只能是覆灭，用《红楼梦》的语言即“白茫茫大地真干净”，这是一种关于真正的颓败的文学和历史寓言（吴晓东.2006）。“现代性”，这个西方文化的词汇预示着前进的方向，然而缺少了启蒙阶段的学习成果，终究是值得怀疑的。在作为乌托邦的“大观园”覆灭后，新的乌托邦是否还有必要建立？
item.text_trans: 1. Utopia and idyllic pastoral 1.1 Utopia Utopia (Eutopia) What is it? For a long time, people emphasized its unreality, but ignored its true inner meaning and inclination. In the introduction of Principles of Hope, Bloch considered "Utopian" to be a derogatory term, that is, with human beings. Proportional hope and all that it includes. In fact, what is marked by this concept exists in the edge of the consciousness that gradually accommodates any object, and exists in the rising horizon of the rising horizon. The hope, hope and intention towards the unrealized possibilities are not only the basic characteristics of human consciousness; if they are specifically taught and grasped, they are also a basic determination of the objective reality (Chen Anzhen. 2000). The discussion of the object consists of two parts, one is the description of the Utopia form, and the other is the description of the relationship between Utopia and reality, and the Utopia itself and his creators. 3 Grand View Garden Yu Yingshi believes that Cao Xueqin created two distinct and contrasting worlds in The Dream of Red Mansions. These two worlds refer to them as “the world of Utopia” and “the world of reality”. These two worlds, implemented in the book "Dream of Red Mansions", are the world of Grand View Garden and the world outside the Grand View Garden (Yu Yingshi. 2001). The opposition between these two worlds lies mainly in "love" and "obscenity". This article mainly uses his arguments to elaborate. 3.1 The production of the Grand View Garden Yu Yingshi believes that the Grand View Garden is a human projection of the illusory world. There is such a kind of Gengchen Benzhi: The Grand View Garden is a sinister and awkward. The word "Xuan" in "Xuanjing" is actually the word "magic", which must be the typo of the copywriter, because there are still many words in this article that are wrong. Therefore, according to the view of Zhi Yanzhai, the Grand View Garden is a human projection of the illusory world (Yu Yingshi. 2001). And Jia Baoyu’s dreams of being too illusory have many overlaps with the Grand View Garden. In the actual construction process, the realistic base of the Grand View Garden is mainly composed of two old gardens: the Huifang Garden in Ningfu and the Old Garden in Rongfu. These two gardens are the dirtiest places in the real world, but they provide the raw materials and base for the most clean ideal world of Grand View Garden. The clean ideal world in A Dream of Red Mansions is based on the most dirty real world (Yu Yingshi. 2001). 3.3 “Grand View Garden” and reality “Daguan Garden” is the ideal utopia of Cao Xueqin's structure, but it is closely related to reality. The original site is the dirtiest place in reality, and it is displayed through the plot of “Jade Jade Funeral Flower”. It is still connected with the dirty world outside, and can only keep the spirit clean of the self. Finally, under the invasion of the outside world, the "Grand View Garden" eventually fell apart and went to the end. As the relationship between Utopia's "Grand View Garden" and reality, there are three points worthy of attention. First, it is derived from reality and has certain communication with the real world. Secondly, people in Utopia are not ignorant of the outside world, but they are not aware of reality. Resist the external world; in the end, the real world is much stronger than Utopia in power, so it is inevitable to go to destruction, because it exists in essence to live with reality, so the more beautiful it is, it is destroyed. The more thorough. 4 From “Peach Blossom Spring” to “Daguan Garden” compared to Tao Yuanming’s “Peach Blossom Spring”, Cao Xueqin’s “Daguan Garden” is also a reaction to reality, but it has a closer relationship with reality, and the most important thing is that he Destroyed his utopia by hand. Here, China's "shi" is no longer entangled in the two value systems of salvation and self-rescue, which have different values. (Although this is a complementary whole, "Shi" is always in an invincible position), but Clearly aware of the laws of historical evolution, history is not transferred to some extent by human will, especially when human efforts always circulate at the same level. Although it is impossible to provide a constructive road, at least not in the same place, the Utopia “Grand View Garden” is the product of a bleak life. Although it is a “nothing”, it is the starting point of a new construction. From "Peach Blossom Spring" to "Daguan Garden", the Utopia created by Chinese classical literature has been ruined for nearly 2000 years. The Grand View Garden in "Dream of Red Mansions" contains the essence of the Utopian concept, although in the end Cao Xueqin himself crushed it. The ultimate dimension of "Dream of Red Mansions" is the "emptiness" of Buddhism. This makes the world of "Dream of Red Mansions" without a new historical concept and the dimension of historical scene. This new dimension can also be said to be "modernity". Therefore, "Dream of Red Mansions" is a novel that cannot display the historical vision image (the future time direction). Its final ending can only be destroyed. The language of "Dream of Red Mansions" is "the white earth is really clean", which is a kind of real Degraded literature and historical fables (Wu Xiaodong. 2006). "Modernity", the vocabulary of Western culture heralds the direction of progress, but the lack of learning outcomes in the enlightenment stage is ultimately questionable. After the "Great View Garden" as a Utopia is destroyed, is it necessary to establish a new Utopia?

item.name: 中国古典文学读本丛书:权威定本四大名著(人民文学版)(套装共8册)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.summary: 有好有坏吧，第一次体验亚马逊购物。
item.text: 书不错，快递准时，纸张质量好，字迹清洗大小适中。但三国演义这套上册的封皮粘贴错位，向下错位，看着别扭，有点盗版的感觉。再就是物流包裹无纸箱及塑料气泡的保护，只是一个塑料袋装着，易在运输中损坏。希望改善以上不足，发扬好的。
item.summary_trans: There are good and bad, first experience Amazon shopping.
item.text_trans: The book is good, the delivery is on time, the paper quality is good, and the writing is clean and the size is moderate. But the cover of the three kingdoms in the book is misplaced, misplaced, looking awkward, a bit pirated. Then there is the protection of the logistics package without carton and plastic bubbles, just a plastic bag, easy to damage in transportation. I hope to improve the above deficiencies and carry forward well.

item.name: 中国古典文学读本丛书:权威定本四大名著(人民文学版)(套装共8册)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 中午买了一套价格129元，下午再买的时候137.9元了，今天又变回129元了，价格浮动机制真值得夸赞！！！我都没有更好的词汇形容这机制了。书的纸质量如前所描述，可以接受但是说不上好。
item.text_trans: At noon, I bought a set price of 129 yuan, and when I bought it in the afternoon, it was 137.9 yuan. Today, it has changed back to 129 yuan. The price floating mechanism is really worthy of praise! ! ! I have no better vocabulary to describe this mechanism. The paper quality of the book is as described above, acceptable but not good.

item.name: 中国古典文学读本丛书:权威定本四大名著(人民文学版)(套装共8册)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这套名著早就读过，买来只是为了收藏。在书店反复的对比，最终选定了人民文学版的这套，这是现存的最权威，装帧、排版都最好的版本，但是可惜是平装版，很希望人文再出一套精装版的四大名著，作为收藏更有价值，上套精装版是98年出的，这版是08年出的，要等到精装版还不知道何年，主要是身为高中老师手头没有套四大名著怎么行！推荐人文这套。
item.text_trans: This set of classics has been read for a long time, bought only for collection. Repeated comparisons in the bookstore, the final selection of the People's Literature version of this set, this is the most authoritative version of the existing, binding, typesetting are the best version, but unfortunately it is a paperback version, I hope that the humanities will come out with a hardcover version of the four The famous book is more valuable as a collection. The hardcover version of the last set was released in 1998. This version was released in 2008. I don’t know what year I’m waiting for the hardcover edition. It’s mainly because the high school teacher doesn’t have four masterpieces. Row! Recommend the human body this set.

item.name: 中国古典文学读本丛书:权威定本四大名著(人民文学版)(套装共8册)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这套四大名著是目前出版的最为权威的版本。花了152.70元现大洋，本来是想买一个高品质的，可是，到手以后才发现印装质量真的不敢恭维，太糟糕！除了扉页还看得出来保留了初版时的原汁原味而外，封面的用纸、色彩、沈尹默的题字，正文的纸张、文字的清晰度、排版的整齐度……与20世纪70、80、90年代我见过的那些版本相比，简直是大降格调！尤其是两本《西游记》，边角粘胶处居然有破损——不能不批评人民文学出版社：堂堂的知名出版社，为何在21世纪的今天，竟然要用劣质的纸张、劣质的印刷、劣质的装订来糊弄广大四大名著的爱好者！？——真的是自己砸自己的牌子！！！试想：如此重要的经典，交给中华书局、商务印书馆印装会如何？一定比人民文学出版社不知高出多少格调。——可是呢，你看看 ，人民文学出版社出版的什么《哈利波特》之类的外国作品、什么莫言之流的《丰乳肥臀》，那包装是多么的豪华、多么的精美！这说明什么呢？说明人民文学出版社现在被某些没有文化的急功近利之徒把控着，他们大概都弄不清楚什么是真正的文化了！另外，亚马逊也真是啊，前天才表扬商务馆的钱穆《国史大纲》质量很好，可是今天就给我送来了质量低劣的四大名著。鄙人再次提醒亚马逊，要做精品才能赢得客户的尊敬！ 不要沦为某些不负责任的出版社的废品中转站！咱们消费者付给你们的可是真金白银！！！
item.summary_trans: The book is a good book, the print is too bad
item.text_trans: This set of four famous books is the most authoritative version currently published. I spent 152.70 yuan on the ocean. I wanted to buy a high quality. However, I found that the quality of the prints was really flattering when I got it, too bad! In addition to the title page, it can be seen to preserve the authenticity of the first edition, the paper on the cover, the color, the inscription of Shen Yinmo, the paper of the text, the clarity of the text, the uniformity of the typesetting... and the 70s and 80s of the 20th century. Compared to the versions I have seen in the 1990s, it is a big drop! In particular, the two "Journey to the West", the corner of the viscose is actually damaged - can not help but criticize the People's Literature Publishing House: the famous publishing house, why in the 21st century today, even inferior paper, inferior printing Inferior binding to fool the fans of the four great masterpieces! ? - Really own your own brand! ! ! Imagine: How important is this important classic to the Zhonghua Book Company and the Commercial Press? It must be higher than the People's Literature Publishing House. - But, look at what foreign works like Harry Potter published by People's Literature Publishing House, and what is the "female breasts and fat hips" of Mo Yan, how luxurious and beautiful the packaging is. ! What is this indicating? Explain that the People's Literature Publishing House is now being controlled by some unscrupulous and quick-minded people who are not aware of what is true culture! In addition, Amazon is also really ah, the day before the praise of the business museum's Qian Mu "national history outline" quality is very good, but today sent me four inferior quality masterpieces. The monks once again reminded Amazon to be a boutique to win the respect of customers! Don't be a waste transfer station for some irresponsible publishers! What the consumers pay you is real money! ! !

item.name: 中国古典文学读本丛书:权威定本四大名著(人民文学版)(套装共8册)
item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 《中国古典文学读本丛书:权威定本四大名著(人民文学版)》内容简介：四大名著是中国古典小说不同类别的代表作，下面分别介绍内容：《红楼梦》：红楼梦》是一部百科全书式的长篇小说。以宝黛爱情悲剧为主线，以四大家族的荣辱兴衰为背景，描绘出18世纪中国封建社会的方方面面，以及封建专制下新兴资本主义民主思想的萌动。结构宏大、情节委婉、细节精致，人物形象栩栩如生，声口毕现，堪称中国古代小说中的经典。 《水浒传》是一部以农民起义为题材的优秀长篇小说，取材于北宋末年宋江起义的历史事件及由此繁衍的民间传说。小说以水泊梁山为背景，以人物性格描写为主线，活画出一大批有血有肉、仗义豪勇的英雄好汉。《三国演义》是中国古代第一部长篇章回小说，是历史演义小说的经典之作。小说描写了东汉末年和整个三国时代以曹操、刘备、孙权为首的魏、蜀、吴三个政治、军事集团之间的矛盾和斗争。在广阔的社会历史背景上，展示出那个时代尖锐复杂又极具特色的政治军事冲突，在政治、军事谋略方面，对后世产生了深远的影响。《西游记》由明代小说家吴承恩在民间流传的唐僧取经故事和相关话本、杂剧的基础上编撰而成。这部神魔小说的代表作以孙悟空出世、大闹天宫为开端，以唐僧师徒四人西天取经、历经九九八十一难的故事为主线，融合了佛、道、儒三家的思想和内容，既让佛、道两教的仙人们同时登场表演，又在神佛的世界里注入了现实社会的人情世态，亦庄亦谐，妙趣横生。这种特点，赢得了各种文化层次的读者的爱好。
item.text_trans: "Chinese Classical Literature Reader Series: The Four Masterpieces of Authoritative Books (People's Literature Edition)" Introduction: The four famous classics are representative works of different categories of Chinese classical novels. The following are the contents: "Dream of Red Mansions": Dream of Red Mansions is an encyclopedia The novel. Taking Baodi’s love tragedy as the main line and the rise and fall of the four major families as the background, it depicts all aspects of Chinese feudal society in the 18th century and the burgeoning of emerging capitalist democratic thoughts under feudal autocracy. The structure is grand, the plot is euphemistic, the details are exquisite, the characters are vivid and the voices are vivid. It is a classic in ancient Chinese novels. "Water Margin" is an excellent novel with the theme of peasant uprising. It is based on the historical events of the Songjiang Uprising in the late Northern Song Dynasty and the folklore that has been propagated. The novel takes Shuibo Liangshan as the background, and depicts the characters as the main line, and draws a large number of heroes with flesh and blood and arrogance. The Romance of the Three Kingdoms is the first chapter of the ancient Chinese classics, and is a classic of historical romance novels. The novel depicts the contradictions and struggles between the three political and military groups of Wei, Yi and Wu led by Cao Cao, Liu Bei and Sun Quan in the late Eastern Han Dynasty and the whole Three Kingdoms. On the broad social and historical background, it shows the political and military conflicts of the era that are sharp and complex and distinctive. In terms of political and military strategies, they have had a profound impact on future generations. "Journey to the West" was compiled by the Ming Dynasty novelist Wu Chengen on the basis of the story of the Tang dynasty and the related words and dramas. The masterpiece of this magical novel is based on the birth of Sun Wukong and the clamoring of the Heavenly Palace. The story of the three masters of the Tang dynasty and the ninth day of the dynasty is the main line of the story. It combines the thoughts and contents of Buddhism, Taoism and Confucianism. It not only allows the celestial beings of Buddhism and Taoism to perform at the same time, but also injects into the world of humanity in the world of the gods and buddhas, which is also harmonious and interesting. This feature has won the hobby of readers of all cultural levels.

item.text: 举个例说，《红楼梦》第三版出到现在都三年有余了，还不见精装本的影子，这出版社的效率够差的吧。这是古籍普及读物，印数惊人，价格似乎不必高高在上，×当几天前才卖123元，可见利润空间相当大。还是再拿《红楼梦》说事吧，这书是红研所校注的，该不会是他们业余加班做的吧，那他们就不应该拿太多的稿酬，毕竟这是他们的份内事，毕竟他们拿的是纳税人的钱。人文社也是的。一句话，要和谐。
item.text_trans: For example, the third edition of "Dream of Red Mansions" has been more than three years since its inception, and the shadow of hardcover is not seen yet. The efficiency of this publishing house is poor enough. This is a popular book for ancient books, the number of prints is amazing, the price does not seem to be high, X was only sold a few days ago, 123 yuan, showing that the profit margin is quite large. Or take the "Dream of Red Mansions" to say something, this book is the school of the Red Research Institute, it will not be their amateur overtime work, then they should not take too much remuneration, after all, this is their internal affairs, After all, they are taking the taxpayer's money. The humanities community is also. In a word, be harmonious.

item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 这是四大古典小说最好的版本，只可惜一真没有出版精装本。我希望人民文学出版社隆重出版这套书的不同需要版本。精心设计精裝本。我希望精装本红楼梦印成布面精装本上中下三冊，不要印成上下冊，太厚不便阅读。开本以16开为宜,字体可以大一些，方便不同视力读者。封内可以把人文版红楼梦封面画印上以作为对红楼梦出版的纪念。红楼梦作者应署曹雪芹著程伟元高鄂补定。如此，才算代表世界水平的中国红楼梦！强烈期待者！
item.text_trans: This is the best version of the four classic novels, but unfortunately there is no hardcover edition. I hope the People's Literature Publishing House will publish a different version of the book. Carefully designed hardcover. I hope that the hardcover red dreams will be printed on the hardcover of the cloth. I don't want to print them in the first and third volumes. It is too thick and inconvenient to read. The opening is preferably 16, and the font can be larger to facilitate different visual readers. The seal of the human version of the Dream of Red Mansions can be printed on the cover as a commemoration of the publication of the Dream of Red Mansions. The author of the Red Mansion Dream should be commissioned by Cao Xueqin to Cheng Weiyuan Gao E. In this way, it is the China Red Mansion Dream that represents the world level! Strongly looking forward to!

item.author: 曹雪芹
item.text: 200-120活动买的，折算下来接近70块，很超值。这一套为了收藏，有一套89年印刷的了，那时除了三国，其他三部都是三本的。我觉得老版的好，《红楼梦》弄成两本太厚了，阅读翻起来不方便。而且老版的里面有好多精美的彩色插图，很有艺术性。拆了一套《三国演义》仔细比较，新版每页排多一行，其他连注释都是一样的。就是纸张稍微薄点，封面拿着手感还行，但不是压膜的好像不耐折腾，容易脏和损坏。总之，人文版的四大名著还是最值得推荐的。
item.summary_trans: Still the old version is good
item.text_trans: 200-120 activities bought, converted to nearly 70, very value. This set is for collection, there is a set of printing in 1989, then in addition to the three countries, the other three are three. I think the old version is good. The "Dream of Red Mansions" made two books too thick, and it is not convenient to read them. And there are a lot of beautiful color illustrations in the old version, which is very artistic. item.summary: 对投资也有帮助的一本书
item.text: - 评分：★★★★★- 为何选择该评分？ 第一次读《论语》，书中仔细介绍了相关的典故知识，原文，译文，题解等等。还把重要的弟子，历史人物，孔子思想进行了总结，描述。- 您对哪些满意或不满意？自己文言文基础薄弱，原文读起来比较费劲。幸好译文清楚明白。- 您会向谁推荐此书？读论语，能读到很多平日耳熟能详的句子。孔子思想确实非常博大精深，对现实生活有很大的帮助，甚至投资方面。《论语》是一本必读书。
item.summary_trans: a book that is also helpful for investment
item.text_trans: - Rating: ★★★★★- Why choose this rating? The first time I read The Analects, the book carefully introduced the relevant allusions, original texts, translations, and solutions. He also summed up and described important disciples, historical figures, and Confucius thoughts. - What are you satisfied or dissatisfied with? The foundation of my own classical Chinese is weak, and the original text is rather difficult to read. Fortunately, the translation is clear. - Who do you recommend this book to? After reading the Analects, you can read many sentences that are familiar to you on weekdays. Confucius's thinking is indeed very profound and profound, and it is of great help to real life, even investment. The Analects is a must read.
