item.summary: 实用的兵法，但又不止是兵法
item.text: 《孙子兵法》在春秋战国时期的古文中算是一个例外，其他经典如《老子》讲清心寡欲，《论语》讲克己复礼，《孟子》讲与民同乐，《庄子》讲窃国大盗，他们基本上是停战修身的哲学思想。而《孙子兵法》却反其道而行，为当时诸侯提供实用性质的作战之兵法，有些特立独行。但如果只有实用性，随着时代的变迁也会不断流失，而《孙子兵法》在开头三篇讲述的作战思想才最为关键。《计篇》“故经之以五事，校之以计而索其情：一曰道，二曰天，三曰地，四曰将，五曰法。道者，令民与上同意也，故可以与之死，可以与之生，而不畏危。天者，阴阳，寒暑，时制也。地者，高下，远近，险易，广狭，死生也。将者，智，信，仁，勇，严也。法者，曲制，官道，主用也。凡此五者，将莫不闻，知之者胜，不知者不胜。” 这说明作战不只是简单地兵戎相见，需要考虑到诸多因素，民心，天时，地利，将帅，军纪等等。《作战篇》“凡用兵之法，驰车千驷，革车千乘，带甲十万，千里馈粮，则内外之费，宾客之用，胶漆之材，车甲之奉，日费千金，然后十万之师举矣。其用战也胜，久则钝兵挫锐，攻城则力屈，久暴师则国用不足。````故兵闻拙速，未睹巧之久也。未兵久而国利者，未之有也。故不尽知用兵之害者，则不能尽知用兵之利也。”一旦宣战，各项物资装备都需要花钱，若不能速战速决，就会像希特勒入侵苏联那般陷入泥沼。警醒某些“愤青”，作战不是儿戏，更不是一腔热血就能促成的。《谋攻篇》“孙子曰：凡用兵之法，全国为上，破国次之；全军为上，破军次之；全旅为上，破旅次之；全卒为上，破卒次之；全伍为上，破伍次之。是故百战百胜，非善之善者也；不战而屈人之兵，善之善者也。故上兵伐谋，其次伐交，其次伐兵，其下攻城。攻城之法为不得已。” 杀敌一千，自损八百，这是惨胜。尽量先通过计谋或者外交手段来使对方屈服，而不用耗费军力，这才是全胜。基本上《孙子兵法》的作战思想就是如下几点：作战要考虑周全，武器装备先进一样可能因为不得民心而干不过小米加步枪；作战耗费巨大，影响民众正常生活，若要开战，必须速战速决；作战也只是一种使他人屈服的手段，不战而屈人之兵才是最佳选择。正因为这几点作战思想，它才能成为中国古文在国外的畅销书。
item.summary_trans: Practical art, but not just the art of war
item.text_trans: "Sun Tzu's Art of War" is an exception in the ancient texts of the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period. Other classics such as "Laozi" talk about pure desires, "The Analects of Confucius" speaks of self-denial, "Meng Zi" speaks with the people, and "Zhuangzi" talks about stealing the country. They are basically philosophical thoughts of truce and self-cultivation. The "Sun Tzu's Art of War" did the opposite, providing the practical martial arts of the princes at that time, and some were independent. However, if it is only practical, it will continue to be lost with the changes of the times, and the combat thinking described in the first three articles of Sun Tzu's Art of War is the most crucial. "Notes" "There are five things in the classics, the school's calculations and the feelings: one way, two days, three places, four will, five methods. The Taoist, the people and the consent Therefore, you can die with it, you can live with it, without fear. Heaven, yin and yang, cold and heat, time system also. The land, the high, the near, the danger, the wide and narrow, the dead and the dead. The will, wisdom, Letters, benevolence, bravery, and strictness. The legal person, the melody, the official ethics, the main use also. Those who are these five will not know, the one who knows wins, the one who knows is not victorious." This shows that combat is not just a simple confrontation. Need to consider a number of factors, people's hearts, time, location, generals, military discipline and so on. "Combat articles" "Where the use of the law of the military, thousands of cars, thousands of leather cars, with a hundred thousand, a thousand miles to feed the grain, the cost of inside and outside, the use of guests, the material of the paint, the car, the daily fee Thousands of gold, and then 100,000 teachers lifted. Its use of war also wins, long time the blunt soldiers are sharp, the siege is hard, the long violent division is insufficient for national use. ````The soldiers are idling, not well-behaved For a long time. Those who have not been soldiers for a long time and have a good fortune, there is nothing. So if you don’t know the people who use the soldiers, you can’t know the benefits of using the soldiers.” Once the war is declared, all materials and equipment need to spend money. The quick decision will be as muddy as Hitler’s invasion of the Soviet Union. Watching some "angry youth", fighting is not a child's play, it is not a result of a bloody battle. "The quest for the attack" "Sun Zikai: Where the law of the military is used, the whole country is the top, the country is broken; the whole army is the upper one, the broken army is the second; the whole brigade is the upper, the broken travel is second; the whole pawn is the upper, the broken Secondly; the whole army is on the top, and the ruin is the second. It is the victorious battle of the hundred wars, the good ones who are not good, the soldiers who are not the war, the good ones, and the other, the lower ranks, the second cut, the second cut Soldiers, under the siege. The law of siege is a last resort." Killing one thousand, self-damaged eight hundred, this is a tragic victory. Try to make the other party give in by strategy or diplomatic means, instead of spending military power, this is the total victory. Basically, the combat thinking of Sun Tzu's Art of War is as follows: combat should be considered comprehensively, and advanced weapons and equipment may be used because of the unpopularity of the millet plus rifles; the cost of combat is huge, affecting the normal life of the people. Quick decision; combat is just a means to make others surrender, and it is the best choice to defeat the soldiers without fighting. It is because of these combat ideas that it can become a bestseller of Chinese ancient Chinese in foreign countries.

However, after reading the grandson, I feel more of the strong pacifist ideas of the grandson, and the hot warring elements will become peaceful!

Privately think that the main problems of the book are: sentence reading and what, care, people, and... these words are used habitually; 3, there are typos, but basically do not affect reading comprehension; 4, because of the book Absolutely classic, combined with a little personal perfectionism, so nitpicking.

item.author: 孙武
item.text: 以前不知道孙子兵法是个啥，以为就是讲的三十六计，一章一计的那种。内容没有我想象的那么多哈，古时候么，写个字也不容易的。看了一张，我的语文是高中语文毕业的水平，感觉大体意思是能看懂的。看的那个是讲不要长时间养兵，不要长时间打仗，不要带太多兵出去。刚好在明朝那些事中，有看过对这个内容的白话和举例子解释，还是能看懂的。
item.text_trans: I didn’t know that Sun Tzu’s art of war was a jealousy. I thought it was the thirty-sixth plan, the one-on-one plan. The content is not as much as I imagined. In ancient times, it was not easy to write a word. I read one, my language is the level of high school Chinese graduation, I feel that the general meaning is understandable. The one you are watching is not to raise your troops for a long time. Don’t fight for a long time, don’t bring too many soldiers out. Just in the Ming Dynasty, I have read the vernacular and examples of this content, but I can still understand it.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.summary: “前孙子者，孙子不遗；后孙子者，不遗孙子”
item.text: “前孙子者，孙子不遗；后孙子者，不遗孙子”。《孙子兵法》又称《孙武兵法》、《孙子兵书》等，是中国古典军事文化遗产中的璀璨瑰宝，是世界三大兵书之一。全书共十三篇，虽然只有五千余言，但内容包罗万象、博大精深，涉及到战争规律、哲理、谋略、政治、经济、外交、天文、地理等各方面内容，堪称古代兵学理论的宝库和集大成者，在世界广为传播，美国西点军校和哈佛商学院高级管理将其作为人才培训的必读教材。
item.summary_trans: "The former grandson, the grandson is not lost; the grandson, the grandson"
item.text_trans: "The former grandson, the grandson is not lost; the grandson, the grandson." "The Art of War" is also known as "Sun Wu Bingfa" and "Sun Zi Bingshu". It is a treasure in China's classical military cultural heritage and one of the three major military books in the world. There are a total of thirteen articles in the book. Although there are only 5,000 words, the content is all-encompassing and profound. It involves the laws of war, philosophy, strategy, politics, economy, diplomacy, astronomy, geography, etc. It is a treasure house of ancient military theory. The great masters are widely spread in the world, and the senior management of the West Point Military Academy and Harvard Business School as a must-read textbook for talent training.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.summary: 孙子兵法 旷世奇书 人生的指路灯
item.text: 这本书，在我的枕边已经存在8年了。高三时，班主任推荐，人生必读。高考，我用里面学到的奇正之术考上了大学 大学时 我用里面的知识成为了一名优秀的学生 大学后 我依然阅读 我的工资从1500元 在2年的时间内变成了月薪上万 今年我26岁 我依然在读它 这就是孙子兵法
item.text_trans: This book has been around my pillow for 8 years. In the third year of high school, the class teacher recommended that life must read. In the college entrance examination, I used the technique of Qizheng I learned in college and university. When I used the knowledge inside to become a good student, I still read my salary from 1,500 yuan to a monthly salary in 2 years. Ten thousand this year, I am 26 years old, I am still reading it. This is Sun Tzu’s Art of War.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 我花了两天，看完了整本书，觉得孙子还是很霸气的，敌国抢粮远胜过胜过从本国运粮，不要给敌国留下任何资源。打不过就隐匿在百姓里，搞恐怖袭击，直到实力大的一方觉得维护损失太大，而做出让步。机密泄露，泄密者杀，保密者杀。给人直观印象就是只要能胜利，可以不择手段。直接让我想到苏联时期的伟大的红色祸匪事件，伟大的红色战士在给敌人造成重创后，依然的躲进了群众的海洋等待下一次攻击，白匪为了自身的安全急需剿灭这些红色战士，所以对附近村庄进行大规模的扫荡，红色战士觉得没有机会，撤出了村庄，但白匪并不知道这些恐怖分子走了，依然对村庄进行清洗。后来幸存者描述，他们不怪白匪，都认为如果不是红匪他们就不会受到牵连。然而在后来的红色宣传中，白匪被描述成一群丧心病狂的杀人魔王和土匪，对村庄进行了屠杀和洗劫。所以，我认为孙子兵法整部也是充满了暴虐，和对达成目标的不择手段。这些并不适合未成年人去看，到适合天真的成年人去看看。
item.summary_trans: It is said to be the world’s first book
item.text_trans: It took me two days to read the whole book. I feel that my grandson is still very domineering. The enemy’s rushing for grain is better than winning the grain from the country. Don’t leave any resources to the enemy. If you can't beat it, you will hide it in the people and engage in terrorist attacks until the big party feels that the maintenance loss is too great and makes concessions. Confidential leaks, leakers kill, secrets kill. The intuitive impression is that as long as you can win, you can do whatever it takes. Directly reminding me of the great red horror of the Soviet era. After the great red warrior caused heavy damage to the enemy, he still hid in the ocean of the masses and waited for the next attack. Bai Hao urgently needed to annihilate these red warriors for his own safety. Therefore, the large-scale raids on nearby villages, the Red Warriors felt that there was no chance to withdraw from the village, but Bai Qi did not know that these terrorists had gone, and still cleaned the village. Later survivors described that they did not blame the white, they thought that if they were not red, they would not be implicated. However, in the later red propaganda, the white stork was described as a group of murderous murderers and bandits, and the village was slaughtered and looted. Therefore, I believe that Sun Tzu’s entire military law is also full of tyranny and unscrupulous means to achieve goals. These are not suitable for minors to see, to suit the innocent adults.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.summary: 那么多打五星四星的人是认真的吗？
item.text: 那么多打五星四星的人是认真的吗？都有认真看过内容？译文简直是错漏百出啊，很多根本讲不通也不符合语境的地方。看得出来是符合当时特定的政治环境的译解，但时代色彩太浓厚了，无法接受。
item.summary_trans: So many people who play five stars and four stars are serious?
item.text_trans: So many people who play five stars and four stars are serious? Have you read the content seriously? The translation is simply a mistake, and many places that do not speak at all are not in line with the context. It can be seen that it is in accordance with the specific political environment at that time, but the color of the times is too strong to be accepted.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.summary: 久经战阵的将军，用平生的体悟解《孙子》
item.text: 郭老爷子是当今唯一一位久经战阵的将军（1955年授中将衔），同时又是一位注解《孙子》的大家。这一特殊的身份和经历就使《孙子》的众解家黯然失色。诚如吴如嵩自道：“纸上得来终觉浅！”郭老集行伍与学者于一身，所以对《孙子》每句话的感悟和体会都是学者型《孙子》注解者所无法企及的。这个注本是真正的学以致用的好书，希望读者不要看轻它。尽管它有特定时代的痕迹，有这样那样的瑕疵，但瑕不掩瑜，十几元买一本，和众注本放在一起，对比参照着读吧。
item.summary_trans: A general who has been fighting for a long time, using his life to understand the "grandson"
item.text_trans: Guo Laozi is the only general who has been a warrior in the past (in 1955, he was awarded the title of Zhong Li), and he is also an annotated "grandson". This special identity and experience has eclipsed the grandson of Sun Tzu. As Wu Ruqi said to himself: "There is a sense of light on the paper!" Guo Laoji and his scholars are in one, so the sentiments and experiences of every sentence of "Sun Zi" are beyond the reach of the scholar-type "grandson" commentators. . This note is a good book that is really used for learning. I hope readers don't look down on it. Although it has traces of a certain era, there is such a flaw, but it does not hide, buy a book for more than ten yuan, put it together with the public note, compare it with reference.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 淡淡的古色书印，自有一股隔世的雅味，曹操之笔注，更讶于古之谈兵论道者，其皆出一辄，然功成名就之风帆，一旦开启，若少之因素，不翻亦乱。此谓之，得兵法者，较之更易得天下。嗟叹之民心尽失，国之不复，徒一空壳，一旦被点燃，灰烬不再。此之枭雄之憾。然倍其精华，无少妄断其光辉所在。本定之古籍出版社的那本，蓝封，类似于古人的武功秘籍类似的，虽然可以下单，但事后卓越竟全无告知，便撤销了我那本的订单，无奈，只能再挑一本。百般搜寻之下，得复此本，然，无奈之后的欣喜和意外之情。且注释详尽，适宜古文略懂者，然个人有个嗜好，虽古文并不通达，却极爱阅读纯古文文献，并不喜爱注释，认为抹去了原文凝练，留与想象空间的精华。虽然此点还是挺遗憾的，但总体来说这本书我个人也十分推崇和满意。所以一收到便立马给予了评价。书质很好，不愧是卓越，既得低价，又是正品。卓越购书，何乐而不为？
item.text_trans: A faint patina print, since there is a world-class Yawei, Cao Cao's pen note, even more surprised by the ancient talk about the soldiers, they all come out, but after the fame, the sails, once opened, if few factors, not Turning over and messing up. This is said to be better than the world. The hearts of the sighs are lost, the country is no longer there, and the people are empty. Once they are ignited, the ashes are no longer. This is the regret of the hero. However, the essence of it is no less than the glory of it. The book of the ancient book publishing house of this book, Lan Feng, is similar to the martial arts cheats of the ancients. Although it can be placed, but after all, there is no notice of excellence, then I canceled the order of my book, but helpless, can only pick one more. this. Under the search of all kinds, I have to reproduce this book. However, after the helplessness, I am delighted and surprised. The notes are detailed and suitable for those who understand the ancient texts. However, the individual has a hobby. Although the ancient texts are not accessible, they are very fond of reading the pure ancient literature and do not like the annotations. They think that the original text is concealed and the essence of the imagination space is erased. Although this is still a pity, but overall I am very personal and very satisfied with this book. Therefore, as soon as I received it, I immediately gave an evaluation. The book quality is very good, it is excellent, it is low price, and it is genuine. Why not buy a book?

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 孙子兵法，曹操的注，郭化若的今译，都是经典啊。书中郭先生对兵法全文作了分段编号，因此曹操的注就不能注在相应的句子下了，一段文字中所有的曹注只能集中标注在正文旁，且不象郭注那样有编号，不加以辨析，则不易知道注的是哪一句。本书纸张、印刷、装订等质量都不错，且开本够大，比16开的略小一点而已。我就喜欢大开本的书。
item.text_trans: Sun Tzu's Art of War, Cao Cao's Note, Guo Huaruo's current translation, are classics. In the book, Mr. Guo made a paragraph numbering of the full text of the art of war, so Cao Cao’s note could not be placed under the corresponding sentence. All the Cao notes in a paragraph can only be marked in the body next to the text, and are not numbered like Guo. Without discrimination, it is not easy to know which sentence is being written. The quality of the paper, printing, binding, etc. is good, and the book is large enough, slightly smaller than the 16 open. I like the big book.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 书是正版的吗？居然漏了4页，第76页直接跳到第81页，请问亚马逊有没有客服，请给个解释，书里有备注，有质量问题可以找厂家更换，这属于质量问题吗？还是排版问题？
item.text_trans: Is the book genuine? Actually, I missed 4 pages. On page 76, I jumped directly to page 81. Does Amazon have any customer service? Please give an explanation. There are notes in the book. If there are quality problems, you can find a replacement. Is this a quality problem? Still a typographic problem?

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 孙子兵法的编著本很多，其实最好的就是这种除了古文解释之外，不添加任何个人意见评论的版本了。毕竟每个人对孙子兵法的理解不同，我们不需要去教别人如何去理解，只需要将原版的孙子兵法呈现给别人就可以了，至于如何理解是个人的事情。
item.summary_trans: Good book, there is a good explanation
item.text_trans: There are a lot of editors of Sun Tzu's Art of War. In fact, the best thing is that this version of the article does not add any personal comments other than the interpretation of the ancient text. After all, everyone has different understandings of Sun Tzu's art of war. We don't need to teach others how to understand. We just need to present the original Sun Tzu's art of war to others. As for how to understand is a personal matter.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.summary: 嘛，第一的评论太过优秀，都不知道该如何写了
item.text: 嘛，时不时的黑一下新笺的内容算是本书的一个福利吧。至于试笺中的评价部分，我觉得也不是一文不值，还是有很多可取之处。而至于用大Marx的视角来看评价孙子的著作方面，看法就仁者见仁了。（我绝对没有黑Marx的意思）
item.summary_trans: Well, the first comment is too good, I don’t know how to write it.
item.text_trans: Well, the black and white content from time to time is a welfare of this book. As for the evaluation part of the trial, I don't think it is worthless. There are still many merits. As for the evaluation of Sun Tzu's works from the perspective of the big Marx, the views are benevolent. (I definitely don't mean Black Marx)

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 孙子兵法是中华民族经典著作之一，也是当今世界人民广泛认同和高度评价的一部智慧宝典。兵法大师孙武用精彩的文字语言把令人惊叹的军事智谋和人生智慧记录下来，让人们在用兵方面和做人方面理会其中之道，特别是在于知己知彼、审时度势、方能运筹帷幄取得胜利和实效。这本“孩子一生必读的国学经典选粹”---孙子兵法它的确是给青少年的一本好书。这本书我订购了多次，都被打了‘暂缺’的回票，希望“卓越网站”早日将这类好书进货到来，以满足青少年们的需要。
item.text_trans: Sun Tzu's Art of War is one of the classic works of the Chinese nation, and it is also a wisdom book widely recognized and highly praised by the people of the world today. Sun Wu, the master of the art of war, recorded the amazing military ingenuity and wisdom of life with wonderful words and language, so that people can understand the way in the use of soldiers and people, especially in knowing oneself, knowing the situation, and being able to plan for victory and effectiveness. This "the choice of Chinese classics that children must read in their lifetime" - Sun Tzu's Art of War is indeed a good book for young people. I have ordered this book many times and have been voted for 'unavailable'. I hope that the "Excellent Website" will come soon to meet the needs of young people.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 看似可送货范围，但实际不可送，自己开车往返10公里去取了一本书，一个订单两本，还有一本未送来，我再跑一次又是10公里，书非借不能读，取着这么辛苦，好好读。
item.summary_trans: The book is good, the delivery is not to force.
item.text_trans: It seems that the scope of delivery can be delivered, but it is not practical to send it. I drove 10 kilometers to get a book, two books, and one was not sent. I ran again for 10 kilometers. The book could not be read. Take such hard work and read it well.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 买的时候有点贵，但还是狠了狠心买下来了，注释很详细，但是有点学术性，里面有曹操评注，感觉用处不大，但是聊胜于无啊怎么说也是老祖宗留下来的，留在床头慢慢品味，比读现代人那些这个解那个解的强多了，十三篇很有深度，自己已经背的差不多了。有人拿《五轮书》和《孙子》作比较，个人觉得根本没有可比性。五轮之孙子，犹如萤虫之皓月，当然这也是个人见解，相信了解点中国文化的人都会赞同，而且五轮书里很多的内容都有抄袭孙子之嫌。
item.text_trans: When I bought it, it was a bit expensive, but I bought it with my heart. The comment is very detailed, but it is a bit academic. There is Cao Cao commentary. It feels useless, but it is better than nothing. It is also left by the ancestors, staying in the bed. Slowly taste, much better than reading the solution of modern people. The thirteen articles are very deep, and they have already had the same. Some people compare the "five-round book" with the "grandson", and personally feel that there is no comparability at all. The grandson of the five rounds is like the moon of the worms. Of course, this is also a personal opinion. Those who believe in Chinese culture will agree, and many of the contents of the five rounds are suspected of copying the grandson.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 书很不错，从装帧印刷到内容，可是，为何选用这个开本呢？让我放到书架的哪个位置都很别扭，它总是能够做到“鹤立鸡群”……不是比别人窄了就是比别人高出很多。最搞不懂的就是现在图书的开本，乱七八糟的。建议出版商弄成流行的大十六开。
item.text_trans: The book is very good, from binding to printing, but why choose this one? It's awkward to put me on the shelf, it's always able to "stand out"...not narrower than others or much higher than others. The most incomprehensible thing is the book's opening book, which is messy. Publishers are advised to make a big pop.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 一边看一遍想起一些案例，书的内容那么少能应用好的人实在不多。后世一些军事专家的战略思想都可以看到孙子兵法的影子，真是一本极有影响力的书。
item.text_trans: Looking at some cases, I think that there are not so many people who can apply the book. The strategic thinking of some military experts in later generations can see the shadow of Sun Tzu's art of war. It is really a very influential book.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 上海古籍出版社和中华书局出的古籍都是我所信赖的。此书中，郭化若先生的批注颇有真知灼见，翻译也不错。当然，比起中华书局的《十一家注孙子》，可读性方面略逊一筹
item.text_trans: The ancient books published by Shanghai Ancient Books Publishing House and Zhonghua Book Company are all trusted by me. In this book, Mr. Guo Huaruo’s comments are quite insightful and the translation is not bad. Of course, compared to the "11 Grand Masters" of Zhonghua Book Company, the readability is slightly inferior.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.summary: 很有古版味道，注意没有36计
item.text: （书托太多，注意，还是要看有：购买过此商品标志的的评价）内容什么的，很喜欢。可能是之前的理解误区，以为孙子兵法里面包含36计，亮点是曹操的评价，整体古版味道很浓，很适合读。希望能有这个出版社的36计。
item.summary_trans: Very ancient taste, pay attention to no 36
item.text_trans: (The book is too much, pay attention, still have to look at: the evaluation of the purchase of this product logo) What is the content, I like it. It may be the misunderstanding of the previous understanding, thinking that Sun Tzu's Art of War contains 36 counts. The highlight is Cao Cao's evaluation. The overall ancient version has a strong taste and is very suitable for reading. I hope to have 36 books of this publishing house.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 孙子兵法闻名全世界，多的我就不说了，这本书纸质不错，含有字的翻译和整篇文章翻译，但就是整篇文章的翻译使的这本书有点黯然失色，就好像别人吃过的东西你在消化一次一样，没劲，但对于古文功底不好的人却是一大福音。
item.text_trans: Sun Tzu's art of war is famous all over the world. I won't say much about it. This book is a good paper. It contains the translation of the word and the translation of the whole article, but the translation of the whole article makes the book a bit eclipsed, just like someone else. What you have eaten is the same as you are digesting once, but it is a great gospel for people who are not good at ancient knowledge.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 优点:凝聚者作者的心血,解释的很细,不仅仅是简单的翻译,更有作者的从军的体会,作者对每一句都解释的非常认真,比如,列举出该句的好几种解释,还对孙子兵法进行了批判的吸收,不管作者的观点对不对,却也为我们提供了思考的方向,缺点:曹操的注解罗列在一起,没有标注出是哪句的,显得有点乱,可能导致理解错误.
item.text_trans: Advantages: The author's efforts, the interpretation is very detailed, not only a simple translation, but also the author's experience of the military, the author is very serious about each sentence, for example, enumerate several explanations of the sentence, He also made a critical absorption of Sun Tzu's art of war. No matter the author's point of view is right, it also provides us with the direction of thinking. The shortcomings: Cao Cao's annotations are listed together, and there is no indication of which sentence, it seems a bit messy, which may lead to Understand the error.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 像这类 这么经典的书籍 还是要严谨一点好
item.text_trans: Such a classic book like this should be rigorous.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 不仅军事爱好者可以读，稍有古文基础和文学性趣的人都可以读，翻译和注释都很详细，甚至过于冗长。对管理和处事原则上也有一定的现实指导作用，重在个人揣摩思考。
item.text_trans: Not only can military enthusiasts read, but people with a little basic knowledge and literary interest can read, translations and comments are detailed and even too lengthy. In principle, there is also a certain practical guiding role in management and service, and it is important for individuals to try to figure out.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 首先第一个卖点就是郭化若做今译，曹操做注解；第二就是本书首先撰写原文，然后是对原文的详细的注解，旁侧为曹操的注解，经典深刻而且用红色的字体，更为显明，最后是对整段原文的翻译；第三就是排版合适感觉舒畅；第四郭老先生今译的孙子兵法原文比较多个版本，取其精华，弃其糟糠，实在是秒载！
item.text_trans: First of all, the first selling point is that Guo Huaruo is doing this translation, Cao Cao is annotating; the second is that the book first writes the original text, then the detailed annotation of the original text, the side is Cao Cao's annotation, the classic is deep and the red font is more obvious. Finally, the translation of the entire paragraph of the original text; the third is the right to typesetting feelings comfortable; the fourth version of the old master of the fourth translation of the Sun Tzu's art of war, compare the original version, take the essence, discard its dross, it is a second!

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 质量很好。曹操的注评是红色标注的译者是军事家，对其的理解也更到位吧书买的有点多，内容方面还没有认真拜读。仅从第一眼印象来说，很好

The only regret is that some criticisms of Mr. Guo Huaruo on "Xinyi" seem to be lacking in cultivation.

item.text_trans: I usually go to the bookstore when I have nothing to do, to see what is good about this kind of book, because the content is the same, just look at the one that looks better, the story is richer, the analysis is better, the paper is better. What's important is that the book is fully composite, the original content is not too little, and the price is not expensive. The book of 400 pages is only priced at 25, and it must be forty in other publishers, but this publisher Other line-loading classics are not very recommended, because like Shi Ji, Zi Zhi Tong Jian, seemingly less content, is edited, if necessary, you can go to the bookstore and other similar books to compare, see the content is much less. In short, this book is highly recommended.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.summary: 应该是目前孙子兵法的最好版本，但有些内容值得注意
item.text: 全文由孙子十三篇、注释、译文、曹注以及郭先生的试笺构成。封面古色古香，纸张也非常硬实，应该是目前最好的版本。内容方面，孙子原文自不必说，曹注和注释也非常精彩。郭先生的试笺，有些确实有点道理，但是每次都用马列哲学来解释孙子兵法，动则加入类如“朴素的唯物主义”这些马哲名词未免有点勉强偏颇。而郭先生所指出的孙子兵法中所谓的“糟粕”，并大书特书，我觉得并不是特别好，这样做不仅仅是对先贤的不尊，也未必能体现自己有多么明哲。任何事情都不能脱离当时的时代单独的考虑。诚然，人类社会和世界是不断发展的，孙子兵法的一部分内容现在看确实不合理了，但一概用现在的视角去放大2000多年前孙子时期没有想到或没法想到的事情，并把当时合理的地方也一概否认，这样做是不是也不符合唯物史观呢？所以关于郭先生的试笺，大家可以当作一家之言，但并不要完全接受，而是用自己的思考，得出最有意义的结论，那才是最重要的。 这本书已经非常好了，我也非常满意。如果非要吹毛求疵的话，从我个人的角度，首先如果能加上曹注的注释就更好了。毕竟包括本人在内的绝大部分读者，古文水平还是比较有限的。虽然能大致看懂，但是对于经典总抱着精益求精的心态。此外，在每篇的末尾适当地加上战例，不用太多，1篇足矣，而且最好是接近孙子时期的。比如九地篇就可以以韩信井陉之战或项羽巨鹿之战为例，说明死地兵法的运用方式。这样就更可以加深大家对孙子兵法的理解。
item.summary_trans: It should be the best version of Sun Tzu’s art of war, but some of it is worth noting
item.text_trans: The full text consists of the 13th chapter of Sun Tzu, the annotated, the translation, Cao Zhu and the test of Mr. Guo. The cover is antique and the paper is very hard. It should be the best version at the moment. In terms of content, the grandson's original text does not have to be said, Cao notes and notes are also very exciting. Mr. Guo’s testimony is somewhat reasonable, but every time he uses Marxism-Leninism philosophy to explain Sun Tzu’s art of war, and moves to include such things as “simple materialism”, these Ma Zhe nouns are somewhat reluctantly biased. The so-called "dross" in Sun Tzu's art of war, which Mr. Guo pointed out, is not particularly good. It is not only a disrespect for the sages, but it does not necessarily reflect how eloquent it is. Nothing can be separated from the individual considerations of the time. It is true that the human society and the world are constantly evolving. Part of the content of Sun Tzu’s art of war is now unreasonable, but it uses the current perspective to amplify things that were not thought of or could not be thought of during the grandson of more than 2,000 years ago. The locality also denied that this is not in line with historical materialism. Therefore, regarding Mr. Guo’s test, everyone can be regarded as a family statement, but don’t accept it completely, but use your own thinking to draw the most meaningful conclusions. That is the most important thing. This book is very good, and I am very satisfied. If you have to be nitpicking, from my personal point of view, it would be better if I could add Cao's notes first. After all, the vast majority of readers, including myself, have a relatively limited level of ancient Chinese. Although I can understand it roughly, I always hold a spirit of excellence for the classics. In addition, at the end of each article, the appropriate case is added, not too much, one is enough, and it is best to be close to the grandson. For example, in the Jiu Di article, you can use the battle of Han Xinjing or the battle of Xiang Yu Julu as an example to illustrate the application of the law of death. This will further deepen your understanding of Sun Tzu's Art of War.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 在《孙子兵法》的中心有唯一皆准的一个比喻，说商业是一个赢与输的游戏。随着时间的推移，这个比喻就变成了事实上的“真理”。这个隐喻，将商务的属性，看作是战争，即为分享市场的战争，企业所有的属性如伙伴关系、合资企业及战略联盟都隐藏在这个属性背后。商业作为战争的比喻，在今天全球日趋一体化和国际间相互依赖性愈来愈强的情况下，弊病更显突出。少数公司依拥有的资源可以在复杂、竞争激烈的全球市场单独作业。今天的世界商务的总趋势是合资、结盟、竞争者之间的联姻。他们的好处是，相互信任，在发展中维持商业的多方面的关系。这种方式可使地方公司可能获益技术诀窍，产品和营销知识，而面对外国合伙人，可以共同分担其开发费用及风险营销一个新产品的费用，更珍贵的是与全球品牌公司结盟，可得到当地经销商信赖和合作，并使用你的产品。这种商业合作和联姻，要求合作双方做一对真正的联姻，即承诺和信任。信任尤其重要，因为他需要一段很长时间去建立，但在关键时刻也很容易破裂。合作者任何一方的机会主义行为，就会削弱长远生产合作性的关系。
item.summary_trans: Sun Tzu's Art of War and Business
item.text_trans: There is a single analogy in the center of Sun Tzu's Art of War, saying that business is a game of winning and losing. Over time, this metaphor becomes the de facto "truth." This metaphor sees the attributes of business as war, that is, the war of sharing the market. All the attributes of the enterprise, such as partnerships, joint ventures and strategic alliances, are hidden behind this attribute. As a metaphor for war, in today's global integration and international interdependence, the ills are more prominent. A small number of companies can operate independently in complex, highly competitive global markets. The general trend of today's world business is the marriage between joint ventures, alliances, and competitors. Their advantage is mutual trust and maintaining a multifaceted relationship in business. This approach allows local companies to benefit from know-how, product and marketing knowledge, while facing foreign partners, they can share their development costs and risk to market a new product, and more importantly, to form alliances with global brand companies. Trust and cooperate with local distributors and use your products. This kind of business cooperation and marriage requires the partners to make a true marriage, that is, commitment and trust. Trust is especially important because it takes a long time to build, but it can easily break down at a critical moment. The opportunistic behavior of either partner will weaken the long-term production cooperation relationship.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.summary: 简约实用 绝对好书
item.text: 不知道多少朋友像我一样喜欢的文言文书是这样的，原文加简单的注释就好了，最多再有个全文翻译，那些点评、例证什么的简直污人耳目。这书就不错，结构是这样的，一段原文，下面是难字注释，下一段原文，下一个注释，最后有本篇的白话文翻译。只有70页，非常简约，没有废话。
item.summary_trans: Simple and practical, absolutely good book
item.text_trans: I don't know how many friends like me have the same language documents. The original text plus a simple comment is just fine. At most, there is a full-text translation. Those comments and illustrations are simply filthy. This book is good, the structure is like this, a paragraph of the original, the following is a difficult word comment, the next paragraph of the original, the next comment, and finally the translation of the vernacular of this article. Only 70 pages, very simple, no nonsense.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 制作精美，解释到位，是一本好书。
item.text_trans: Beautifully crafted and explained in place, it is a good book.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 经典啊！！！！必须买啊 ！！！加上里面的注解，可以同时理解孙子/曹操/郭化若三人的军事思想，我边看边记笔记，写自己的心得，这个不买还等什么啊 ！！！可以传世的兵书！！！
item.text_trans: Classic! ! ! ! Must buy it! ! ! Together with the annotations inside, you can understand the military thoughts of Sun Zi / Cao Cao / Guo Huaruo at the same time. It's not that this book is not good, just look at the bindings of the ancient classical books. This book is a popular succinct. The content text is easy to understand. Not what I want: What I want is a vertical and traditional Chinese commentary and commentary, similar to the ancient classical literature series.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.summary: 凡是不可以为之而为之
item.text: 尽管我很欣赏孙子当中的两句话：知己知彼百战百不殆；不可以为之而为之。如果你认为什么事情能做，一定不要去做，比如赌博，你认为可以赢，结果你一定输。如果对我们的人生而言，看你自己是哪一种人。如果你相信一切皆有可能，那你就去做。如果你想辩证的去思考，我建议大家看看孙子兵法，从战略上着眼未来，着眼现在。当然，做事首要的相信，去勇敢的做！再去思考失败之后的事情。当初我对自己信心不足，并且没有考虑失败之后我怎么办。草草在自己准备不充分，实力不足的时候，在不清楚对方情况的情况下，种种可能失败的原因，结果失败了。所以这两句话是孙子兵法中的重中之重。结合在一起方可成事。相信自己第一，战略第二。如果你一瓶不满半瓶晃，说明对孙子兵法理解不够透彻
item.summary_trans: Anything that can't be done for it
item.text_trans: Although I admire two sentences in my grandson: knowing oneself and knowing each other is not a battle; you can't do it for it. If you think something can be done, don't do it, like gambling. You think you can win. You must lose. If it is for our life, see who you are. If you believe that everything is possible, then do it. If you want to think in a dialectical way, I suggest that you look at Sun Tzu's Art of War, focus on the future strategically, and look at the present. Of course, the first thing to do is to be brave! Then think about things after the failure. I didn’t have enough confidence in myself and didn’t think about what to do after I failed. When the grass is not adequately prepared and the strength is insufficient, the reasons for the failure may fail if the situation of the other party is unclear, and the result fails. Therefore, these two sentences are the most important in Sun Tzu's art of war. Only when you combine them can you do something. Believe in yourself first, strategy second. If you are not satisfied with a bottle of half a bottle, it means that the understanding of Sun Tzu’s art of war is not thorough enough.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 不知诸君未曾一睹宋本十一家注?十人车轮围攻曹操一人大打口水仗，诸多类似“孟德错矣”比比皆是。不过区区三十年前的译本就看出了时代感，那置距今2500年的孙子原文岂不是读出了考古味？阶级斗争也是对战争的局势的一种分析方式，就如同孙子分析战争时常用阴阳二分看待也是一种方式，诸君如此评论放言公允否？
item.summary_trans: Zhu Jun comments but for fairness
item.text_trans: I don’t know if the princes have ever seen a dozen of Song’s bets. Ten people’s wheels besieged Cao Cao’s one-man slobber, and many similar “Mengde’s mistakes” abound. However, the translation of the district thirty years ago saw the sense of the times. Didn’t the original text of the grandson 2500 years read the archaeological flavor? Class struggle is also an analysis of the situation of war. Just as the grandson used to analyze the war, it is also a way to look at the yin and yang. Is it true that the princes commented on this?

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.summary: 一流的书，一流的内容，但也有要非常注意的地方。
item.text: 这本书不管是装帧设计，还是印刷质量，都是一流的，排版中对原文，注释，译文，校勘，试笺的排列还有字体都做了细心的安排，曹操的注释则用红色小字放在原文边上，能看出古籍出版社在这本书上的用心。如果一本书的设计能够打分的话，这书毫无疑问能够接近满分。从内容看，这本书有了孙子的原文，曹操的注释，已经相当完美，郭化若先生的注与译也看得出尽心尽力，更为难得的是各个版本（前人所载）的孙子在文字上都略有出入，郭先生在校勘里面会一一列明，然后说出取舍的原因，相当的严谨。但是------很不幸，郭先生有一个试笺，在本书里面形同画蛇添足。在这个试笺里，郭先生与一本《新笺》（同为写孙子兵法）的作者大打口水仗，在与古人的思想交流中看到这些，如同让人在一碗靓汤里面发现了一颗老鼠屎一般，只能让人犯恶心。更不幸的是，在试笺里郭先生屡次跳出来对指责孙子的不足之处（前面有的评论说这样的指责“很好很强大），如果这样的指责是合理的，那是我辈读书人的幸事，但是很多的评点本身就是错误的。这样的评点不能将哲理真理带给读者，只能让读者如坠五里雾中。而这郭先生犯这些错误的原因，是他动辄就站在阶级斗争的立场上，用唯物论的思想思考，更是他身处“主席高参”的高位，所举之例子无不是1949年之前战例，固步自封，抱残守缺造成的。孙子所言的战争，是“国”与“国”之间的，国与国之间的战争跟zf军与造反军之间的战争如何能相提并论？而在现代大国之间的角力又如何能运用流寇战术？（1980年以前我国的外交正是以阶级斗争为指导下导致的大失败！）当美国在对外竞争中，使用直接战争，代理人战争，经济战争各种手段，运用各种战术，信息站，网络战，抢占战争道德制高点的时候，郭先生还在大谈特谈要发动人民，简直让人哭笑不得。郭先生评点孙子未能看到此，不是孙子写不出来（孙子要写的是一本国与国之间的兵书），而是郭先生思想不能摆脱当年流寇参军的身份！这些所谓的阶级斗争的立场，唯物论的思想对思考本书来说有大害而无一利。如果读者能够拨开这些迷雾，纯粹的站在国家---这个稳定的立场上看待国家之间的“竞争”（不是战争，孙子里对杀伤人命的战争如何评价？不战而屈人之兵善之善者也），那孙子兵法的光辉就能够显现在我们眼前。
item.summary_trans: First-rate books, great content, but there are places to pay attention to.
item.text_trans: This book is top-notch in both the frame design and the print quality. The layout, the notes, the translation, the collation, the trial arrangement and the fonts are carefully arranged. The Cao Cao notes are placed in small red letters. On the side of the original text, we can see the intention of the ancient books publishing house in this book. If the design of a book can be scored, the book will no doubt be close to perfect score. From the content point of view, this book has the original text of the grandson, Cao Cao's notes, has been quite perfect, Mr. Guo Huaruo's note and translation can also be seen to do their best, even more rare is the grandson of each version (predecessors) in There is a slight discrepancy in the text. Mr. Guo will list them one by one in the collation, and then explain the reasons for the choice, which is quite rigorous. But ------ unfortunately, Mr. Guo has a test, in this book, it is similar to the painting. In this trial, Mr. Guo and the author of a new book, "The Sun Tzu's Art of War," screamed and saw this in the exchanges with the ancients, as if they were found in a bowl of soup. A mouse is awkward and can only make people feel sick. What is even more unfortunate is that in the trial, Mr. Lie Guo has repeatedly jumped out to blame the grandson for his inadequacies. (The previous comments said that such accusations are "very good and powerful." If such accusations are reasonable, then it is my generation of scholars. The blessings, but many of the comments themselves are wrong. Such comments cannot bring philosophical truths to the readers, but only allow the readers to fall into the fog. The reason why Mr. Guo made these mistakes is that he is standing on the class struggle. On the standpoint, thinking with materialistic thoughts is that he is at the high position of "the chairman's high participation." The examples cited are not caused by the pre-1949 war cases, but they are self-styled and shackled. The war that Sun Zi said is "the country." How can the war between the country and the country be compared with the war between the zf army and the rebel army? How can the use of rogue tactics between the modern powers? (Before 1980, China’s Diplomacy is a great failure caused by class struggle!) When the United States competes in foreign competition, it uses various means of direct warfare, agent warfare, and economic warfare. When tactics, information stations, cyber warfare, and occupation of the moral high ground of war, Mr. Guo is still talking about launching people, it is simply making people laugh and cry. Mr. Guo commented that his grandson could not see this, not his grandson could not write it (grandson What I want to write is a military book between the country and the country. But Mr. Guo’s thought can’t get rid of the identity of the rogues who joined the army that year! These so-called positions of class struggle, materialistic thoughts are harmful to the book. If readers can set aside these fogs and stand on the country---this stable position, look at the "competition" between countries (not war, how do the grandsons evaluate the war against human life? The goodness of the good and the good of the soldiers), the glory of the Sun Tzu's art of war can be seen before our eyes.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 所谓兵法，不仅仅是用于兵，还可以用于很多其他地方。个人觉得前面几篇还是非常对的，甚至仍然是可以用于如今，而后几篇可能因为时代的原因，其实略扯的。不错的书。老祖宗的很多东西还是非常有用的。
item.text_trans: The so-called art of war is not only used for soldiers, but also for many other places. Personally feel that the first few articles are still very right, and even can still be used today, and the next few articles may be slightly due to the reasons of the times. Nice book. Many things about the ancestors are still very useful.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 孙子兵法本就是一部经典，经典就值得反复读，反复读的古文书，最好注释全面点，各种不同的版本区别之处要讲明才好，名家的评论有更好，总之，需要思考而且是反复思考的书、实际当中运用的书，不怕观点多，就怕闭门造车，这本书就市面上我个人见的，算是上层的了。
item.text_trans: Sun Tzu's Art of War is a classic, the classic is worth reading repeatedly, the ancient instruments repeatedly read, it is best to comment on the comprehensive point, the differences between the different versions should be clearly stated, the famous comments are better, in short, need Thinking and thinking books are repeated, and the books used in practice are not afraid of many opinions. They are afraid of building a car behind closed doors. This book is personally seen on the market and is considered to be the upper level.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 如题，并非是关于孙子兵法的最佳书籍。现代人常据理思考理解古人，实际上必须从考据先读懂古人原意，再来创造性理解要靠谱些。更推荐李零先生《孙子十三篇综合研究》。建议精读其自序，于理解古书亦大有好处！（李零，生于一九四八年，祖籍山西武乡县，北京大学中文系教授。一九七七年人中国社会科学院考古研究所参与金文资料的整理和研究。一九七九年人中国社会科学院研究生院考古系，师从张政煨先生作殷周铜器研究。一九八二年毕叶，获历史学硕士学位。一九八二年至一九八三年在中国社会科学院考古研究所澧西队从事考古发掘。一九八三年至一九八五年在中国社会科学院农业经济研究所从事先秦土地制度史的研究。一九八五年至今任教于北京大学中文系。李零教授长期从事考古、古文字和古文献的研究，着有《长沙子弹库战国楚帛书研究》、《放虎归山》、《中国方术（正）考》、《中国方术续考》、《<孙子）古本研究》、《吴孙子发微》、《郭店楚简校读记》、《上博楚简三篇校读记》、《简帛文献与学术源流》、《花间一壶酒》等。 ）目录自序导言：《孙子兵法》舆先秦兵学第一部分校释一、校释说明计第一作战第二谋攻第三形第四势第五虚实第六军争第七九变第八行军第九地形第十九地第十一火攻第十二用闲第十三二、佚文三、传记资料四、着绿流传版本第二部分古本辑存一、银雀山漠简《孙子兵法》（十三篇）分简释文及缺文考证《孙子兵法》篇题木牍前六篇后七篇二、新疆吐峪沟六朝抄本三、唐以前古书古注的引文四、五种唐类书的引文五、《长短经》的引文六、其它唐代注疏的引文七、《太平御览》的引文八、宋本第三部分古注集校说明一、曹操注集校二、杜佑注集校第四部分有关论文说明关于银雀山简本《孙子》研究的商榷银雀山简本《孙子》校读举例《孙子》篇题木牍初论青海大通县上孙家寨漠简性质小议现存宋代《孙子》版本的形成及其优劣关于《孙子兵法》研究整理的新认识读《孙子》割记跋北京图书馆藏王念孙校《孙子注》附录《吴孙子发微》后记《吴孙子发微》补记《<孙子>古本研究》自序参考书目
item.text_trans: Such as the title, is not the best book about Sun Tzu's art of war. Modern people often think about understanding the ancients in a reasonable way. In fact, they must first read the original intentions of the ancients from the testimony, and then rely on the creative understanding. More recommended by Mr. Li Zero, "The Grandson's Thirteen Comprehensive Studies." It is recommended to read the self-sequence intensively, and it is also very beneficial to understand the ancient books! (Li Zero, born in 1948, was born in Wuxiang County, Shanxi Province, and is a professor at the Chinese Department of Peking University. In 1977, the Institute of Archaeology of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences participated in the collation and research of Jinwen materials. 1979 The Department of Archaeology, Graduate School of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences, studied under the supervision of Mr. Zhang Zhengyi as a bronze ware. In 1982, he received a master's degree in history. From 1982 to 1983 in Chinese society. The West Anhui team of the Institute of Archaeology of the Academy of Sciences engaged in archaeological excavations. From 1983 to 1985, at the Institute of Agricultural Economics of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences, from the study of the history of the land system in the Qin Dynasty. Since 1985, he has taught at the Chinese Department of Peking University. Professor Li Zero has long been engaged in the study of archaeology, ancient writings and ancient documents. He is the author of "The Study of the Long Sands Library and the Warring States Chu Book", "The Tigers Returning to the Mountains", "Chinese Fangshu (正) Examination", "Chinese Fangshu Continued Examination", "<孙子) Ancient Study, "Wu Sunzi Hair Micro", "Guodian Chu Jian School Reading Notes", "Shang Bo Chu Jian's Three Reading Notes", "Simplified Literature and Academic Sources", "Flower a Pot of Wine" Wait. The introduction of the catalogue: "The Art of War" is the first part of the first Qin Dynasty. Nine terrain, the eleventh place, the eleventh fire attack, the twelfth leisure, the thirteenth two, the essay three, the biography data, the green circulation version, the second part, the ancient book, the first, the Yinque Mountain desert, the "Sunzi Art of War" ( Thirteen articles) A ​​brief introduction to the text and a lack of texts. The book "Sun Tzu's Art of War" is titled after the first six articles of the Muxi, and the second is the second. The transcripts of the Sixth dynasty of the Tuobaou in Xinjiang, the citations of the ancient books of the Tang Dynasty, and the citations of the five kinds of Tang books. V. Citations of the Long and Short Scriptures 6. Other citations of the Tang Dynasty. 7. Citations of the Taiping Yulan. Songs. The third part of the ancient annotations. I. Cao Cao's Note 2, Du You's Notes. Four parts of the papers on the study of Yinqueshan's "The Grandson", the Shangyu Yinqueshan, the "Sun Zi", the example of the "Sun Zi", the title of the book, "The Son of the Sun", the first discussion on the nature of the desert in Datong County, Qinghai Province. The Formation of the Version of "The Grandson" in the Song Dynasty and Its Advantages and Disadvantages New understanding of finishing reading research "grandson" cut record Postscript Beijing Library Zao Niansun school "grandson note" Appendix "Wu grandson Origin of the" postscript "Wu grandson Origin of the" make up mind "<grandson> Ancient Studies" Preface Bibliography

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 孙子兵法历来为全世界的人所重视，而我们中国人似乎还不太珍惜，或者去认真品味钻研，这是很悲哀的一件事。曹操的评注很好 很精练，我买这个版本其实就是冲着曹操的评注买的。至于那个开国儒将郭化若的分析 个人感觉很垃圾 就像以一个长辈对后辈的教训的口气在那里指指点点“这个好 那个已经过时了”，动不动就什么马克思冒出来 当年孙武所向披靡时 马克思连开裆裤都没有穿上呢 再说一个外国人能有多了解我们祖先深邃的思想？肤浅。
item.summary_trans: The book is a good book, but unfortunately...
item.text_trans: Sun Tzu's art of war has always been valued by people all over the world, and it seems that we Chinese people don't cherish it very much, or go to seriously study it. This is a very sad thing. Cao Cao's commentary is very good and very refined. I bought this version and bought it in the commentary of Cao Cao. As for the analysis of the founding Confucian scholar Guo Huaruo, the personal feeling is very rubbish. Just like the tone of an elder's lesson to the younger generation, it is just pointing out that "this good one is out of date", and it doesn't matter what Marx came out. When Sun Wu was invincible, Marx even opened his pants. Didn’t wear it, let’s say how much a foreigner can understand the deep thoughts of our ancestors? shallow.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 想买一本孙子兵法，但是版本实在太多了，看来看去还是这个版本的评价最好，所以就买下来了，感觉不错，上海古籍出版社，专业胜于一切
item.text_trans: I want to buy a Sun Tzu Art of War, but the version is too much. It seems that this version is the best evaluation, so I bought it, I feel good, Shanghai Ancient Books Publishing House, professional is better than everything.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 首先这本书内容不错，关于这方面前面评论的很多，就不多说了！ 但是，郭化若的试笺纯粹是一派胡言，在完全脱离了孙子所指的意境下，断章取义！说他是流寇又如何？孙子兵法在两千年来一直受兵家推崇，即使在国外军事院校也是必修书目之一，作为兵家精华，即使古代的用兵高手例如曹操等也只是做注，不敢对孙子兵法妄加指责，郭化若又是什么东西，难不成以为有了所谓的马克思主义就可以凌驾于真理之上，对中华的精粹妄加指责？
item.text_trans: First of all, the content of this book is good. There are a lot of comments on this topic, so I won’t say much! However, Guo Huaruo's test is purely a nonsense, and it is completely out of the mood of the grandson. What if he is a rogue? Sun Tzu's art of war has been respected by military strategists for two thousand years. Even in foreign military academies, it is one of the compulsory bibliographies. As an elite of military strategists, even the ancient martial arts masters such as Cao Cao are only making notes and dare not blame Sun Tzu's art of war. Guo Huaruo What is it? It is difficult to think that with the so-called Marxism, it can be above the truth and blame the essence of China?

item.text: 买书也许无所谓，比较便宜，也不会有坏的。如果你在这里买了一部上千元的手机，那你要小心了，我在这里买了一部1500的手机，结果是坏的，退货都用了一个半月了，还没退成，提醒大家要小心！
item.summary_trans: It is recommended not to buy electronic products here.
item.text_trans: Buying a book may not matter, it's cheaper, and it won't be bad. If you buy a mobile phone with thousands of dollars here, then you have to be careful. I bought a 1500 mobile phone here. The result is bad. It took a month and a half to return the goods. It has not been retired. Everyone must be careful!

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 不亏为中国兵法之首，短短十三篇，寥寥五千言，道尽胜负之机。字字珠玑。
item.text_trans: No loss is the head of China's art of war, just thirteen, 5,000 words, the road to victory. Word beading.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 不要说内容别等别的，光那个包装，都让人感觉很清爽，所以我很推荐，而且又不贵
item.text_trans: Don't say anything, don't wait for anything else, light packaging, it feels very refreshing, so I recommend it, and it is not expensive.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 封面幼稚，内容颇佳，凑合
item.text_trans: The cover is childish and the content is quite good.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 书挺薄的，应该还ok吧
item.text_trans: The book is quite thin, it should be ok.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 经典的军事教材，不多说
item.text_trans: Classic military textbooks, not much to say

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 天下兵法，追根溯源皆由此
item.text_trans: The art of war in the world

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 书的内容是不错的，注和解释都不错，只不过有许多是郭先生的解读和个人观点，解读多了可能会有助于我们阅读，也可能有碍于阅读的连续性。我个人偏向于喜欢一本经典只有原文、注、简洁的解释。
item.text_trans: The content of the book is good, the notes and explanations are good, but many of them are Mr. Guo's interpretation and personal views. Interpretation may help us to read, and may also hinder the continuity of reading. I personally prefer a classic only original, note, and concise explanation.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 分段注释以至于将正文及注释本身截成了数段，影响了阅读的连续性
item.text_trans: Segmentation comments so that the text and comments themselves are cut into segments, affecting the continuity of reading

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 不同时候读，能带给你不同的启发。
item.summary_trans: Sun Tzu's Art of War is a must for life
item.text_trans: Reading at different times can bring you different inspirations.

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.summary: 制作精良，内容丰富，有点小遗憾
item.text: 原文，字词解释，说明，全文解释。很全面和详细，非常好。而且也提出了与其他版本的不同解释之处，也对孙子兵法的思想辩证地进行了论证，指出了其不足。很好很强大。装帧不错，纸张很好，印刷不错，就是有些生僻词缺少拼音，和注解
item.summary_trans: Well-made, rich in content, a little regret
item.text_trans: Original text, explanation of words, explanation, full text interpretation. Very comprehensive and detailed, very good. Moreover, it also proposed different interpretations from other versions, and also dialectically demonstrated the thoughts of Sun Tzu's Art of War, pointing out its shortcomings. very good, very powerful. The binding is good, the paper is very good, the printing is good, that is, some uncommon words lack pinyin, and annotations

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 排版 纸质 内容都很好，古籍出版社的书很好！！！
item.text_trans: Typesetting Paper content is very good, the book of the ancient books publishing house is very good! ! !

item.name: 孙子兵法
item.author: 孙武
item.text: 好书不需要别人评价，评价来自读者。能出版点原文的古籍吗？不加任何狗屁专家校对注释的古文书，有的话，告知我下，我要读原文。
item.text_trans: Good books don't need to be evaluated by others, and evaluations come from readers. Can you publish the original text of the original text? If you don't add any shrubs to proofread the ancient instruments, if you have any, let me know, I have to read the original.
